No_DT ._.

From_IN the_DT PRINCIPAL_NNP INSPECTOR_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To_TO the_DT SECRETARY_NNP to_TO GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, (_( iv_NN )_) 3_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, good_JJ reason_NN to_TO be_VB satisfied_VBN with_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN performed_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1862_CD it_PRP was_VBD shown_VBN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN opera-_JJ tions_NNS was_VBD nearly_RB 15,000_CD less_JJR than_IN during_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD stated_VBN ,_, in_IN consequence_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT general_JJ result_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: regarded_VBN as_IN other-_JJ wise_NN than_IN unsatisfactory._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT returns_NNS for_IN 1863_CD show_NN a_DT decided_JJ improvement_NN ,_, and_CC contrast_NN favourably_RB with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT former_JJ year_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, while_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN 1862_CD was_VBD 245,565_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN was_VBD 267,995_CD ,_, being_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 22,430_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
This_DT increase_NN ,_, though_IN not_RB very_RB large_JJ ,_, is_VBZ nevertheless_RB much_RB greater_JJR than_IN I_PRP expected_VBD ._.
Indeed_RB I_PRP anticipated_VBD a_DT falling_VBG off_RP in_IN numbers_NNS ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT great_JJ difficulty_NN which_WDT was_VBD experienced_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS in_IN obtaining_VBG the_DT aid_NN of_IN peons_NNS ,_, to_TO assist_VB their_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT districts_NNS in_IN collecting_VBG children_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB for_IN inspection_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN I_PRP dwelt_VBP at_IN some_DT length_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN recent_JJ reductions_NNS in_IN the_DT revenue_NN establish-_JJ ment_NN ,_, the_DT Collectors_NNS had_VBD been_VBN compelled_VBN ,_, to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN ,_, to_TO withhold_VB the_DT assistance_NN of_IN peons_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ diminished_JJ number_NN being_VBG merely_RB sufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN the_DT revenue_NN duties_NNS for_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD entertained_VBN ._.
I_PRP ,_, in_IN con-_JJ sequence_NN ,_, urged_VBD the_DT importance_NN of_IN removing_VBG these_DT obstacles_NNS to_TO progress_VB by_IN sanctioning_VBG the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN one_CD peon_NN for_IN every_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, employed_VBN by_IN each_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN British_NNP territory_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ gratifying_VBG to_TO record_VB that_IN these_DT dfficulties_NNS are_VBP now_RB at_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, for_IN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT support_NN which_WDT was_VBD afforded_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ recommendation_NN by_IN His_PRP$ Ex-_JJ cellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP has_VBZ recently_RB been_VBN received_VBN for_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN 125_CD peons_NNS to_TO be_VB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Department_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
I_PRP anticipate_VBP as_IN the_DT result_NN ,_, (_( v_NN )_) 9_CD ._.
The_DT greatest_JJS increase_NN in_IN any_DT one_CD Circle_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT Northern_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Dick_NNP attributes_VBZ it_PRP very_RB much_RB to_TO the_DT more_JJR effectual_JJ assistance_NN which_WDT was_VBD afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT Native_NNP officials_NNS ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT strict_JJ orders_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
As_IN doubtless_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, equally_RB strict_JJ orders_NNS were_VBD given_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP authorities_NNS in_IN all_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO regard_VB it_PRP as_IN due_JJ mainly_RB to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ unwearied_JJ exertions_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Beatty_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO attribute_VB the_DT improvement_NN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ Circle_NNP chiefly_NN to_TO a_DT plan_NN which_WDT he_PRP adopted_VBD for_IN facilitating_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN his_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS ,_, by_IN arranging_VBG personally_RB with_IN Native_JJ officials_NNS for_IN the_DT vacci-_JJ nation_NN of_IN children_NNS in_IN the_DT districts_NNS through_IN which_WDT he_PRP passed_VBD ._.
Thus_RB ,_, after_IN having_VBG inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN and_CC register_NN of_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC satisfied_VBD himself_PRP as_IN to_TO the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ,_, he_PRP proceeded_VBD in_IN advance_NN ,_, visiting_VBG the_DT villages_NNS and_CC towns_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ route_NN ,_, and_CC collecting_VBG the_DT children_NNS ._.
With_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT patel_NN and_CC kulkurnee_NN ,_, a_DT list_NN of_IN all_DT unvaccinated_JJ children_NNS was_VBD then_RB made_VBN out_RP ,_, signed_VBN ,_, and_CC forwarded_VBD to_TO the_DT vaccinator_NN who_WP was_VBD to_TO follow_VB ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT particulars_NNS of_IN the_DT plan_NN will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT extracts_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN I_PRP consider_VBP the_DT mode_NN of_IN procedure_NN very_RB judicious_JJ ,_, I_PRP would_MD commend_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ Superintendents_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP adopted_VBD a_DT somewhat_RB similar_JJ plan_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS through_IN which_WDT he_PRP travelled_VBD in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
12_CD ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, about_RB 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
proved_VBN unsuccessful_JJ ._.
Thus_RB out_IN of_IN 267,995_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, 243,138_CD were_VBD reported_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
Every_DT practicable_JJ means_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS to_TO test_VB ,_, personally_RB and_CC otherwise_RB ,_, the_DT accuracy_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT main_JJ they_PRP are_VBP correct_JJ ._.
Two_CD instances_NNS of_IN falsification_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, came_VBD to_TO light_NN in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, one_CD in_IN Canara_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
It_PRP should_MD therefore_RB be_VB understood_JJ that_IN the_DT figures_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN ,_, not_RB in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN perfect_JJ accuracy_NN ,_, but_CC merely_RB as_IN an_DT approximation_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
13_CD ._.
In_IN reporting_VBG the_DT case_NN of_IN falsification_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Beatty_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ had_VBD a_DT very_RB large_JJ and_CC very_RB lengthened_JJ experience_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP is_VBZ there-_JJ fore_NN not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB mistaken_VBN ,_, stated_VBD that_IN with_IN that_DT one_CD exception_NN ,_, the_DT returns_NNS had_VBD invariably_RB been_VBN found_VBN correct_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT reported_JJ percentage_NN of_IN suc-_JJ cessful_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD &_CC quot_RB ;_: as_IN near_IN an_DT approximation_NN to_TO truth_VB as_IN possible._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 14_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Dick_NNP also_RB ,_, after_IN examining_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN no_DT less_JJR than_IN 29_CD vacci-_JJ nators_NNS ,_, and_CC verifying_VBG their_PRP$ returns_NNS ,_, states_NNS that_IN he_PRP failed_VBD to_TO discover_VB any_DT false_JJ names_NNS recorded_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ &_CC quot_NN ;_: satisfied_VBD that_IN falsification_NN does_VBZ not_RB take_VB place_NN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 15_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO sex_NN (_( vi_NN )_) 16_CD ._.
The_DT castes_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( vii_NN )_) population_NN ,_, with_IN regard_NN to_TO its_PRP$ permanent_JJ efficacy_NN as_IN a_DT safe-guard_NN ._.
A_DT longer_JJR experience_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT more_RBR extended_JJ education_NN ,_, will_MD no_DT doubt_NN assist_VB in_IN gradually_RB removing_VBG this_DT feeling_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT meantime_NN ,_, the_DT Superintendents_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN ,_, take_VB every_DT available_JJ opportunity_NN of_IN pointing_VBG out_RP the_DT fact_NN ,_, that_IN vaccina-_JJ tion_NN not_RB only_RB effects_NNS an_DT enormous_JJ amount_NN of_IN good_JJ by_IN diminishing_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN modifying_VBG the_DT character_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN when_WRB it_PRP does_VBZ appear_VB ,_, changes_VBZ a_DT deadly_JJ disorder_NN into_IN one_CD of_IN comparatively_RB slight_JJ importance_NN ._.
22_CD ._.
In_IN proof_NN of_IN the_DT correctness_NN of_IN this_DT remark_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT London_NNP Small-pox_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, extending_VBG over_IN a_DT long_JJ series_NN of_IN years_NNS ,_, show_VBP that_IN the_DT average_JJ rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN among_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, therein_RB admitted_VBN ,_, unprotected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN 37_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, whereas_IN the_DT mortality_NN among_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, properly_RB protected_VBN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN less_JJR than_IN half_NN of_IN one_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP even_RB states_VBZ on_IN the_DT latter_JJ point_NN ,_, that_IN after_IN making_VBG many_JJ inquiries_NNS ,_, and_CC taking_VBG no_DT little_JJ pains_NNS to_TO find_VB out_RP ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ never_RB heard_VBN of_IN a_DT single_JJ successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN child_NN having_VBG died_VBN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
24_CD ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP itself_PRP ,_, where_WRB small-pox_NN prevailed_VBD to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN Kurrachee_NNP where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD equally_RB prevalent_JJ towards_NNS its_PRP$ close_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO have_VB shown_VBN itself_PRP in_IN a_DT severe_JJ form_NN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT presidency_NN ._.
Throughout_IN Gujerat_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN much_RB less_RBR prevalent_JJ than_IN usual_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Kattiawar_NNP mentions_NNS that_IN he_PRP had_VBD not_RB seen_VBN a_DT single_JJ case_NN in_IN a_DT protected_JJ sub-_JJ ject_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD very_RB little_JJ in_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Deccan_NNP ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP Country_NNP it_PRP was_VBD met_VBN with_IN in_IN nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT zillahs_NN during_IN the_DT earlier_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, though_RB apparently_RB in_IN a_DT mild_JJ form_NN ._.
In_IN Sind_NNP a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB shown_VBN themselves_PRP in_IN nearly_RB every_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB in_IN a_DT severe_JJ form_NN ._.
Wherever_IN it_PRP did_VBD make_VB its_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, active_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD immedi-_JJ ately_RB adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ establishments_NNS to_TO arrest_VB its_PRP$ progress_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN ,_, that_IN with_IN exception_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB gradually_RB disappearing_VBG from_IN nearly_RB every_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
I_PRP stated_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN one_CD case_NN had_VBD come_VBN to_TO light_NN in_IN the_DT Tanna_NNP zillah_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD at_IN Bulsar_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN no_DT case_NN came_VBD actually_RB to_TO the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN either_DT of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Dick_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, has_VBZ recently_RB received_VBN information_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB practised_VBN in_IN the_DT Bulsar_NNP pergunna_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ the_DT more_RBR inclined_JJ to_TO believe_VB that_IN such_JJ may_MD be_VB the_DT case_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT circumstance_NN of_IN the_DT extreme_JJ unwillingness_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN that_DT district_NN to_TO accept_VB of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
26_CD ._.
He_PRP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT bias_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN or_CC inoculation_NN depends_VBZ very_RB much_JJ on_IN the_DT patel_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN as_IN the_DT latter_NN is_VBZ perfectly_RB indifferent_JJ on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, he_PRP affords_VBZ his_PRP$ support_NN to_TO the_DT inoculator_NN in_IN consideration_NN of_IN (_( viii_NN )_) the_DT fees_NNS which_WDT he_PRP receives_VBZ ._.
Dr._NNP Dick_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN an_DT effectual_JJ stop_NN to_TO the_DT system_NN might_MD be_VB put_VBN by_IN holding_VBG the_DT village_NN officials_NNS responsible_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP must_MD always_RB be_VB aware_JJ of_IN the_DT inoculator_NN 's_POS proceedings_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT new_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP provides_VBZ ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, against_IN the_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT practice_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB whether_IN it_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB desirable_JJ for_IN Government_NNP to_TO communicate_VB with_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Surat_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
27_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT practice_NN in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN came_VBD to_TO light_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN recent_JJ steps_NNS taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP will_MD completely_RB put_VB an_DT end_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
28_CD ._.
The_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN lymph_NN has_VBZ been_VBN well_RB reported_VBN on_IN by_IN nearly_RB every_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, the_DT resulting_VBG vesicles_NNS having_VBG been_VBN generally_RB well_RB developed_JJ and_CC well-marked_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP Ritchie_NNP ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector_NNP General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ long_RB taken_VBN an_DT active_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT Depart-_NNP ment_NN ,_, (_( ix_NN )_) 33_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Beatty_NNP regards_VBZ the_DT change_NN as_IN a_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: great_JJ boon_NN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: while_IN Dr._NNP Plumptre_NNP and_CC others_NNS are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN ,_, by_IN leading_VBG to_TO the_DT discontinuance_NN of_IN the_DT objec-_JJ tionable_JJ mode_NN of_IN procedure_NN ,_, just_RB mentioned_VBN ,_, the_DT purity_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN will_MD be_VB promoted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS consequently_RB increased_VBD ._.
34_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP Circles_NNP have_VBP recently_RB suggested_VBN the_DT advantage_NN of_IN being_VBG supplied_VBN with_IN empty_JJ capillary_JJ glass_NN tubes_NNS ._.

I_PRP have_VBP already_RB anticipated_VBN this_DT suggestion_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, for_IN in_IN June_NNP last_JJ I_PRP directed_VBD the_DT Medical_NNP Storekeeper_NNP to_TO procure_VB a_DT supply_NN from_IN England_NNP with_IN this_DT object_NN in_IN view_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO arrive_VB at_IN an_DT early_JJ date_NN ._.

36_CD ._.

37_CD ._.

38_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP also_RB states_VBZ that_IN no_DT special_JJ case_NN came_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ notice_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
He_PRP adds_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN after_IN having_VBG travelled_VBN over_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, and_CC after_IN having_VBG examined_VBN thousands_NNS of_IN children_NNS and_CC hundreds_NNS of_IN villages_NNS ,_, he_PRP feels_VBZ sure_JJ that_IN nobody_NN could_MD proceed_VB from_IN one_CD end_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ ,_, without_IN reading_VBG in_IN the_DT faces_VBZ of_IN the_DT rising_VBG generation_NN the_DT striking_JJ benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ;_: (_( x_NN )_) to_TO support_VB this_DT view_NN ,_, and_CC expressed_VBD an_DT opinion_NN that_IN all_DT municipalities_NNS of_IN any_DT size_NN or_CC importance_NN might_MD with_IN advantage_NN permanently_RB employ_VBZ a_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ labours_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN checking_VBG whose_WP$ returns_NNS ,_, the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNPS might_MD be_VB induced_VBN to_TO interest_NN themselves_PRP ._.
40_CD ._.
Thanks_NNS to_TO the_DT intelligent_JJ zeal_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Plumptre_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT hearty_JJ co-operation_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Chapman_NNP ,_, the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Sattara_NNP ,_, the_DT system_NN has_VBZ been_VBN commenced_VBN in_IN that_DT zillah_NN ,_, by_IN group-_JJ ing_VBG together_RB several_JJ municipal_JJ towns_NNS into_IN what_WP Mr._NNP Chapman_NNP calls_VBZ a_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: division_NN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC by_IN employing_VBG therein_RP a_DT vaccinator_NN on_IN 15_CD rupees_NNS a_DT month_NN ._.
Six_CD such_JJ divisions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN formed_VBN as_IN an_DT experimental_JJ measure_NN ._.
The_DT size_NN of_IN each_DT is_VBZ such_JJ as_IN will_MD permit_VB of_IN all_PDT the_DT towns_NNS therein_VBP being_VBG visited_VBN by_IN the_DT vacci-_JJ nator_NN once_RB every_DT three_CD months_NNS ._.
41_CD ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP of_IN Sattara_NNP is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, this_DT arrangement_NN is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO doubling_VBG the_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, without_IN any_DT increase_NN of_IN expen-_JJ diture_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.

Local_JJ Superintendent.2_NNP The_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT establishment_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attended_VBN with_IN marked_JJ success_NN ,_, as_IN 48,562_CD children_NNS have_VBP been_VBN operated_VBN on_IN ,_, showing_VBG an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT past_NN over_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN of_IN 8,861_CD ._.
This_DT increase_NN I_PRP attribute_VBP to_TO greater_JJR activity_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT assistance_NN they_PRP have_VBP received_VBN from_IN the_DT Collectors_NNS of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, Sholapore_NNP and_CC Khandeish_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, with_IN much_JJ consideration_NN ,_, have_VBP granted_VBN ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ,_, a_DT peon_NN to_TO accompany_VB each_DT vaccinator_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP of_IN Nuggur_NNP ,_, peons_NNS were_VBD given_VBN on_IN the_DT payment_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP five_CD (_( 5_CD )_) per_IN month_NN for_IN each_DT ._.
In_IN the_DT Tannah_NNP Collectorate_NNP no_DT peons_NNS were_VBD granted_VBN ._.
This_DT aid_NN was_VBD only_RB granted_VBN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN November_NNP and_CC December_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT increase_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB perceptible_JJ compared_VBN with_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ month_NN ,_, those_DT of_IN November_NNP exceeded_VBN by_IN over_IN 900_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN December_NNP they_PRP still_RB further_RBR increased_VBN by_IN 1,800_CD cases_NNS ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN per_IN month_NN previously_RB being_VBG 3,500_CD ._.
There_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT benefit_NN which_WDT will_MD result_VB on_IN peons_NNS being_VBG permanently_RB sanctioned_VBN ._.
The_DT great_JJ object_NN gained_VBN thereby_RB will_MD be_VB the_DT time_NN saved_VBN in_IN collecting_VBG children_NNS for_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ._.
They_PRP will_MD likewise_VB prove_VB a_DT check_NN ,_, in_IN some_DT degree_NN ,_, to_TO false_JJ returns_NNS of_IN numbers_NNS being_VBG sent_VBN in_IN ,_, and_CC my_PRP$ experience_NN proves_VBZ that_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN a_DT peon_NN with_IN each_DT vacci-_JJ nator_NN imparts_NNS confidence_NN rather_RB than_IN intimidation_NN ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, amongst_IN the_DT very_RB poorer_JJ classes_NNS ,_, a_DT peon_NN represents_VBZ the_DT Sircar_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP feel_VBP security_NN in_IN any_DT undertaking_NN when_WRB a_DT Government_NNP peon_NN is_VBZ present_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN their_PRP$ eyes_NNS in_IN a_DT measure_NN responsible_JJ ._.
But_CC perhaps_RB the_DT principal_NN cause_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT increased_VBN work_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN may_MD be_VB ascribed_VBN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT method_NN I_PRP adopted_VBD of_IN arranging_VBG personally_RB for_IN the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN children_NNS in_IN the_DT districts_NNS through_IN which_WDT I_PRP passed_VBD ._.
After_IN having_VBG first_RB inspected_VBN the_DT work_NN and_CC registers_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC satisfied_VBD myself_PRP as_IN to_TO the_DT quality_NN of_IN his_PRP$ lymph_NN ,_, my_PRP$ plan_NN was_VBD to_TO proceed_VB in_IN advance_NN ,_, visit_VBP all_DT villages_NNS and_CC towns_NNS ,_, and_CC collect_VB all_PDT the_DT children_NNS of_IN each_DT ._.
With_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN the_DT patell_NN ,_, and_CC kulkurnee_NN ,_, a_DT list_NN of_IN all_DT unvaccinated_JJ children_NNS was_VBD made_VBN out_RP ,_, signed_VBN ,_, and_CC forwarded_VBD to_TO the_DT vaccinator_NN who_WP would_MD subsequently_RB follow_VB ._.
Thus_RB a_DT double_JJ object_NN was_VBD effected_VBN ._.
The_DT old_JJ excuse_NN resorted_VBD to_TO regarding_VBG opposition_NN offered_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, or_CC scarcity_NN of_IN subjects_NNS ,_, was_VBD at_IN once_RB done_VBN away_RB with_IN ,_, and_CC from_IN my_PRP$ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT numbers_NNS ready_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ,_, I_PRP was_VBD in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO judge_VB whether_IN each_DT man_NN performed_VBD a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN ._.
Time_NNP was_VBD saved_VBN also_RB ,_, the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD not_RB obliged_VBN to_TO delay_VB ,_, for_IN immediately_RB on_IN visiting_VBG each_DT village_NN all_DT necessary_JJ preliminary_JJ arrangements_NNS had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN ._.
This_DT method_NN was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN excel-_JJ lent_JJ results_NNS ._.
The_DT returns_NNS of_IN several_JJ of_IN the_DT most_RBS indolent_JJ men_NNS became_VBD nearly_RB trebled_VBN ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN each_DT man_NN was_VBD 1,566_CD ,_, or_CC at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 130_CD operations_NNS per_IN month_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP every_DT reason_NN to_TO expect_VB that_DT on_IN the_DT permanent_JJ establishment_NN of_IN peons_NNS this_DT number_NN will_MD become_VB largely_RB increased_JJ ._.
The_DT Bheel_NNP tribe_NN ,_, who_WP formerly_RB were_VBD the_DT most_RBS violent_JJ opponents_NNS ,_, now_RB readily_RB accept_VB vaccina-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC except_IN in_IN the_DT very_RB wildest_JJS parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Satpooree_NNP hills_NNS and_CC western_JJ districts_NNS of_IN Khandeish_NNP they_PRP offer_VBP no_DT resistance_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO visit_VB these_DT districts_NNS as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Mr._NNP Ashburner_NNP ,_, the_DT present_JJ Collector_NNP ,_, has_VBZ rendered_VBN me_PRP every_DT assistance_NN ,_, and_CC vaccination_NN has_VBZ never_RB been_VBN attempted_VBN as_IN yet_RB amongst_IN these_DT wild_JJ races_NNS ._.
I_PRP anticipate_VBP but_CC little_JJ difficulty_NN ,_, as_IN with_IN these_DT people_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB ignorance_NN and_CC not_RB bigotry_NN which_WDT has_VBZ to_TO be_VB overcome_VBN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS ,_, under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ,_, vaccinated_VBD was_VBD 6,152_CD ,_, a_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ percentage_NN ,_, being_VBG 12.51_CD of_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, every_DT seventh_JJ person_NN was_VBD operated_VBN on_IN during_IN infancy_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD exactly_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ proportion_NN as_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS have_VBP an_DT extreme_JJ aversion_NN to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS meddled_VBN with_IN before_IN they_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO walk_VB ,_, unless_IN compelled_VBN ;_: they_PRP never_RB take_VBP them_PRP out_IN of_IN doors_NNS during_IN infancy_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT persuasion_NN will_MD induce_VB 3_CD the_DT generality_NN to_TO submit_VB them_PRP for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
They_PRP entertain_VBP a_DT belief_NN that_IN teething_VBG is_VBZ as_RB much_JJ as_IN an_DT infant_NN can_MD endure_VB ,_, and_CC dread_VB any_DT additional_JJ fever_NN likely_RB to_TO be_VB consequent_JJ on_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN vaccinated_VBD 45,008_CD were_VBD successful_JJ cases_NNS ,_, being_VBG a_DT percentage_NN of_IN 92.7_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN this_DT is_VBZ as_RB near_IN an_DT approximation_NN to_TO truth_VB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Every_DT means_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN both_DT by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP and_CC myself_PRP to_TO test_VB the_DT accuracy_NN and_CC truth_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS 's_POS returns_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN addition_NN they_PRP have_VBP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN been_VBN verified_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP 's_POS assistance_NN ._.
With_IN one_CD exception_NN they_PRP have_VBP invariably_RB been_VBN found_VBN correct_NN ._.
A_DT great_JJ boon_NN has_VBZ been_VBN conferred_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN sanctioning_VBG the_DT sum_NN of_IN one_CD Rupee_NNP per_IN month_NN to_TO each_DT vaccinator_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN conveying_VBG fresh_JJ matter_NN from_IN village_NN to_TO village_VB ._.
The_DT old_JJ system_NN of_IN trusting_VBG to_TO lymph_VB on_IN glass_NN and_CC points_NNS was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN delay_NN and_CC frequent_JJ failure_NN ._.
When_WRB vaccinating_VBG with_IN dry_JJ lymph_NN ,_, even_RB a_DT clever_NN operator_NN could_MD not_RB calculate_VB on_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD successful_JJ case_NN in_IN six_CD ._.
He_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN therefore_RB on_IN visiting_VBG a_DT new_JJ village_NN to_TO wait_VB for_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN of_IN fresh_JJ vesicles_NNS ,_, and_CC great_JJ delay_NN was_VBD thus_RB occasioned_VBN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN too_RB that_IN the_DT people_NNS lost_VBD confidence_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ degree_NN ,_, observing_VBG several_JJ operations_NNS performed_VBD followed_VBN by_IN no_DT pustules_NNS ._.
The_DT case_NN is_VBZ different_JJ now_RB ._.
In_IN every_DT village_NN two_CD or_CC three_CD children_NNS with_IN fresh_JJ matter_NN can_MD be_VB easily_RB obtained_VBN for_IN a_DT small_JJ remuneration_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT future_NN unsuccessful_JJ cases_NNS should_MD invariably_RB be_VB the_DT exception_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD beg_VB to_TO offer_VB a_DT suggestion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT advantage_NN of_IN supplying_VBG Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vac-_NNP cination_NN annually_RB with_IN empty_JJ tubes_NNS in_IN lieu_NN of_IN the_DT square_NN glasses_NNS and_CC ivory_NN points_NNS supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Storekeeper_NNP ._.
Vaccinators_NNS could_MD be_VB easily_RB instructed_VBN in_IN the_DT method_NN of_IN filling_VBG them_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT constant_JJ and_CC certain_JJ supply_NN of_IN vaccine_NN matter_NN would_MD at_IN all_DT times_NNS be_VB available_JJ for_IN transmission_NN to_TO the_DT Presidency_NNP and_CC other_JJ distant_JJ parts_NNS ._.
The_DT Principal_NNP Inspector-General_NNP 's_POS Circular_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2037_CD of_IN 1863_CD ,_, dated_VBD 8th_CD September_NNP last_JJ ,_, impressing_VBG on_IN Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP the_DT necessity_NN of_IN bearing_NN in_IN mind_NN the_DT wish_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, conveyed_VBD in_IN paragraph_NN 4_CD of_IN Resolution_NN 1131_CD ,_, dated_VBD 27th_CD July_NNP ,_, has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN lost_VBN sight_NN of_IN ,_, and_CC when_WRB travelling_VBG through_IN the_DT districts_NNS I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN at_IN much_JJ pains_NNS to_TO try_VB and_CC collect_VB facts_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT protective_JJ power_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN I_PRP formerly_RB brought_VBD to_TO notice_RB ,_, sufficiently_RB striking_VBG for_IN publication_NN ,_, as_IN yet_RB I_PRP have_VBP failed_VBN in_IN meeting_VBG with_IN such_JJ ;_: but_CC in_IN addition_NN to_TO my_PRP$ own_JJ inquiries_NNS the_DT Collectors_NNS of_IN each_DT district_NN have_VBP been_VBN written_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC requested_VBD to_TO obtain_VB through_IN the_DT mamlutdars_NNS information_NN on_IN the_DT following_JJ points_NNS :4_JJ SOUTHERN_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.5_NNP graph_VBD 9_CD of_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN Government_NNP on_IN that_DT Report_NNP ._.
From_IN my_PRP$ previous_JJ experience_NN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN this_DT ,_, I_PRP immediately_RB saw_VBD the_DT numerous_JJ advantages_NNS such_PDT a_DT plan_NN possessed_VBN ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_VB summed_VBN up_RP as_IN follows:6_NNS asking_VBG him_PRP to_TO accompany_VB me_PRP to_TO the_DT village_NN ._.
A_DT morning_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN ,_, and_CC two_CD children_NNS with_IN fresh_JJ vesicles_NNS sent_VBD to_TO the_DT village_NN ._.
On_IN our_PRP$ arrival_NN there_RB ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD collected_VBN at_IN the_DT Chowdry_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD addressed_VBN by_IN the_DT karbarree_NN and_CC my_PRP$ karkoon_NN on_IN the_DT benefits_NNS and_CC nature_NN of_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN ,_, and_CC within_IN half_PDT an_DT hour_NN some_DT forty_JJ children_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN forward_RB to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, a_DT result_NN which_WDT I_PRP much_JJ doubt_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN produced_VBN ,_, but_CC for_IN my_PRP$ being_VBG on_IN the_DT spot_NN ;_: indeed_RB during_IN the_DT week_NN I_PRP was_VBD at_IN Koorundwar_NNP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT stimulus_NN it_PRP gave_VBD the_DT native_JJ officials_NNS by_IN my_PRP$ directing_VBG the_DT Chief_NNP 's_POS attention_NN to_TO the_DT subject_NN ,_, nearly_RB as_IN many_JJ children_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN in_IN that_DT time_NN as_IN is_VBZ usually_RB done_VBN in_IN that_DT State_NNP in_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN months_NNS ._.
Some_DT time_NN ago_RB ,_, acting_VBG upon_IN a_DT suggestion_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN the_DT last_JJ Reso-_JJ lution_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, I_PRP drew_VBD up_RP a_DT form_NN of_IN notice_NN or_CC hand_NN bill_NN ,_, containing_VBG a_DT simple_JJ statement_NN of_IN facts_NNS descriptive_JJ of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN might_MD easily_RB be_VB understood_VBN by_IN the_DT uneducated_JJ mass_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
This_DT form_NN having_VBG been_VBN approved_VBN of_IN by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Inspector-General_JJ Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Department_NNP ,_, was_VBD forwarded_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN November_NNP last_JJ to_TO the_DT Oriental_NNP Translator_NNP to_TO Government_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN being_VBG translated_VBN into_IN Murathee_NNP and_CC Canarese_NNP ,_, but_CC in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ delay_NN in_IN receiving_VBG these_DT translations_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO issue_VB them_PRP ._.
NORTHERN_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.7_NNP The_DT proportion_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ rather_RB lower_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN new_JJ lymph_NN has_VBZ been_VBN introduced_VBN over_IN a_DT great_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP hope_VBP will_MD soon_RB be_VB dissemi-_JJ nated_VBN over_IN the_DT whole_JJ ,_, I_PRP anticipate_VBP great_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT result_NN in_IN future_JJ years_NNS ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP can_MD learn_VB ,_, all_DT previous_JJ attempts_NNS to_TO renew_VB the_DT lymph_NN in_IN Guzerat_NNP have_VBP failed_VBN ,_, and_CC there-_JJ fore_NN that_IN in_IN use_NN up_IN to_TO the_DT present_JJ time_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN in_IN course_NN of_IN transmission_NN from_IN subject_JJ to_TO subject_VB for_IN more_JJR than_IN forty_CD years_NNS ,_, so_IN that_DT now_RB a_DT fair_JJ opportunity_NN is_VBZ afforded_VBN by_IN comparing_VBG the_DT two_CD kinds_NNS to_TO form_VB an_DT opinion_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN vaccine_JJ lymph_NN does_VBZ or_CC does_VBZ not_RB degenerate_VB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN years_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ lymph_NN failures_NNS are_VBP frequent_JJ ,_, the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP small_JJ ,_, many_JJ of_IN them_PRP ill_VB developed_VBN ,_, and_CC contain_VB a_DT scarcely_RB appreciable_JJ quantity_NN of_IN lymph_NN and_CC leave_VB cicatrices_NNS which_WDT not_RB unfrequently_RB disappear_VBP entirely_RB or_CC nearly_RB so_RB in_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ,_, whilst_NN in_IN the_DT other_JJ case_NN failures_NNS are_VBP rare_JJ ,_, the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP large_JJ ,_, perfect_JJ in_IN appearance_NN ,_, and_CC contain_VBP abundance_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC leave_VBP scars_NNS which_WDT promise_VBP to_TO last_JJ for_IN life_NN ._.
Some_DT cicatrices_NNS of_IN ten_NN or_CC twenty_CD years_NNS standing_VBG which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN in_IN Guzerat_NNP are_VBP much_RB more_RBR distinct_JJ than_IN those_DT of_IN late_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP therefore_RB inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB that_DT deterioration_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN principally_RB during_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ._.
Whether_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT virus_NN has_VBZ been_VBN impaired_VBN is_VBZ a_DT question_NN which_WDT can_MD be_VB decided_VBN only_RB by_IN observation_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP fear_VBP that_IN in_IN this_DT respect_NN the_DT result_NN will_MD prove_VB less_RBR satisfactory_JJ than_IN would_MD be_VB desirable_JJ ._.
Statistics_NNS show_VBP that_IN to_TO confer_VB the_DT utmost_NN possible_JJ immunity_NN from_IN small-pox_JJ well_NN marked_VBN permanent_JJ cicatrices_NNS are_VBP essential_JJ ;_: and_CC they_PRP also_RB seem_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT degree_NN of_IN protection_NN is_VBZ in_IN direct_JJ proportion_NN to_TO the_DT quantity_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN all_DT events_NNS to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN perfect_JJ vesicles_NNS that_WDT have_VBP formed_VBN ,_, for_IN four_CD vesicles_NNS confer_VBP more_JJR perfect_JJ immunity_NN than_IN three_CD ,_, three_CD than_IN two_CD ,_, or_CC two_CD than_IN one_CD ._.
No_DT instance_NN of_IN inoculation_NN came_VBD to_TO my_PRP$ knowledge_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC J_NNP have_VBP just_RB received_VBN information_NN (_( February_NNP 1864_CD )_) from_IN which_WDT it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN this_DT system_NN is_VBZ being_VBG practised_VBN at_IN present_JJ in_IN Bulsar_NNP purgunna_NN ._.
That_IN this_DT practice_NN is_VBZ the_DT favourite_NN in_IN that_DT district_NN seems_VBZ pro-_JJ bable_NN from_IN the_DT extreme_JJ unwillingness_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO accept_VB vaccination_NN :_: this_DT they_PRP manifest_JJS by_IN concealing_VBG their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, by_IN deserting_VBG their_PRP$ dwellings_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT vaccinator_NN visits_VBZ them_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP occasionally_RB resort_VBP to_TO measures_NNS of_IN intimidation_NN by_IN reminding_VBG him_PRP of_IN the_DT beatings_NNS which_WDT other_JJ vaccinators_NNS suffered_VBD when_WRB employed_VBN in_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
The_DT bias_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN or_CC inoculation_NN depends_VBZ in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN ,_, sometimes_RB entirely_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT patell_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP being_VBG perfectly_RB indifferent_JJ ,_, affords_VB his_PRP$ support_NN to_TO the_DT inoculator_NN in_IN consideration_NN of_IN the_DT fees_NNS which_WDT he_PRP receives_VBZ ._.
A_DT simple_JJ and_CC effectual_JJ way_NN to_TO put_VB a_DT stop_NN to_TO the_DT system_NN ,_, I_PRP submit_VBP ,_, would_MD be_VB to_TO hold_VB the_DT village_NN officials_NNS responsible_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP must_MD always_RB be_VB aware_JJ of_IN the_DT inoculator_NN 's_POS movements_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO punish_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT measure_NN under_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN Government_NNP for_IN granting_VBG travelling_VBG batta_NN to_TO vaccinators_NNS would_MD be_VB found_VBN a_DT most_RBS valuable_JJ one_CD for_IN extending_VBG the_DT practice_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP of_IN 1857_CD ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN in_IN the_DT first_JJ year_NN after_IN batta_NN was_VBD granted_VBN to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN Sind_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS was_VBD between_IN twice_RB and_CC three_CD times_NNS larger_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC although_IN the_DT numerical_JJ increase_NN in_IN this_DT division_NN could_MD scarcely_RB be_VB so_RB large_JJ ,_, still_RB great_JJ benefit_NN would_MD result_VB by_IN enabling_VBG the_DT vaccinators_NNS to_TO meet_VB the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN travelling_NN ,_, and_CC affording_VBG them_PRP an_DT inducement_NN to_TO visit_VB a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN villages_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO go_VB over_RP their_PRP$ districts_NNS more_RBR frequently_RB ,_, and_CC thereby_RB to_TO confer_VB the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT prophylactic_NN on_IN the_DT rising_VBG generation_NN at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS possible_JJ age_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO reduce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN unprotected_JJ persons_NNS to_TO a_DT minimum_NN ._.
The_DT increased_VBN emolument_NN would_MD also_RB add_VB to_TO the_DT vaccinator_NN 's_POS prestige_NN in_IN his_PRP$ district_NN ,_, and_CC attract_VB a_DT superior_JJ class_NN of_IN men_NNS into_IN the_DT service_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN an_DT attempt_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO cause_VB the_DT village_NN officials_NNS to_TO prepare_VB a_DT list_NN of_IN all_DT unprotected_JJ persons_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS at_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD about_IN commencing_VBG operations_NNS ._.
This_DT would_MD seem_VB a_DT perfectly_RB legitimate_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD not_RB entailing_VBG much_JJ trouble_NN 8_CD to_TO persons_NNS having_VBG some_DT authority_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD such_JJ as_IN to_TO convince_VB me_PRP of_IN the_DT determination_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ majority_NN of_IN those_DT persons_NNS ,_, especially_RB of_IN the_DT tullatees_NNS ,_, to_TO afford_VB no_DT active_JJ assistance_NN to_TO this_DT Department_NNP ._.
Nearly_RB all_DT neglected_VBN to_TO prepare_VB these_DT lists_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB called_VBN to_TO account_VB stated_VBN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD given_VBN them_PRP to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, or_CC that_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB asked_VBN for_IN them_PRP ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT people_NNS denied_VBD that_IN they_PRP had_VBD any_DT unprotected_JJ childern_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN In_IN one_CD instance_NN a_DT tullatee_NN prepared_VBD an_DT indiscriminate_JJ list_NN of_IN persons_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ village_NN ,_, of_IN whom_WP many_JJ had_VBD no_DT children_NNS ,_, and_CC many_JJ had_VBD no_DT unprotected_JJ children_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN several_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD unprotected_VBN children_NNS were_VBD omitted_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, one_CD vaccinator_NN was_VBD much_RB surprised_VBN at_IN being_VBG supplied_VBN with_IN these_DT lists_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB at_IN receiving_VBG active_JJ assistance_NN from_IN the_DT patels_NNS in_IN several_JJ villages_NNS where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD working_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT it_PRP seems_VBZ was_VBD that_IN one_CD patel_NN had_VBD been_VBN suspended_VBN for_IN some_DT months_NNS the_DT pre-_NN vious_JJ year_NN for_IN neglecting_VBG to_TO make_VB a_DT requisition_NN for_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN when_WRB small-_NN pox_NN was_VBD prevalent_NN in_IN his_PRP$ village_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN proving_VBG complaints_NNS against_IN patels_NNS and_CC tullatees_NNS is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ ,_, because_IN occasional_JJ punishments_NNS induce_VBP these_DT officials_NNS to_TO afford_VB active_JJ support_NN to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB this_DT is_VBZ afforded_JJ work_NN almost_RB invariably_RB goes_VBZ on_IN satisfactorily_RB ,_, while_IN without_IN it_PRP very_RB little_JJ progress_NN can_MD be_VB made_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1863_CD I_PRP was_VBD at_IN Sannud_NNP ,_, thence_NN I_PRP travelled_VBD to_TO Verrumgaum_NNP and_CC Mandul_NNP ,_, after_IN that_DT through_IN the_DT Palunpoor_NNP States_NNPS ,_, where_WRB I_PRP visited_VBD Sumee_NNP ,_, Deodur_NNP ,_, Babur_NNP ,_, Wan_NNP ,_, Deesa_NNP ,_, and_CC Palunpoor_NNP ._.
I_PRP then_RB travelled_VBD southerly_RB through_IN the_DT Mahee_NNP Kanta_NNP and_CC through_IN Morassa_NNP ,_, and_CC afterwards_NNS visited_VBD Kuppurwunj_NNP ,_, Jeytulpoor_NNP ,_, Kaira_NNP ,_, Neriad_NNP ,_, Napar_NNP ,_, and_CC Borsud_NNP ,_, examining_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT different_JJ districts_NNS ._.
During_IN and_CC after_IN the_DT monsoon_NN I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN Chorassee_NNP and_CC Oolpar_NNP ,_, then_RB crossed_VBD to_TO Gogo_NNP ,_, and_CC travelling_VBG into_IN the_DT Dhundooka_NNP district_NN ,_, I_PRP examined_VBD vaccination_NN in_IN and_CC around_IN Burwalla_NNP and_CC Dholera_NNP ._.
I_PRP then_RB travelled_VBD into_IN the_DT Dholka_NNP district_NN ,_, where_WRB I_PRP was_VBD when_WRB the_DT year_NN terminated_VBD ._.
In_IN this_DT tour_NN I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN 20_CD Government_NNP and_CC 9_CD Native_NNP Chiefs_NNP '_POS vaccinators_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT latter_NN had_VBD not_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN for_IN years_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD had_VBD never_RB been_VBN visited_VBN ,_, although_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN employed_VBN for_IN nearly_RB eight_CD years_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ district_NN ._.
In_IN verifying_VBG their_PRP$ returns_NNS I_PRP failed_VBD to_TO discover_VB any_DT false_JJ names_NNS recorded_VBN ,_, and_CC although_IN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS when_WRB examining_VBG the_DT children_NNS there_EX was_VBD a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN persons_NNS reported_VBN absent_JJ by_IN the_DT patels_NNS than_IN I_PRP could_MD have_VB wished_VBN ,_, still_RB I_PRP am_VBP satisfied_JJ that_IN falsification_NN does_VBZ not_RB take_VB place_NN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN ._.
The_DT patels_NNS seem_VBP frequently_RB to_TO take_VB no_DT trouble_NN in_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT correctness_NN of_IN the_DT numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT Form_NNP V_NNP 2_CD which_WDT they_PRP attest_VBP ,_, sometimes_RB relying_VBG on_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN 's_POS statement_NN and_CC at_IN others_NNS even_RB signing_VBG the_DT blank_JJ form_NN and_CC allowing_VBG the_DT vaccinators_NNS to_TO fill_VB in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS afterwards_NNS ._.
9_CD SIND_NNP DIVISION_NNP ._.
Superintendent.10_NNP I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP may_MD be_VB stated_VBN that_IN there_EX exist_VBP no_DT very_RB serious_JJ obstacles_NNS on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN Sind_NNP generally_RB to_TO the_DT spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT majority_NN submit_VBP their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, more_RBR because_IN they_PRP know_VBP that_DT Government_NNP wish_VBD them_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, than_IN from_IN any_DT desire_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ to_TO protect_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS from_IN small-_JJ pox_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP fully_RB believe_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD not_RB influenced_VBN by_IN the_DT known_JJ wish_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, few_JJ comparatively_RB would_MD be_VB vaccinated_VBN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_WDT generally_RB the_DT people_NNS are_VBP acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT virus_NN ;_: still_RB indifference_NN ,_, and_CC among_IN many_JJ Hindoos_NNP positive_JJ aversion_NN to_TO vaccinating_VBG their_PRP$ children_NNS exist_VBP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN many_JJ inquiries_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC find_VB that_DT one_CD substantial_JJ reason_NN every_DT where_WRB exists_NNS for_IN objection_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT objection_NN that_IN a_DT pa-_JJ rent_NN naturally_RB has_VBZ to_TO carry_VB his_PRP$ child_NN from_IN his_PRP$ home_NN to_TO another_DT village_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN supplying_VBG lymph_NN wherewith_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB others_NNS ;_: in_IN many_JJ places_NNS I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN told_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: we_PRP have_VBP no_DT objection_NN to_TO have_VB our_PRP$ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN ,_, but_CC object_VBP to_TO carry_VB our_PRP$ chil-_JJ dren_NN to_TO other_JJ villages_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB the_DT lymph_NN taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vesicle_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB other_JJ children._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Among_IN many_JJ Hindoos_NNP there_EX are_VBP objections_NNS to_TO every_DT thing_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN ,_, for_IN reasons_NNS which_WDT are_VBP well_RB known_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ pleasing_VBG to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT Brahmins_NNP and_CC other_JJ influential_JJ Hindoos_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN Mussulmans_NNPS in_IN Tatta_NNP gave_VBD me_PRP every_DT assistance_NN in_IN persuading_VBG the_DT ignorant_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD the_DT example_NN of_IN submitting_VBG their_PRP$ own_JJ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ;_: the_DT Bhatias_NNP of_IN that_DT town_NN are_VBP incorrigible_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP they_PRP are_VBP every_DT where_WRB the_DT same_JJ in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, as_IN regards_NNS vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP are_VBP only_RB a_DT small_JJ body_NN ._.
The_DT Brah-_NNP mins_NNS object_VBP to_TO let_VB the_DT lymph_NN be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT arm_NN ,_, apparently_RB from_IN no_DT other_JJ reason_NN than_IN the_DT fear_NN of_IN giving_VBG the_DT child_NN pain_NN :_: at_IN present_NN in_IN Sind_NNP no_DT other_JJ method_NN of_IN carrying_VBG on_IN vaccina-_JJ nation_NN exists_NNS ,_, than_IN from_IN arm-to-arm_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB doubtful_JJ if_IN tube-lymph_JJ will_MD remove_VB the_DT necessity_NN for_IN always_RB carrying_VBG a_DT child_NN with_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN ._.
To_TO diminish_VB the_DT inconvenience_NN arising_VBG to_TO parents_NNS from_IN having_VBG to_TO carry_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO other_JJ villages_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP given_VBN strict_JJ injunctions_NNS to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, that_IN they_PRP shall_MD never_RB take_VB a_DT child_NN further_RBR than_IN is_VBZ absolutely_RB necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC always_RB to_TO pay_VB the_DT parents_NNS in_IN cash_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN the_DT wages_NNS of_IN labour_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP may_MD detain_VB them_PRP ._.
To_TO ensure_VB as_IN much_JJ control_NN in_IN this_DT matter_NN as_IN I_PRP possibly_RB can_MD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP issued_VBN a_DT cir-_JJ cular_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC instructed_VBD each_DT vaccinator_NN to_TO send_VB me_PRP a_DT weekly_JJ report_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT I_PRP can_MD form_VB a_DT tolerably_RB correct_JJ notion_NN of_IN his_PRP$ movements_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN his_PRP$ payments_NNS to_TO parents_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN September_NNP I_PRP visited_VBD Colonel_NNP Green_NNP (_( then_RB Acting_NNP Commissioner_NNP )_) in_IN Kurrachee_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT conversation_NN regarding_VBG the_DT introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Frontier_NNP District_NNP he_PRP said_VBD that_IN the_DT Belooches_NNP there_EX had_VBD as_IN much_JJ aversion_NN to_TO vaccination_NN as_IN they_PRP had_VBD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD personally_RB endeavored_VBN to_TO persuade_VB some_DT of_IN them_PRP to_TO submit_VB to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD not_RB succeeded_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN probably_RB any_DT attempt_NN to_TO spread_VB vaccination_NN there_RB at_IN present_NN will_MD be_VB unsuccessful_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB visited_VBN that_IN district_NN ,_, and_CC personally_RB know_VBP nothing_NN of_IN the_DT feelings_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP think_VBP if_IN Colonel_NNP Green_NNP could_MD not_RB persuade_VB them_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ I_PRP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.
There_EX are_VBP several_JJ ways_NNS of_IN testing_VBG the_DT truthfulness_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS '_POS reports_NNS :11_IN where_WRB vaccination_NN had_VBD been_VBN carried_VBN on_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS previously_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP appropriates_VBZ the_DT names_NNS of_IN children_NNS previously_RB successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT Native_NNP official_NN went_VBD to_TO the_DT place_NN it_PRP would_MD turn_VB out_RP that_IN the_DT children_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ that_IN he_PRP would_MD take_VB such_JJ trouble_NN as_IN to_TO discover_VB those_DT who_WP had_VBD been_VBN vaccinated_VBN by_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN whose_WP$ work_NN he_PRP might_MD be_VB testing_VBG ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP had_VBD been_VBN vaccinated_VBN years_NNS before_IN by_IN another_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, hence_NN this_DT method_NN is_VBZ also_RB open_JJ to_TO objection_NN ._.
The_DT third_JJ method_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ one_CD which_WDT I_PRP con-_VBP sider_NN offers_NNS a_DT certain_JJ test_NN both_DT of_IN the_DT truth_NN of_IN the_DT Register_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN performed_VBD ;_: I_PRP have_VBP therefore_RB adopted_VBN that_IN course_NN alone_RB ._.
This_DT method_NN is_VBZ very_RB simple_JJ and_CC only_JJ requires_VBZ a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN patient_JJ labor_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT result_NN amply_NN repays_VBZ the_DT trouble_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP demon-_JJ strates_VBZ the_DT actual_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN performed_VBN by_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN whose_WP$ work_NN is_VBZ under_IN examination_NN ,_, and_CC gives_VBZ great_JJ opportunity_NN for_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP obtaining_VBG correct_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT latter_JJ point_NN requires_VBZ some_DT attention_NN ._.
When_WRB I_PRP first_RB began_VBD inspecting_VBG ,_, I_PRP was_VBD content_JJ with_IN merely_RB seeing_VBG as_IN many_JJ children_NNS as_IN were_VBD collected_VBN ,_, and_CC drawing_VBG a_DT very_RB general_JJ conclusion_NN ,_, because_IN I_PRP seldom_VBP ever_RB saw_VBD as_IN many_JJ children_NNS as_IN had_VBD been_VBN reported_VBN ,_, hence_NN I_PRP determined_VBD to_TO abandon_VB such_JJ a_DT loose_JJ method_NN of_IN testing_VBG the_DT reports_NNS ,_, and_CC adopted_VBD the_DT following_JJ plan_NN ._.
At_IN every_DT village_NN where_WRB I_PRP go_VBP to_TO inspect_VB work_NN ,_, I_PRP generally_RB first_RB call_VB over_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT reported_VBN children_NNS either_DT to_TO the_DT pattell_NN ,_, zemindar_NN ,_, mookhee_NN ,_, or_CC some_DT person_NN who_WP was_VBD present_JJ at_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT children_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ;_: while_IN the_DT roll_NN is_VBZ being_VBG called_VBN over_IN the_DT children_NNS are_VBP collecting_VBG ._.
I_PRP make_VBP a_DT mark_NN against_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN children_NNS of_IN whom_WP they_PRP deny_VBP the_DT existence_NN ;_: second_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT children_NNS are_VBP assembled_VBN the_DT names_NNS are_VBP again_RB called_VBN over_RP ,_, and_CC I_PRP see_VBP each_DT child_NN 's_POS arm_NN as_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ name_NN is_VBZ called_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN ,_, successful_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB ,_, is_VBZ noted_VBN ,_, or_CC if_IN they_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN vaccinated_VBN that_IN fact_NN is_VBZ noted_VBN ;_: in_IN short_JJ ,_, whatever_WP the_DT result_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ marked_VBN down_RP in_IN the_DT Nominal_NNP Roll_NNP ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO Circular_NNP No_NNP ._.
2037_CD of_IN 1863_CD ,_, dated_VBD 8th_CD September_NNP 1863_CD ,_, of_IN Principal_NNP Inspector-General_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, calling_VBG for_IN a_DT notice_NN of_IN &_CC quot_NNS ;_: any_DT striking_JJ facts_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT protective_JJ power_NN or_CC success_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB widely_RB made_VBN known_VBN by_IN being_VBG published_VBN in_IN the_DT vernacular_NN of_IN each_DT District_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB that_IN any_DT special_JJ case_NN has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ notice_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP can_MD state_NN ,_, that_IN after_IN having_VBG travelled_VBN over_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, and_CC after_IN having_VBG personally_RB examined_JJ thousands_NNS of_IN children_NNS and_CC hundreds_NNS of_IN villages_NNS ,_, that_IN a_DT man_NN only_RB requires_VBZ to_TO travel_VB from_IN the_DT one_CD end_NN of_IN Sind_NNP to_TO the_DT other_JJ with_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS open_VBP to_TO read_VB in_IN the_DT faces_VBZ of_IN the_DT rising_VBG generation_NN what_WP the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP to_TO this_DT Province_NNP ._.
Here_RB almost_RB every_DT adult_NN is_VBZ marked_VBN with_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT great_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN below_IN ten_CD years_NNS old_JJ are_VBP vaccinated_VBN and_CC have_VBP escaped_VBN small-_JJ pox_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ a_DT great_JJ many_JJ below_IN ten_CD years_NNS old_JJ are_VBP marked_VBN ,_, but_CC few_JJ marked_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, no_DT doubt_NN some_DT who_WP were_VBD vaccinated_VBN are_VBP also_RB marked_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ._.

I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB brought_VBD children_NNS to_TO me_PRP occasionally_RB to_TO show_VB the_DT quality_NN of_IN lymph_NN and_CC vesicles_NNS :_: I_PRP told_VBD him_PRP it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ I_PRP should_MD see_VB ,_, if_IN not_RB all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS vaccinated_VBD ,_, yet_CC a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP failed_VBD in_IN this_DT ,_, I_PRP desired_VBD that_IN vaccination_NN should_MD take_VB place_NN at_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
This_DT was_VBD done_VBN daily_RB in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT returns_NNS at_IN once_RB fell_VBD nearly_RB one-half_JJ ._.
Finding_VBG daily_JJ vaccination_NN unsatisfactory_NN ,_, ._.

14_CD ._.

From_IN the_DT PRINCIPAL_NNP INSPECTOR_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To_TO the_DT SECRETARY_NNP to_TO GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, (_( iv_NN )_) 4_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1863_CD ,_, I_PRP alluded_VBD to_TO three_CD important_JJ measures_NNS recently_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN Government_NNP for_IN increasing_VBG the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ,_, viz_NN :_: 1st_CD ._.
(_( v_NN )_) Kotree_NNP ;_: but_CC there_EX was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ falling_VBG off_RP under_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP at_IN Sattara_NNP ,_, Kolapoor_NNP ,_, Kurrachee_NNP ,_, and_CC Hydrabad_NNP ._.
10.About_CD 8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT operations_NNS proved_VBD either_RB unsuccessful_JJ or_CC doubtful_JJ ._.
Thus_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT 332,894_CD vaccinations_NNS ,_, 306,525_CD were_VBD reported_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
That_IN the_DT returns_NNS received_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ native_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, on_IN this_DT and_CC other_JJ points_NNS ,_, are_VBP in_IN the_DT main_JJ correct_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB ;_: and_CC certainly_RB the_DT most_RBS strenuous_JJ efforts_NNS are_VBP made_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS to_TO test_VB their_PRP$ accuracy_NN by_IN personal_JJ inspection_NN and_CC by_IN other_JJ means_NNS ._.
Instances_NNS of_IN falsification_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP occasionally_RB met_VBN with_IN ._.
It_PRP should_MD ,_, therefore_VB ,_, be_VB understood_VBN that_IN the_DT figures_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB regarded_VBN ,_, not_RB in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN perfect_JJ accuracy_NN ,_, but_CC merely_RB as_IN an_DT approximation_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
Two_CD such_JJ instances_NNS occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
one_CD in_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC one_CD in_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP ._.
In_IN each_DT case_NN the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD dismissed_VBN the_DT service_NN ._.
11.As_CD some_DT 200_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP employed_VBN under_IN the_DT Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN only_RB these_DT two_CD were_VBD detected_VBN in_IN making_VBG false_JJ returns_NNS ,_, it_PRP seems_VBZ reasonable_JJ to_TO conclude_VB that_IN the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ by_IN no_DT means_NNS common_JJ ._.
On_IN this_DT point_NN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP states_VBZ very_RB pointedly_RB that_IN he_PRP travelled_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN every_DT district_NN in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, that_IN he_PRP examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN 14_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC inspected_JJ upwards_NNS of_IN 10,000_CD children_NNS ,_, yet_RB failed_VBN to_TO detect_VB a_DT single_JJ instance_NN of_IN false_JJ registers_NNS ._.
He_PRP then_RB adds_VBZ ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: if_IN falsification_NN existed_VBD I_PRP should_MD certainly_RB have_VB detected_VBN it._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 12.Dr_CD ._.
Butler_NNP makes_VBZ a_DT very_RB similar_JJ remark_NN ._.
He_PRP states_VBZ that_IN he_PRP travelled_VBD over_RP the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN Kattiawar_NNP ,_, and_CC examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN 19_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, yet_RB &_CC quot_NN ;_: did_VBD not_RB find_VB a_DT single_JJ false_JJ return._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 13.With_CD regard_NN to_TO sex_NN (_( vi_NN )_) than_IN when_WRB resorted_VBN to_TO at_IN a_DT later_JJ age_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT accumulated_JJ expe-_JJ rience_NN of_IN Europe_NNP all_DT points_NNS in_IN this_DT direction_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN still_RB further_JJ confirmatory_NN of_IN the_DT correctness_NN of_IN this_DT view_NN ,_, I_PRP may_MD mention_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD recently_RB stated_VBN in_IN a_DT medical_JJ periodical_NN that_IN ,_, at_IN an_DT interview_NN which_WDT a_DT deputation_NN of_IN the_DT Epidemio-_NNP logical_JJ Society_NNP in_IN London_NNP had_VBD a_DT few_JJ months_NNS ago_IN with_IN the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT Privy_NNP Council_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD urged_VBN by_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT deputation_NN that_IN &_CC quot_VB ;_: if_IN every_DT body_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB well_RB vaccinated_VBN in_IN early_JJ infancy_NN ,_, small-pox_JJ might_MD be_VB nearly_RB banished_VBN from_IN our_PRP$ death_NN registers_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: ._.
17.I_CD would_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, again_RB urge_JJ upon_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, (_( vii_NN )_) 21.Proofs_CD ,_, however_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT immunity_NN afforded_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, properly_RB performed_VBN ,_, may_MD be_VB met_VBN with_IN everywhere_RB ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS signal_JJ of_IN all_DT is_VBZ perhaps_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT fact_NN ,_, (_( viii_NN )_) 26_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN for_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, mentions_NNS that_IN when_WRB he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT hills_NNS lying_VBG between_IN Kurrachee_NNP and_CC the_DT Khan_NNP of_IN Khelat_NNP 's_POS territory_NN towards_IN the_DT Hubb_NNP River_NNP ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS who_WP had_VBD recently_RB been_VBN inoculated_VBN ,_, and_CC on_IN making_VBG enquiries_NNS he_PRP ascertained_VBD that_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD inocu-_JJ lators_NNS had_VBD been_VBN at_IN work_NN in_IN that_DT direction_NN ._.
He_PRP further_RB states_VBZ that_IN the_DT practice_NN resulted_VBD in_IN conveying_VBG small-pox_JJ into_IN Kurrachee_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD the_DT direct_JJ cause_NN in_IN producing_VBG the_DT epidemic_JJ which_WDT prevailed_VBD in_IN that_DT town_NN at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN 1863_CD ._.

27_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP also_RB ascertained_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT Meerpoor_NNP Sacra_NNP Kardarate_NNP ,_, small-pox_NN was_VBD kept_VBN up_RP during_IN the_DT hot_JJ season_NN by_IN an_DT inoculator_NN named_VBN Shah_NNP Meer_NNP ,_, a_DT fukkeer_NN ._.

28_CD ._.
Again_NNP ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP mentions_NNS that_WDT reports_NNS had_VBD reached_VBN him_PRP of_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN inoculators_NNS in_IN the_DT Tanna_NNP districts_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN each_DT case_NN he_PRP had_VBD requested_VBN the_DT magistrate_NN to_TO enquire_VB into_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO take_VB proceedings_NNS against_IN them_PRP ,_, under_IN the_DT impression_NN that_IN paragraphs_VBZ 269_CD and_CC 270_CD of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT requisite_JJ power_NN ._.

As_IN differences_NNS of_IN opinion_NN appear_VBP to_TO exist_VB on_IN this_DT point_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD venture_NN to_TO suggest_VB whether_IN a_DT reference_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT law_NN officers_NNS of_IN Government_NNP ,_, (_( ix_NN )_) 30_CD ._.
In_IN some_DT places_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ at_IN times_NNS to_TO be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO keep_VB up_RP a_DT supply_NN of_IN matter_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB always_RB ready_JJ for_IN use_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT need_NN not_RB excite_VB any_DT feeling_NN of_IN surprise_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN the_DT same_JJ complaint_NN is_VBZ occasion-_JJ ally_RB made_VBN in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._.
In_IN illustration_NN of_IN my_PRP$ remark_NN ,_, I_PRP may_MD mention_VB that_IN for_IN a_DT considerable_JJ time_NN ,_, last_JJ year_NN ,_, lymph_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB main-_JJ tained_VBN at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, and_CC vaccination_NN was_VBD in_IN consequence_NN suspended_VBN ._.

31_CD ._.

32_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Plumptre_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, alludes_VBZ to_TO the_DT subject_NN in_IN his_PRP$ recent_JJ report_NN ,_, and_CC urges_VBZ the_DT importance_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG lymph_NN from_IN Europe_NNP ._.

34_CD ._.

36_CD ._.

39.The_CD Collector_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB approve_VB of_IN this_DT suggestion_NN ,_, and_CC pro-_NNS posed_VBN instead_RB that_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP should_MD take_VB upon_IN himself_PRP the_DT entire_JJ control_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN punishing_NN by_IN fine_NN ._.

44.Vaccination_CD in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, which_WDT for_IN many_JJ years_NNS past_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN a_DT satis-_JJ factory_NN state_NN ,_, has_VBZ recently_RB been_VBN rendered_VBN still_RB more_RBR effective_JJ by_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN a_DT plan_NN ,_, proposed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, for_IN appointing_VBG local_JJ vaccinators_NNS as_IN a_DT supplementary_JJ aid_NN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP establishment_NN ._.

46.Government_CD are_VBP aware_JJ that_IN some_DT time_NN ago_IN Dr._NNP Plumptre_NNP drew_VBD up_RP a_DT short_JJ paper_NN ,_, descriptive_NN of_IN the_DT facts_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC illustrative_NN of_IN its_PRP$ bene-_JJ fits_NNS ._.

47_CD ._.

55.Before_CD concluding_VBG the_DT report_NN I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO record_VB briefly_NN that_IN ,_, since_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP been_VBN pleased_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT recommendation_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP ,_, still_RB further_RBR to_TO increase_VB the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN by_IN sanctioning_VBG several_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT were_VBD submitted_VBN for_IN consideration_NN ._.

It_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN villages_NNS of_IN Kaira_NNP Zillah_NNP in_IN February_NNP ,_, March_NNP ,_, and_CC April_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN very_RB prevalent_JJ and_CC caused_VBD large_JJ mortality_NN if_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT villages_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN carefully_RB gone_VBN over_IN by_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS a_DT few_JJ months_NNS previously_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Roree_NNP I_PRP examin-_VBP ed_IN the_DT children_NNS vaccinated_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN 1863_CD by_IN the_DT first_JJ hospital_NN assistant_NN ;_: the_DT work_NN had_VBD been_VBN well_RB done_VBN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP could_MD test_VB it_PRP ,_, perfectly_RB truthful_JJ ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ lymph_NN was_VBD good_JJ ._.
Here_RB in_IN February_NNP I_PRP saw_VBD H._NNP H._NNP the_DT Ameer_NNP of_IN Khyrepoor_NNP 's_POS vaccinator_NN ._.

GOVERNMENT_NNP RESOLUTION_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
828_CD ,_, 12TH_CD MAY_NNP 1865_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO learn_VB that_IN the_DT Returns_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN show_VBP a_DT decided_JJ improvement_NN ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN Vaccinations_NNP being_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 64,899_CD over_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN ._.
This_DT increase_NN is_VBZ very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN Vaccinations_NNS in_IN 1863_CD of_IN children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN was_VBD 92,948_CD ,_, whereas_VBD the_DT returns_NNS for_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN give_VBP 109,551_CD ,_, being_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 16,600_CD ._.
This_DT also_RB is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ._.
3_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Stovell_NNP states_VBZ that_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP and_CC the_DT S._NNP M._NNP Country_NNP have_VBP stronger_JJR prejudices_NNS against_IN infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS than_IN those_DT in_IN Guzerat_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ._.
The_DT Revenue_NNP Commissioner_NNP S._NNP D._NNP should_MD be_VB directed_VBN to_TO inquire_VB into_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN this_DT prejudice_NN ,_, and_CC suggest_JJS to_TO the_DT Principal_NNP Inspector-General_NNP the_DT best_JJS means_NNS of_IN removing_VBG it_PRP ._.
4_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP believes_VBZ that_RB ,_, as_IN stated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Stovell_NNP ,_, the_DT pratice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN is_VBZ disappearing_VBG in_IN most_JJS districts_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ in_IN such_JJ districts_NNS to_TO trust_VB to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ spread_NN of_IN knowledge_NN and_CC to_TO the_DT appreciation_NN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT practical_JJ benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
If_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP be_VB found_VBN that_IN professional_JJ inoculators_NNS still_RB take_VBP advantage_NN to_TO any_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT less_JJR civilized_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB expedient_JJ to_TO interfere_VB ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Tanna_NNP should_MD report_VB on_IN the_DT 28th_CD paragraph_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP will_MD be_VB considered_VBN how_WRB far_RB the_DT pro-_JJ visions_NNS of_IN the_DT Penal_NNP Code_NNP are_VBP applicable_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ another_DT mode_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, by_IN which_WDT inoculation_NN may_MD be_VB super-_JJ seded_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Principal_NNP Inspector-General_NNP should_MD direct_VB the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP to_TO turn_VB their_PRP$ attention_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB impro-_JJ bable_JJ that_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP hitherto_VBN gained_VBN a_DT livelihood_NN by_IN inoculation_NN may_MD be_VB induced_VBN to_TO take_VB employment_NN as_IN Vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN informed_VBN of_IN an_DT instance_NN in_IN which_WDT an_DT old_JJ Brahmin_NNP who_WP formerly_RB practised_VBN inoculation_NN would_MD gladly_RB enter_VB the_DT Government_NNP service_NN as_IN a_DT Vaccinator_NNP ._.
If_IN the_DT payment_NN were_VBD by_IN successful_JJ results_NNS ,_, no_DT harm_NN could_MD result_VB from_IN a_DT trial_NN of_IN these_DT suggestions_NNS ._.
xv_RB 6_CD ._.

8_CD ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, about_RB 8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
proved_VBN either_DT unsuccessful_JJ or_CC doubtful_JJ ._.

Every_DT practicable_JJ means_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB been_VBN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS ,_, both_DT personally_RB and_CC otherwise_RB ,_, to_TO test_VB the_DT accuracy_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS received_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ reason_NN to_TO be-_NN lieve_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT main_JJ they_PRP are_VBP correct_JJ ._.
The_DT testimony_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS on_IN this_DT point_NN becomes_VBZ stronger_JJR year_NN by_IN year_NN ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ recent_JJ report_NN ,_, for_IN in-_JJ stance_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Butler_NNP states_VBZ that_IN throughout_IN his_PRP$ tour_NN in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ,_, he_PRP &_CC quot_NN ;_: did_VBD not_RB find_VB a_DT single_JJ false_JJ return._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Testimony_NNP to_TO the_DT same_JJ effect_NN is_VBZ borne_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP ,_, who_WP reports_VBZ that_IN ,_, though_IN he_PRP visited_VBD 395_CD villages_NNS ,_, and_CC inspected_JJ upwards_NNS of_IN 12,000_CD vaccinated_JJ children_NNS ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB discover_VB a_DT single_JJ false_JJ name_NN ,_, although_IN on_IN each_DT occasion_NN the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT children_NNS were_VBD read_VBN over_IN ,_, and_CC he_PRP carefully_RB examined_VBD their_PRP$ arms_NNS one_CD by_IN one_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP also_RB states_VBZ that_IN ,_, although_IN he_PRP travelled_VBD nearly_RB 1,700_CD miles_NNS ,_, examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN 18_CD vacci-_JJ nators_NNS in_IN 400_CD villages_NNS ,_, had_VBD the_DT children_NNS 's_POS names_NNS called_VBN over_IN from_IN the_DT registers_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN saw_VBD the_DT vaccination_NN marks_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB detect_VB a_DT single_JJ false_JJ name_NN ._.
Occasional_JJ falsification_NN of_IN Returns_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
Yet_RB ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT strong_JJ evidence_NN thus_RB brought_VBD forward_RB ,_, in-_JJ stances_NNS of_IN falsification_NN do_VBP occasionally_RB come_VB to_TO light_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN from_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, that_WDT while_IN Dr._NNP Dick_NNP was_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ tour_NN in_IN Gujerat_NNP ,_, he_PRP personally_RB ascertained_VBD that_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN two_CD villages_NNS near_IN Hansote_NNP had_VBD been_VBN falsified_VBN by_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN was_VBD in_IN consequence_NN brought_VBD before_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, under_IN Section_NNP 182_CD of_IN the_DT Penal_NNP Code_NNP ,_, and_CC sentenced_VBD to_TO one_CD month_NN 's_POS imprisonment_NN ._.

Sexes_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO sex_VB 193,510_CD were_VBD males_NNS and_CC 164,688_CD were_VBD females_NNS ._.
