(_( vi_NN )_) 11_CD ._.
The_DT castes_NNS were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( vii_NN )_) more_RBR extensive_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP mentions_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ recent_JJ report_NN that_IN the_DT larger_JJR and_CC more_RBR intelligent_JJ Zemindars_NNS are_VBP now_RB more_RBR willing_JJ to_TO use_VB their_PRP$ influence_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN vaccination_NN than_IN they_PRP formerly_RB were_VBD ,_, particularly_RB in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Shikarpoor_NNP ;_: and_CC he_PRP attributes_VBZ this_DT feeling_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN of_IN vaccination_NN having_VBG been_VBN so_RB steadily_RB and_CC con-_JJ tinuously_RB practised_VBN for_IN years_NNS by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT surrounding_VBG inhabitants_NNS having_VBG observed_VBD the_DT immunity_NN from_IN small-pox_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ resulted_VBN therefrom_NN ._.
Small-pox_NNP ._.
15_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, the_DT reports_NNS received_VBD from_IN all_DT quarters_NNS show_VBP that_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN Aden_NNP and_CC Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD much_RB less_JJR of_IN that_DT disease_NN throughout_IN the_DT entire_JJ Presidency_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN where_WRB it_PRP did_VBD prevail_VB ,_, it_PRP assumed_VBD in_IN most_JJS places_NNS a_DT milder_NN form_NN than_IN usual_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO have_VB made_VBN its_PRP$ appearance_NN in_IN a_DT few_JJ villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Cambay_NNP and_CC one_CD or_CC two_CD other_JJ districts_NNS ,_, but_CC not_RB elsewhere_RB ._.
In_IN Kattiawar_NNP Dr._NNP Butler_NNP mentions_NNS that_IN it_PRP prevailed_VBD in_IN several_JJ villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Dedan_NNP talooka_NN ,_, particularly_RB at_IN Khater_NNP Kotree_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP proved_VBD fatal_JJ to_TO upwards_NNS of_IN a_DT hundred_JJ children_NNS ,_, but_CC he_PRP was_VBD assured_VBN by_IN the_DT Patel_NNP that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ vaccinated_JJ child_NN had_VBD died_VBN ._.
Throughout_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP there_EX appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN very_RB little_JJ indeed_RB ,_, and_CC nowhere_RB in_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ form_NN ,_, except_IN in_IN a_DT few_JJ villages_NNS near_IN Dhoolia_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT Concan_NNP no_DT notice_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN of_IN its_PRP$ prevalence_NN except_IN at_IN Vingorla_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector_NNP General_NNP reports_VBZ its_PRP$ having_VBG raged_VBN among_IN the_DT families_NNS of_IN the_DT fishermen_NNS ;_: so_RB much_RB so_IN indeed_RB that_IN these_DT people_NNS ,_, (_( viii_NN )_) 17_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP itself_PRP the_DT mortality_NN from_IN small-pox_NN was_VBD less_JJR than_IN during_IN the_DT two_CD previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
In_IN 1863_CD the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN this_DT cause_NN were_VBD 1,113_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1864_CD they_PRP reached_VBD 1,678_CD ,_, while_IN last_JJ year_NN they_PRP were_VBD only_RB 561_CD ._.
It_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB supposed_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, from_IN this_DT statement_NN ,_, that_IN I_PRP wish_VBP to_TO imply_VB that_IN the_DT suc-_JJ cess_NN of_IN vaccination_NN was_VBD really_RB much_JJ greater_JJR in_IN 1865_CD than_IN in_IN the_DT two_CD preceding_VBG years_NNS ._.
Far_RB from_IN it_PRP ,_, for_IN the_DT actual_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS was_VBD only_RB 334_CD ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP show_VBP that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS since_IN 1848_CD ,_, (_( when_WRB Dr._NNP Leith_NNP first_RB commenced_VBD his_PRP$ valuable_JJ mortuary_JJ returns_NNS )_) has_VBZ greatly_RB fluctuated_VBN ,_, the_DT wave_NN of_IN mortality_NN ,_, from_IN some_DT inexplicable_JJ cause_NN ,_, rising_VBG every_DT second_JJ or_CC third_JJ year_NN to_TO its_PRP$ greatest_JJS height_NN and_CC then_RB receding_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT without_IN the_DT least_JJS connection_NN apparently_RB with_IN the_DT actual_JJ state_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Facts_NNS of_IN this_DT nature_JJ lead_NN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN ,_, apart_RB from_IN the_DT progressive_JJ condition_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, the_DT extent_NN and_CC virulence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN are_VBP dependent_VBN on_IN certain_JJ epidemic_JJ influences_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT precise_JJ nature_NN of_IN which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP at_IN present_JJ profoundly_RB ignorant_JJ ._.
18_CD ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT want_NN of_IN accurate_NN registration_NN throughout_IN the_DT mofussil_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP town_NN itself_PRP that_IN any_DT statement_NN can_MD be_VB made_VBN with_IN confidence_NN ,_, relative_JJ to_TO the_DT precise_JJ extent_NN of_IN mortality_NN from_IN small-pox_NN ;_: and_CC recollecting_VBG that_IN in_IN 1863_CD upwards_NNS of_IN 2,000_CD people_NNS died_VBD of_IN this_DT disease_NN in_IN London_NNP ,_, where_WRB vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN compulsory_VBN by_IN law_NN since_IN 1854_CD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP must_MD be_VB admitted_VBN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO be_VB surprised_VBN at_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN this_DT cause_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB compulsory_JJ ._.
Inoculation_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN allusion_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO the_DT mischievous_JJ practice_NN and_CC fatal_JJ consequences_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP suggested_VBD the_DT desirability_NN of_IN procuring_VBG a_DT legal_JJ decision_NN on_IN the_DT point_NN whether_IN ,_, or_CC not_RB ,_, sections_NNS 269_CD and_CC 270_CD of_IN the_DT Penal_NNP Code_NNP gave_VBD Magistrates_NNP power_NN to_TO take_VB proceedings_NNS against_IN inoculators_NNS ,_, as_IN differences_NNS of_IN opinion_NN appeared_VBD to_TO exist_VB on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
The_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Tanna_NNP ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ districts_NNS inoculation_NN was_VBD said_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN practice_NN ,_, was_VBD directed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO report_VB on_IN my_PRP$ remarks_NNS ._.
He_PRP replied_VBD by_IN sending_VBG copy_NN of_IN a_DT letter_NN addressed_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ predecessor_NN to_TO the_DT Superintendent_JJ Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD stated_VBN that_IN &_CC quot_VB ;_: to_TO render_VB a_DT man_NN amenable_JJ to_TO these_DT enactments_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ act_NN must_MD be_VB proved_VBN to_TO be_VB either_RB illegal_JJ ,_, negligent_JJ ,_, or_CC malignant_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT only_JJ chance_NN of_IN conviction_NN rested_VBN on_IN being_VBG able_JJ to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT act_NN was_VBD illegal_JJ ,_, for_IN it_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB either_CC malignant_JJ or_CC negligent._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: It_PRP then_RB said_VBD that_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT High_NNP Court_NNP had_VBD ruled_VBN that_IN no_DT general_JJ order_NN of_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, declaring_VBG the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN illegal_NN ,_, was_VBD valid_JJ ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: (_( ix_NN )_) and_CC added_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD &_CC quot_NN ;_: a_DT question_NN whether_IN a_DT special_JJ order_NN ,_, served_VBD on_IN the_DT practitioner_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO be_VB more_JJR cogent._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 20_CD ._.
This_DT reply_NN from_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP having_VBG been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO me_PRP by_IN Government_NNP for_IN any_DT remarks_NNS I_PRP might_MD wish_VB to_TO make_VB ,_, I_PRP referred_VBD to_TO paragraphs_VB 25_CD to_TO 28_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1864_CD ,_, in_IN which_WDT were_VBD stated_VBN certain_JJ facts_NNS proving_VBG that_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN did_VBD great_JJ harm_NN by_IN spreading_VBG and_CC perpetuating_VBG small-_JJ pox_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP also_RB caused_VBD great_JJ mortality_NN ._.
I_PRP ,_, at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, suggested_VBD whether_IN a_DT Legislative_NNP enactment_NN might_MD not_RB be_VB passed_VBN to_TO render_VB such_JJ practice_NN penal_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT Code_NNP were_VBD ineffectual_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
I_PRP was_VBD subsequently_RB informed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP that_IN ,_, under_IN the_DT existing_VBG law_NN ,_, parties_NNS practising_VBG inoculation_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB proceeded_VBN against_IN ,_, and_CC that_DT Government_NNP would_MD await_VB the_DT receipt_NN of_IN further_JJ information_NN before_IN deciding_VBG on_IN the_DT expediency_NN of_IN having_VBG recourse_NN to_TO legislation_NN ._.
22_CD ._.
It_PRP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, now_RB becomes_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO submit_VB all_PDT the_DT information_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN which_WDT the_DT reports_NNS from_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN will_MD enable_VB me_PRP to_TO supply_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN from_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP that_IN Dr._NNP Dick_NNP ,_, while_IN on_IN his_PRP$ tour_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Bulsar_NNP and_CC Bugwara_NNP ,_, found_VBD that_IN inocula-_JJ tion_NN was_VBD much_RB practised_VBN by_IN the_DT caste_NN of_IN Ghatees_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP secure_VBP encour-_JJ agement_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB direct_JJ aid_NN ,_, from_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT village_NN Patels_NNP ,_, to_TO whom_WP they_PRP offer_VBP a_DT small_JJ fee_NN for_IN each_DT child_NN inoculated_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Dick_NNP also_RB noticed_VBD many_JJ recently_RB inoculated_VBD children_NNS ,_, and_CC traced_VBD some_DT deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB some_DT cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT direct_JJ results_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN ._.
This_DT he_PRP officially_RB reported_VBD to_TO the_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT result_NN is_VBZ not_RB mentioned_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Butler_NNP ,_, the_DT Superin-_NNP tendent_NN in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ,_, mentions_NNS that_IN he_PRP visited_VBD two_CD villages_NNS where_WRB inoculation_NN had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN ,_, but_CC that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB find_VB any_DT traces_NNS of_IN the_DT inoculator_NN ._.
He_PRP adds_VBZ that_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT first_JJ time_NN he_PRP had_VBD met_VBN with_IN any_DT cases_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN in_IN that_DT province_NN ._.
In_IN no_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP was_VBD a_DT single_JJ case_NN brought_VBD to_TO light_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, not_RB even_RB in_IN Sind_NNP or_CC in_IN the_DT Tanna_NNP Collector-_NNP ate_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS were_VBD its_PRP$ two_CD strongholds_NNS ._.
23_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD now_RB remain_VB with_IN Government_NNP to_TO decide_VB whether_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN ensuring_VBG the_DT abolition_NN of_IN the_DT practice_NN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO trust_VB to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ spread_NN of_IN knowledge_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT appreciation_NN by_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT practical_JJ benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: or_CC whether_IN it_PRP &_CC quot_NNS ;_: may_MD be_VB expedient_JJ to_TO interfere._VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: Inoculators_NNS ._.
24_CD ._.
In_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB recorded_VBN in_IN this_DT place_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD suggested_VBN by_IN Government_NNP that_IN men_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD hitherto_NN gained_VBN a_DT livelihood_NN by_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, might_MD probably_RB be_VB induced_VBN to_TO 2_CD vac_NN (_( x_JJ )_) take_VB employment_NN as_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT inoculation_NN might_MD thus_RB be_VB super-_JJ seded_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD further_RBR suggested_VBD that_IN if_IN payment_NN were_VBD made_VBN by_IN successful_JJ results_NNS ,_, no_DT harm_NN could_MD result_VB from_IN a_DT trial_NN ._.
The_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNP was_VBD accordingly_RB directed_VBN to_TO the_DT subject_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT reports_NNS received_VBD from_IN these_DT Officers_NNS it_PRP appeared_VBD that_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP had_VBD personally_RB ,_, on_IN several_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, endeavoured_VBD to_TO induce_VB inoculators_NNS to_TO take_VB service_NN as_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC without_IN success_NN ._.
He_PRP stated_VBD his_PRP$ belief_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN there_EX are_VBP now_RB very_RB few_JJ left_NN in_IN that_DT province_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN with_IN the_DT increase_NN recently_RB made_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ establishment_NN ,_, inoculation_NN would_MD cease_VB ._.
He_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO think_VB that_IN the_DT chief_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ declining_VBG to_TO take_VB service_NN were_VBD the_DT smallness_NN of_IN the_DT pay_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT restraint_NN of_IN being_VBG kept_VBN regularly_RB at_IN work_NN ._.
He_PRP mentioned_VBD having_VBG been_VBN told_VBN that_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS an_DT inoculator_NN would_MD make_VB hundreds_NNS of_IN rupees_NNS in_IN a_DT season_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT rich_JJ Zemindar_NNP frequently_RB gave_VBD him_PRP valuable_JJ presents_NNS for_IN inoculating_VBG his_PRP$ family_NN ._.
26_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO Gujerat_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD only_RB one_CD known_VBN inoculator_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP refused_VBD employment_NN as_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP no_DT case_NN of_IN inoculation_NN had_VBD come_VBN to_TO light_NN for_IN a_DT long_JJ period_NN while_IN in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP inoculators_NNS appeared_VBD to_TO confine_VB their_PRP$ work_NN to_TO the_DT Tanna_NNP collectorate_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD further_RBR reported_VBD that_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB only_RB men_NNS of_IN low_JJ caste_NN and_CC wholly_RB uneducated_JJ ,_, (_( xi_NN )_) Vaccination_NN by_IN Muni-_NNP cipalities_NNS ._.
29_CD ._.
Municipal_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD introduced_VBN in_IN 1863_CD ,_, is_VBZ gradually_RB making_VBG progress_NN ._.
The_DT plan_NN was_VBD suggested_VBN by_IN me_PRP as_IN being_VBG calculated_VBN to_TO identify_VB local_JJ municipal_JJ bodies_NNS with_IN efforts_NNS to_TO render_VB the_DT protective_JJ system_NN of_IN vac-_JJ cination_NN more_RBR extended_JJ ,_, efficient_JJ ,_, and_CC complete_JJ ._.
It_PRP was_VBD first_JJ brought_VBD into_IN operation_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Plumptre_NNP in_IN the_DT Sattara_NNP districts_NNS ,_, and_CC has_VBZ been_VBN extended_VBN by_IN him_PRP to_TO Gudduk_NNP and_CC Bettigherry_NNP in_IN the_DT Dharwar_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO Gokak_NNP in_IN the_DT Bel-_NNP gaum_NN collectorate_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS supported_VBN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN municipalities_NNS in_IN these_DT places_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Sattara_NNP districts_NNS ,_, has_VBZ increased_VBN to_TO eight_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS to_TO upwards_NNS of_IN 5,000_CD ._.
The_DT plan_NN has_VBZ succeeded_VBN better_RBR there_RB than_IN in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, a_DT circumstance_NN which_WDT is_VBZ mainly_RB attributable_JJ to_TO the_DT judicious_JJ and_CC active_JJ interest_NN taken_VBN in_IN the_DT subject_NN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ._.
30_CD ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ recently_RB been_VBN adopted_VBN in_IN Gujerat_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT municipality_NN of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP now_RB employs_VBZ two_CD vaccinators_NNS and_CC two_CD peons_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN of_IN Dakore_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Kaira_NNP collectorate_NN ,_, one_CD vaccinator_NN ._.
The_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT former_JJ town_NN by_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Wyllie_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT latter_NN by_IN that_DT of_IN Dr._NNP Dick_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP ._.
The_DT other_JJ municipalities_NNS in_IN the_DT Kaira_NNP collectorate_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO be_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: far_RB too_RB poor_JJ and_CC pressed_VBN for_IN funds_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO enable_VB them_PRP to_TO contribute_VB to_TO expenses_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT probability_NN of_IN arrangements_NNS being_VBG made_VBN for_IN the_DT engagement_NN of_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN by_IN the_DT municipalities_NNS of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT principal_JJ towns_NNS in_IN the_DT Ahmedabad_NNP collectorate_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB of_IN Sholapoor_NNP and_CC Beejapoor_NNP ._.
Municipal_JJ vaccination_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN introduced_VBN ,_, not_RB only_RB into_IN the_DT Sattara_NNP districts_NNS ,_, but_CC also_RB at_IN Hooblee_NNP ,_, Gudduk_NNP ,_, Bettigherry_NNP ,_, Belgaum_NNP ,_, Gokak_NNP ,_, Tanna_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ,_, Kotree_NNP ,_, Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, and_CC Dakore_NNP ._.
Character_NN of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN lymph_NN ._.
31_CD ._.
Except_IN in_IN Canara_NNP and_CC at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, the_DT vaccine_NN lymph_NN was_VBD well_RB reported_VBN on_IN throughout_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, the_DT resulting_VBG vesicles_NNS being_VBG generally_RB well-developed_JJ and_CC well-marked_JJ ._.
In_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD instances_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT there_EX appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB slight_JJ tendency_NN to_TO deterioration_NN ,_, fresh_JJ lymph_NN was_VBD immediately_RB procured_VBN and_CC introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP reports_NNS that_IN only_RB on_IN one_CD occasion_NN had_VBD he_PRP reason_NN to_TO find_VB fault_NN with_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN 1864_CD he_PRP received_VBD a_DT supply_NN from_IN England_NNP in_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD so_RB satisfactory_JJ that_IN he_PRP caused_VBD it_PRP to_TO be_VB spread_VBN over_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN with_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD exceptions_NNS all_DT his_PRP$ men_NNS are_VBP now_RB working_VBG with_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN Canara_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP found_VBD the_DT lymph_NN so_RB much_RB deteriorated_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD compelled_VBN to_TO suspend_VB work_NN ,_, until_IN a_DT fresh_JJ supply_NN had_VBD been_VBN obtained_VBN from_IN Belgaum_NNP and_CC Hooblee_NNP ._.
(_( xii_PRP )_) Want_VBP of_IN sufficient_JJ lymph_NN ,_, 32_CD ._.
Complaints_NNS have_VBP been_VBN received_VBN ,_, as_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT difficulty_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT few_JJ places_NNS ,_, of_IN keeping_VBG up_RP a_DT sufficient_JJ supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB always_RB ready_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP itself_PRP this_DT want_NN was_VBD recently_RB reported_VBN to_TO be_VB felt_VBN with_IN increasing_VBG pressure_NN ,_, owing_VBG mainly_RB to_TO the_DT strong_JJ repugnance_NN felt_VBN by_IN the_DT parents_NNS of_IN vaccinated_JJ children_NNS to_TO allow_VB lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN vac-_JJ cinating_VBG other_JJ children_NNS ,_, (_( xiii_NN )_) packet_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO report_VB the_DT result_NN ._.
Replies_NNS have_VBP already_RB been_VBN received_VBN from_IN four_CD of_IN these_DT officers_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP much_RB regret_VB to_TO state_NN that_IN ,_, although_IN the_DT lymph_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN used_VBN in_IN the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ manner_NN in_IN vaccinating_VBG both_DT Native_NNP and_CC European_JJ children_NNS ,_, failure_NN was_VBD the_DT result_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
So_RB anxious_JJ was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS to_TO meet_VB with_IN success_NN ,_, that_IN in_IN addition_NN to_TO making_VBG the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ selection_NN of_IN healthy_JJ children_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO taking_VBG the_DT usual_JJ precautions_NNS ,_, he_PRP actually_RB promised_VBD a_DT sum_NN of_IN money_NN to_TO each_DT of_IN the_DT parents_NNS of_IN those_DT children_NNS ,_, on_IN whose_WP$ arms_NNS a_DT true_JJ vesicle_NN should_MD appear_VB ._.
I_PRP would_MD therefore_RB again_RB very_RB earnestly_RB request_VB that_IN the_DT next_JJ supply_NN may_MD be_VB forwarded_VBN solely_RB in_IN tubes_NNS ._.
Vaccination_NN at_IN the_DT Presi-_NNP dency_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP passed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP on_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN ,_, some_DT re-_JJ marks_NNS were_VBD made_VBN on_IN the_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP town_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP was_VBD requested_VBN to_TO make_VB inquiry_NN on_IN the_DT point_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO suggest_VB how_WRB the_DT want_NN might_MD be_VB supplied_VBN ._.
In_IN accordance_NN with_IN these_DT instructions_NNS ,_, I_PRP communicated_VBD with_IN Dr._NNP Giraud_NNP ,_, then_RB Honorary_NNP Inspector_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, and_CC having_VBG ascertained_VBN his_PRP$ views_NNS ,_, I_PRP reported_VBD on_IN the_DT subject_NN to_TO Government_NNP ,_, the_DT result_NN being_VBG that_IN ,_, on_IN the_DT recommendation_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, sanctioned_VBD an_DT increase_NN from_IN three_CD to_TO six_CD ._.
37_CD ._.
It_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB be_VB well_RB to_TO place_VB on_IN record_NN ,_, in_IN this_DT place_NN ,_, a_DT few_JJ circumstances_NNS connected_VBN with_IN vaccination_NN at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, which_WDT led_VBD to_TO this_DT result_NN ._.
38_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN 1858_CD the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS was_VBD ten_VBN ,_, but_CC at_IN that_DT period_NN there_EX was_VBD no_DT paid_JJ Superintendent_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB not_RB that_IN active_JJ supervision_NN of_IN operations_NNS and_CC of_IN their_PRP$ results_NNS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD requisite_NN ._.
In_IN January_NNP 1859_CD ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT new_JJ scheme_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, which_WDT originated_VBD with_IN Dr._NNP Peet_NNP ,_, who_WP at_IN that_DT time_NN was_VBD the_DT Hono-_NNP rary_JJ Inspector_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
The_DT establishment_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS was_VBD reduced_VBN from_IN ten_NN to_TO six_CD ,_, and_CC a_DT Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeon_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN Superintendent_NNP ._.
Domiciliary_JJ vaccination_NN was_VBD put_VBN a_DT stop_NN to_TO ,_, and_CC vaccination_NN at_IN stations_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT direct_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, was_VBD introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT island_NN was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN six_CD districts_NNS ,_, to_TO each_DT of_IN which_WDT a_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD appointed_VBN ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT plan_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB reported_VBN on_IN after_IN three_CD years_NNS ._.
39_CD ._.
In_IN August_NNP 1859_CD ,_, however_RB ,_, eight_CD months_NNS after_IN its_PRP$ commencement_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, at_IN the_DT recommendation_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ Superintendent_NNP ,_, (_( which_WDT was_VBD approved_VBN of_IN by_IN the_DT Honorary_NNP Inspector_NNP )_) was_VBD reduced_VBN to_TO three_CD ,_, as_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT experience_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ six_CD months_NNS has_VBZ fully_RB shown_VBN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN (_( xiv_NNP )_) vaccinators_NNS now_RB attached_VBN to_TO the_DT establishment_NN is_VBZ greater_JJR than_IN what_WP is_VBZ actually_RB required_VBN ,_, seeing_VBG that_IN all_PDT the_DT vaccine_NN operations_NNS are_VBP performed_VBN by_IN the_DT Super-_NNP intendent._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: 40_CD ._.
In_IN January_NNP 1862_CD the_DT operation_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN was_VBD reported_VBN on_IN by_IN Dr._NNP Peet_NNP ,_, who_WP stated_VBD that_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS vac-_JJ cinated_VBD during_IN the_DT three_CD years_NNS ,_, now_RB reported_VBN on_IN ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT two_CD immediately_RB preceding_VBG periods_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ length_NN ,_, is_VBZ about_IN 2,000_CD ._.
If_IN this_DT had_VBD been_VBN the_DT sole_JJ result_NN of_IN the_DT reorganization_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD perhaps_RB be_VB viewed_VBN as_IN meagre_NN and_CC unsatisfactory_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ object_NN was_VBD a_DT trustworthy_JJ system_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD hoped_VBN that_IN this_DT would_MD not_RB be_VB incompatible_JJ with_IN the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN to_TO a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN persons._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Dr._NNP Peet_NNP then_RB added_VBD ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: there_EX is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, conclusive_JJ evidence_NN that_IN an_DT honest_NN and_CC trustworthy_JJ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN substituted_VBN for_IN one_CD that_WDT was_VBD unsatisfactory_JJ and_CC delusive_JJ ._.
It_PRP can_MD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB denied_VBN that_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT num-_JJ ber_NN vaccinated_VBN has_VBZ fallen_VBN short_JJ of_IN what_WP was_VBD anticipated._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: 41_CD ._.
This_DT was_VBD written_VBN in_IN 1862_CD ,_, since_IN which_WDT time_NN vaccination_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP has_VBZ not_RB materially_RB increased_VBN in_IN numbers_NNS ._.
Though_IN there_EX is_VBZ ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, a_DT bet-_JJ ter_NN feeling_NN than_IN formerly_RB towards_NNS vaccination_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB reached_VBN that_IN point_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT majority_NN of_IN parents_NNS will_MD ,_, unasked_JJ ,_, bring_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ in_IN consequence_NN required_VBN from_IN the_DT native_JJ vacci-_JJ nators_NNS a_DT large_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN in_IN finding_VBG out_RP children_NNS ,_, and_CC inducing_VBG their_PRP$ parents_NNS to_TO bring_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT stations_NNS ._.
42_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Giraud_NNP ,_, who_WP succeeded_VBD Dr._NNP Peet_NNP ,_, stated_VBD his_PRP$ opinion_NN that_IN three_CD vac-_JJ cinators_NNS were_VBD inadequate_JJ to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS required_VBN of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC which_WDT ,_, according_VBG to_TO existing_VBG rules_NNS ,_, are_VBP to_TO visit_VB as_RB many_JJ as_IN possible_JJ of_IN the_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT children_NNS ,_, who_WP have_VBP been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ,_, live_VBP ;_: to_TO bring_VB to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP every_DT instance_NN of_IN failure_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN irregularity_NN of_IN the_DT vesicle_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO make_VB himself_PRP acquainted_VBN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN may_MD be_VB practicable_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT num-_JJ ber_NN and_CC residences_NNS of_IN the_DT children_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ division_NN who_WP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN vaccin-_JJ ated_VBN ._.
He_PRP therefore_RB recommended_VBD that_IN as_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN six_CD districts_NNS ,_, each_DT with_IN its_PRP$ vaccinating_VBG station_NN ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB six_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, one_CD for_IN each_DT station_NN and_CC district_NN ._.
This_DT modification_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ recently_RB been_VBN carried_VBN into_IN effect_NN ._.
Assistance_NN from_IN Civil_NNP and_CC Political_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
43_CD ._.
It_PRP gives_VBZ me_PRP much_JJ pleasure_NN to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNPS ,_, gener-_JJ ally_NN ,_, express_VB their_PRP$ acknowledgments_NNS for_IN the_DT cordial_JJ support_NN they_PRP received_VBD from_IN the_DT Civil_NNP and_CC Political_NNP authorities_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Butler_NNP also_RB pointedly_RB mentions_NNS that_IN the_DT Native_NNP Chiefs_NNP in_IN Kattiawar_NNP gave_VBD him_PRP more_RBR assistance_NN than_IN during_IN any_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
(_( xv_NN )_) Services_NNPS of_IN Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS ._.
44_CD ._.
It_PRP likewise_RB affords_IN me_PRP great_JJ satisfaction_NN to_TO report_VB that_IN the_DT Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS ,_, without_IN a_DT single_JJ exception_NN ,_, worked_VBD throughout_IN the_DT year_NN with_IN a_DT diligence_NN and_CC earnestness_NN which_WDT could_MD not_RB be_VB surpassed_VBN ,_, and_CC which_WDT well_RB en-_JJ title_NN them_PRP to_TO the_DT favourable_JJ notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
Conduct_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS ._.
45_CD ._.
In_IN justice_NN to_TO the_DT body_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS ,_, it_PRP must_MD also_RB be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN ,_, with_IN a_DT few_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ conduct_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN highly_RB spoken_VBN of_IN by_IN the_DT Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS and_CC Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ._.
Reorganization_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.
46_CD ._.
Having_VBG now_RB concluded_VBN my_PRP$ statement_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT depart-_JJ ment_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, previous_JJ to_TO closing_VBG the_DT report_NN ,_, to_TO place_VB on_IN record_NN certain_JJ changes_NNS recently_RB made_VBD in_IN its_PRP$ organization_NN ._.
47_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB recollected_VBN that_IN in_IN 1861_CD the_DT department_NN was_VBD modified_VBN to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN reducing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccination_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Divisions_NNP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: into_IN which_WDT this_DT Presidency_NN was_VBD at_IN that_DT time_NN mapped_VBD out_RP ,_, from_IN eight_CD to_TO six_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN introducing_VBG Native_JJ Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeons_NNS as_IN Deputy_NNP Superintendents_VBZ a_DT post_NN which_WDT had_VBD not_RB previously_RB existed_VBN ._.
Two_CD divisions_NNS were_VBD in_IN con-_JJ sequence_NN absorbed_VBN into_IN others_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNPS ,_, who_WP were_VBD the_DT Superintendents_NNS ,_, were_VBD placed_VBN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN Army_NNP head_NN quarters_NNS ._.
Thus_RB the_DT Concan_NNP division_NN was_VBD broken_VBN up_RP and_CC added_VBD to_TO the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP districts_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT two_CD divisions_NNS in_IN Gujerat_NNP were_VBD united_VBN into_IN one_CD ._.
The_DT term_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Division_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: was_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN changed_VBD into_IN that_DT of_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Circle._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: 48_CD ._.
With_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN compensating_VBG for_IN this_DT loss_NN of_IN European_JJ supervision_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD intended_VBN by_IN Government_NNP that_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT three_CD most_RBS extensive_JJ Circles_NNS should_MD be_VB provided_VBN with_IN two_CD Deputy_JJ Superintendents_NNS ._.
Their_PRP$ chief_JJ duties_NNS were_VBD to_TO assist_VB the_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, to_TO explain_VB to_TO the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT districts_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT they_PRP might_MD be_VB employed_VBN ,_, the_DT objects_NNS and_CC benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO encourage_VB its_PRP$ diffusion_NN by_IN persuasion_NN and_CC by_IN all_DT other_JJ legitimate_JJ means_NNS ._.
49_CD ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN was_VBD made_VBN by_IN Government_NNP during_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN my_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB on_IN his_PRP$ recommendation_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, Dr._NNP Rooke_NNP maintained_VBD that_IN to_TO diminish_VB the_DT amount_NN of_IN European_JJ agency_NN was_VBD to_TO impair_VB the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.
50_CD ._.
As_IN mentioned_VBN in_IN previous_JJ reports_NNS ,_, the_DT new_JJ system_NN worked_VBD badly_RB ._.
The_DT Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeons_NNP disliked_VBD the_DT nature_NN of_IN their_PRP$ new_JJ appointments_NNS ,_, even_RB though_IN carrying_VBG with_IN them_PRP increased_VBD emoluments_NNS ._.
The_DT main_JJ objection_NN on_IN (_( xvi_NN )_) the_DT part_NN of_IN some_DT was_VBD the_DT necessity_NN of_IN the_DT almost_RB constant_JJ travelling_NN which_WDT was_VBD involved_VBN ,_, while_IN to_TO others_NNS the_DT duty_NN was_VBD distasteful_JJ as_IN estranging_VBG them_PRP from_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN the_DT profession_NN for_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN educated_VBN ._.
51_CD ._.
On_IN one_CD occasion_NN ,_, in_IN particular_JJ ,_, very_RB convincing_VBG proof_NN was_VBD given_VBN of_IN this_DT strong_JJ dislike_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN filling_VBG up_RP some_DT vacancies_NNS in_IN the_DT post_NN of_IN Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, I_PRP found_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB how_WRB many_JJ Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeons_NNS ,_, then_RB employed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT mofussil_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN Dispensaries_NNS ,_, would_MD voluntarily_RB enter_VB the_DT depart-_JJ ment_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN showed_VBD that_IN ten_VBZ out_IN of_IN twelve_NN declined_VBD ,_, while_IN before_RB long_RB the_DT two_CD ,_, who_WP did_VBD enter_NN ,_, begged_VBD to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO resign_VB ._.
52_CD ._.
The_DT scheme_NN thus_RB proving_VBG an_DT entire_JJ failure_NN ,_, it_PRP became_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO lay_VB the_DT subject_NN before_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD the_DT abolition_NN of_IN these_DT appointments_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT modified_JJ return_NN to_TO the_DT system_NN which_WDT was_VBD in_IN operation_NN before_IN they_PRP were_VBD made_VBN ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT Circles_NNP were_VBD accordingly_RB re-arranged_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN European_JJ agency_NN was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO the_DT extent_NN to_TO be_VB now_RB stated_VBN ._.
53_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD mentioned_VBN ,_, in_IN paragraph_NN 47_CD ,_, that_IN the_DT two_CD divisions_NNS ,_, formerly_RB existing_VBG in_IN Gujerat_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN united_VBN into_IN one_CD ._.
I_PRP did_VBD not_RB propose_VB to_TO disturb_VB that_DT arrangement_NN by_IN dividing_VBG the_DT province_NN again_RB into_IN two_CD ,_, because_IN in_IN the_DT meantime_NN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP had_VBD been_VBN sanctioned_VBN for_IN the_DT Gujerat_NNP Bheel_NNP Corps_NNP at_IN Dohud_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD nominated_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vacci-_NNP nation_NN in_IN the_DT Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP and_CC Punch_NNP Mahals_NNP ,_, the_DT former_JJ of_IN which_WDT had_VBD previously_RB formed_VBN part_NN of_IN the_DT united_JJ Gujerat_NNP Division_NNP ,_, its_PRP$ extent_NN had_VBD in_IN consequence_NN been_VBN considerably_RB reduced_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB not_RB considered_VBN too_RB great_JJ for_IN efficient_JJ supervision_NN by_IN one_CD Superintendent_NNP ,_, particularly_RB at_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS was_VBD ,_, and_CC still_RB is_VBZ ,_, insufficient_JJ to_TO meet_VB ,_, adequately_RB ,_, even_RB the_DT ordinary_JJ requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP and_CC Military_JJ departments_NNS ._.
54_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD different_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, which_WDT embraced_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ,_, Southern_NNP Maratha_NNP Country_NNP ,_, and_CC Concan_NNP ._.
The_DT great_JJ extent_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT Circles_NNS rendered_VBD it_PRP impossible_JJ for_IN a_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, however_RB zealous_JJ and_CC energetic_JJ ,_, to_TO effect_NN that_IN thorough_JJ supervision_NN over_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO exercise_VB that_DT strict_JJ personal_JJ insight_NN into_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ so_RB essentially_RB necessary_JJ ._.
55_CD ._.
I_PRP therefore_RB suggested_VBD that_IN these_DT two_CD Circles_NNS should_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN three_CD ,_, by_IN separating_VBG from_IN them_PRP the_DT collectorates_NNS of_IN Tanna_NNP and_CC Rutnagherry_NNP (_( xvii_NNP )_) and_CC the_DT Sawunt_NNP Waree_NNP State_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN forming_VBG these_DT into_IN a_DT third_JJ ._.
Circum-_JJ stances_NNS did_VBD not_RB at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, nor_CC do_VBP they_PRP now_RB ,_, admit_NN of_IN more_RBR being_VBG done_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN sub-division_NN ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN ,_, at_IN some_DT future_JJ time_NN ,_, means_NNS may_MD be_VB found_VBN for_IN still_RB further_JJ reducing_VBG the_DT extent_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT larger_JJR Circles_NNP ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN the_DT smaller_JJR the_DT district_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, the_DT greater_JJR would_MD be_VB his_PRP$ opportunities_NNS for_IN more_RBR closely_RB and_CC repeatedly_RB inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN his_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS ,_, (_( xviii_NNP )_) 58_CD ._.
Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Blanc_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN appointed_VBN Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT new_JJ Western_JJ Circle_NNP ,_, but_CC as_IN he_PRP is_VBZ detained_VBN on_IN special_JJ duty_NN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Political_JJ Resident_NN at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Department_NNP is_VBZ at_IN pre-_JJ sent_NN too_RB weak_JJ in_IN numbers_NNS to_TO admit_VB of_IN an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP being_VBG spared_VBN to_TO officiate_VB ,_, the_DT new_JJ arrangements_NNS are_VBP in_IN abeyance_NN pending_VBG Dr._NNP Blanc_NNP 's_POS arrival_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NNP ,_, M._NNP STOVELL_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Principal_NNP Inspector_NNP General_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP ,_, 31st_CD March_NNP ,_, 1866_CD ._.
(_( xix_NN )_) INDEX_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP FOLLOWING_NNP REPORTS_NNP ._.
VACCINATION_NNP UNDER_NNP SUPERINTENDENTSVACCINATION_NNP UNDER_NNP SUPERINTENDENTS_NNP ._.
CENTRAL_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.2_NN With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT indifference_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC want_NN of_IN assistance_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN many_JJ Patels_NNP and_CC Koolkurnees_NNP ,_, few_JJ obstacles_NNS exist_VBP to_TO the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
But_CC this_DT very_RB indifference_NN which_WDT in_IN Pabul_NNP ,_, Bhimthurree_NNP ,_, and_CC eastern_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT Jooneer_NNP and_CC Khair_NNP talookas_NN of_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP of_IN Poona_NNP ,_, almost_RB amounts_NNS to_TO opposition_NN ,_, leads_VBZ very_RB much_JJ to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ deterioration_NN of_IN lymph_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP often_RB wondered_VBN at_IN and_CC admired_VBD the_DT way_NN in_IN which_WDT many_JJ vaccinators_NNS keep_VBP up_RP their_PRP$ vaccine_NN lymph_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ done_VBN only_RB by_IN much_JJ travelling_NN and_CC hard_JJ work_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, were_VBD vaccination_JJ compulsory_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB very_RB much_JJ diminished_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ compulsory_JJ in_IN Britain_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN Mamlutdars_NNP and_CC other_JJ native_JJ officials_NNS have_VBP informed_VBN me_PRP ,_, and_CC as_IN is_VBZ proved_VBN by_IN all_DT castes_NNS submitting_VBG their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, that_IN no_DT religious_JJ or_CC other_JJ objection_NN exists_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB see_VB any_DT reasons_NNS against_IN ,_, but_CC every_DT thing_NN in_IN favor_NN of_IN ,_, making_VBG it_PRP compulsory_JJ in_IN India_NNP also_RB ._.
Of_IN this_DT I_PRP am_VBP certain_JJ ,_, that_IN until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ made_VBN so_RB ,_, natives_NNS will_MD never_RB have_VB the_DT faith_NN in_IN it_PRP they_PRP ought_MD to_TO ._.
That_DT prejudices_VBZ against_IN vaccination_NN do_VBP exist_VB amongst_VB the_DT native_JJ population_NN is_VBZ well_RB known_VBN ._.
A_DT most_RBS intelligent_JJ man_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Ruttonjee_NNP Nowrojee_NNP ,_, Catechist_NNP of_IN the_DT Church_NNP Missionary_NNP Society_NNP stationed_VBD at_IN Yeola_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Ahmednuggur_NNP districts_NNS ,_, has_VBZ ,_, in_IN a_DT communication_NN to_TO me_PRP ,_, given_VBN a_DT very_RB remarkable_JJ instance_NN of_IN one_CD ;_: I_PRP give_VBP it_PRP in_IN Mr._NNP Ruttonjee_NNP 's_POS own_JJ words_NNS ,_, he_PRP says_VBZ :_: &_CC quot_NN ;_: A_NNP ridiculous_JJ report_NN has_VBZ been_VBN spread_VBN by_IN some_DT fanatical_JJ Mahomedans_NNS that_IN some_DT remarkable_JJ personage_NN is_VBZ to_TO make_VB his_PRP$ appearance_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN during_IN the_DT latter_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP will_MD be_VB known_VBN by_IN milk_NN oozing_VBG out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ arm_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN blood_NN ,_, when_WRB vaccinated_VBN ,_, Hence_NNP Europeans_NNPS ,_, say_VBP they_PRP ,_, being_VBG anxious_JJ to_TO discover_VB that_DT extraordinary_JJ being_VBG ,_, lavish_VB so_RB much_JJ money_NN and_CC labour_NN in_IN persuading_VBG the_DT people_NNS to_TO vaccinate_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS ._.
Vaccine_NNP tubes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN extensively_RB used_VBN in_IN transmitting_VBG lymph_NN by_IN post_NN to_TO persons_NNS both_DT in_IN and_CC out_IN of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP have_VBP generally_RB been_VBN filled_VBN by_IN myself_PRP ._.
During_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN it_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO distribute_VB a_DT few_JJ tubes_NNS to_TO each_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC call_VB for_IN one_CD ,_, filled_VBN and_CC and_CC sealed_VBD ,_, monthly_RB ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN a_DT prize_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT person_NN who_WP ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, has_VBZ best_JJS succeeded_VBN in_IN filling_NN ,_, sealing_NN ,_, and_CC packing_VBG them_PRP ,_, for_IN transmission_NN by_IN post_NN ._.
The_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN will_MD also_RB be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN in_IN awarding_VBG the_DT prize_NN ._.
The_DT tour_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT very_RB extended_JJ one_CD ._.
It_PRP includes_VBZ all_PDT the_DT Ahmed-_NNP nuggur_NN ,_, nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Collectorate_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT Collectorates_NNP of_IN Kulladghee_NNP and_CC Khandeish_NNP ._.
From_IN Churchun_NNP in_IN the_DT Kulladghee_NNP Collectorate_NNP I_PRP proceeded_VBD castwards_NNS inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
168_CD ,_, which_WDT though_IN small_JJ in_IN amount_NN ,_, was_VBD exceedingly_RB well_RB executed_VBN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ books_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, were_VBD correct_JJ and_CC well_RB kept_VB ,_, I_PRP then_RB crossed_VBD the_DT river_NN Bheema_NNP into_IN the_DT State_NNP of_IN Akulkote_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Raja_NNP 's_POS vaccinator_NN here_RB employed_VBN I_PRP reported_VBD very_RB unfavorably_RB in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ to_TO say_VB more_JJR here_RB than_IN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD removed_VBN ,_, on_IN my_PRP$ recommendation_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT Rajah_NNP ,_, and_CC another_DT appointed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN ._.
From_IN Mr._NNP Burjorjee_NNP the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Akulkote_NNP ,_, I_PRP then_RB ,_, and_CC have_VBP since_IN ,_, received_VBD much_JJ and_CC very_RB intelligent_JJ assistance_NN ,_, and_CC but_CC for_IN this_DT I_PRP am_VBP sure_JJ the_DT small_JJ number_NN vaccinated_VBN would_MD have_VB been_VBN much_JJ smaller_JJR ._.
From_IN Akulkote_NNP I_PRP travelled_VBN by_IN stages_NNS direct_JJ to_TO Marheh_NNP viâ_FW Shola-_NNP poor_JJ and_CC Mohol_NNP ,_, there_EX being_VBG no_DT vaccinator_NN employed_VBD between_IN those_DT two_CD places_NNS ._.
Learning_VBG the_DT fact_NN that_IN no_DT vaccinator_NN had_VBD been_VBN employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Sholapoor_NNP Hawele_NNP talooka_NN for_IN several_JJ years_NNS ,_, I_PRP immediately_RB made_VBD arrangements_NNS for_IN one_CD being_VBG sent_VBN ,_, and_CC this_DT man_NN has_VBZ been_VBN successfully_RB working_VBG there_RB during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN February_NNP I_PRP made_VBD the_DT circuit_NN of_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN Marheh_NNP and_CC Kurmulla_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Sholapoor_NNP Sub-collectorate_NNP ,_, and_CC examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
23_CD and_CC 223_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN these_DT vaccinators_NNS was_VBD very_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, but_CC especially_RB that_IN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, though_IN quite_RB a_DT young_JJ man_NN ,_, I_PRP consider_VBP one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ and_CC expert_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN March_NNP I_PRP left_VBD Kurmulla_NNP 3_CD and_CC travelled_VBD through_IN the_DT Kurjut_NNP ,_, Jamkher_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Nuggur_NNP Hawele_NNP talooka_NN ._.

13_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT other_JJ talookas_NN the_DT recent_JJ work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
215_CD and_CC 237_CD ._.
In_IN paragraph_NN 10_CD I_PRP have_VBP already_RB alluded_VBN to_TO the_DT incorrect-_JJ ness_NN of_IN the_DT Returns_NNP of_IN 13_CD and_CC 215_CD in_IN regard_NN to_TO age_NN ._.
In_IN other_JJ respects_NNS the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.

Leaving_VBG Ahmed-_NNP nuggur_NN ,_, where_WRB I_PRP was_VBD detained_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN sickness_NN ,_, I_PRP ,_, in_IN April_NNP ,_, examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
237_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG part_NN of_IN the_DT Nuggur_NNP Hawele_NNP talooka_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
160_CD ,_, 201_CD ,_, and_CC 110_CD in_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN Rahoorie_NNP and_CC Newasee_NNP ;_: Nos_NNP ._.

But_CC that_DT of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
201_CD was_VBD not_RB so_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP recommended_VBD his_PRP$ removal_NN from_IN the_DT service_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD acted_VBN on_IN ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP I_PRP visited_VBD the_DT Sungumner_NNP and_CC Ankola_NNP talookas_NN of_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP of_IN Ahmednuggur_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Jooneer_NNP talooka_NN of_IN the_DT Poona_NNP Collectorate_NNP ,_, and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
53_CD ,_, 207_CD ,_, and_CC 37_CD ;_: the_DT former_JJ was_VBD moderately_RB correct_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_JJ two_CD very_RB correct_JJ ,_, and_CC lymph_RB good_JJ and_CC active_JJ ._.
After_IN inspecting_VBG a_DT few_JJ villages_NNS in_IN the_DT Khair_NNP talooka_NN ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.

40_CD and_CC 263_CD ,_, employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Hawele_NNP talooka_NN around_IN Poona_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP I_PRP went_VBD to_TO Nassick_NNP to_TO inquire_VB regarding_VBG the_DT Penth_NNP vaccinator_NN who_WP has_VBZ since_IN died_VBN ._.
Having_VBG determined_VBN to_TO visit_VB and_CC inspect_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Collect-_NNP orate_NN of_IN Khandeish_NNP ,_, I_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN November_NNP last_JJ ,_, went_VBD by_IN train_NN to_TO Nassick_NNP ,_, thence_NN by_IN stages_NNS to_TO Nephar_NNP and_CC Yeola_NNP ,_, inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
225_CD and_CC 13_CD en_IN route_NN ._.
Both_DT were_VBD satisfactory_JJ ._.
During_IN December_NNP I_PRP inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
214,144,13_CD ,_, and_CC 269_CD in_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN Neola_NNP and_CC Chandore_NNP ._.

Having_VBG finished_VBN the_DT examination_NN of_IN these_DT I_PRP left_VBD the_DT Ahmednuggur_NNP Collectorate_NNP and_CC entered_VBD that_IN of_IN Khandeish_NNP ,_, and_CC travelled_VBD through_IN ,_, and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
225_CD and_CC 60_CD employed_VBN in_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN Baglan_NNP and_CC Malligaum_NNP ._.
Both_DT were_VBD in_IN a_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ state_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN I_PRP have_VBP travelled_VBN 1,837_CD miles_NNS ,_, examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN 21_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, visited_VBD 395_CD villages_NNS ,_, and_CC inspected_VBD 31,587_CD children_NNS ._.
Thus_RB it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN for_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN whose_WP$ work_NN I_PRP inspected_VBD I_PRP visited_VBD 19_CD villages_NNS ,_, a_DT number_NN sufficient_NN to_TO give_VB a_DT very_RB good_JJ idea_NN of_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT children_NNS inspected_VBD 12,373_CD had_VBD been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ,_, 10,949_CD had_VBD been_VBN attacked_VBN and_CC were_VBD marked_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ._.
and_CC the_DT remainder_NN 8,267_CD were_VBD found_VBN unprotected_JJ ._.

SIR_NNP ,_, (_( iv_NN )_) Parsee_NNP medical_JJ gentleman_NN not_RB in_IN the_DT service_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Turnbull_NNP was_VBD acting_VBG Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP at_IN Ahmednuggur_NNP from_IN the_DT 2nd_CD of_IN April_NNP to_TO the_DT 29th_CD of_IN December_NNP ,_, during_IN which_WDT time_NN no_DT active_JJ superintendence_NN of_IN work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN ._.
In_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Plumptre_NNP proceeded_VBD to_TO Europe_NNP on_IN furlough_NN in_IN March_NNP ,_, the_DT appointment_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB filled_VBN up_RP by_IN Surgeon_NNP H._NNP Day_NNP ._.
The_DT Western_JJ Circle_NNP was_VBD ,_, throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, without_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN its_PRP$ Superintendent_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Blanc_NNP ,_, still_RB absent_VB on_IN special_JJ duty_NN in_IN Abyssinia_NNP ;_: the_DT southern_JJ portion_NN of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP is_VBZ somewhat_RB im-_JJ portant_NN in_IN a_DT vaccination_NN point_NN of_IN view_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP affords_VBZ a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT recruits_NNS for_IN the_DT Native_NNP Army_NNP and_CC for_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Police_NNP force_NN ,_, it_PRP also_RB sends_VBZ annually_RB a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT labouring_NN classes_VBZ to_TO the_DT various_JJ works_NNS in_IN and_CC around_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP extends_VBZ from_IN Bancote_NNP to_TO the_DT Sawunt_NNP Warree_NNP State_NNP in_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD under_IN the_DT charge_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
The_DT northern_JJ part_NN extends_VBZ from_IN Rewadunda_NNP to_TO the_DT Portuguese_JJ Settlement_NNP of_IN Damaun_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD under_IN the_DT charge_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
The_DT want_NN of_IN superintendence_NN has_VBZ been_VBN felt_VBN in_IN this_DT division_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Kattiawar_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Butler_NNP was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO proceed_VB home_NN on_IN Medical_NNP Certificate_NNP in_IN August_NNP ._.

6_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT termination_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT Superintendents_NNPS were_VBD (_( v_NN )_) general_JJ result_NN ,_, for_IN though_IN there_EX were_VBD eighteen_JJ additional_JJ hands_NNS at_IN work_NN ,_, their_PRP$ vaccinations_NNS did_VBD not_RB number_NN so_RB much_RB as_IN half_PDT the_DT above_JJ increment_NN ._.

12_CD ._.
The_DT operations_NNS performed_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS ,_, give_VB a_DT mean_JJ percentage_NN of_IN success_NN of_IN 92.7_CD ,_, the_DT maximum_JJ being_VBG 99.3_CD at_IN Kolapoor_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT minimum_JJ 56.1_CD at_IN Bandora_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeon_NNP there_RB ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, 351,935_CD were_VBD entered_VBN as_IN successful_JJ ._.
The_DT Superintendents_NNPS pronounce_NN favourably_RB on_IN the_DT accuracy_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS as_IN verified_VBN by_IN them_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ tours_NNS ._.
A_DT few_JJ exceptions_NNS only_RB to_TO their_PRP$ truthfulness_NN were_VBD ascertained_VBN ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD followed_VBN by_IN dismissal_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
Under_IN watchful_JJ superintendence_NN ,_, regular_JJ checking_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS '_POS registers_NNS ,_, the_DT timely_JJ assist-_JJ ance_NN rendered_VBN to_TO them_PRP by_IN the_DT native_JJ district_NN authorities_NNS in_IN the_DT general_JJ progress_NN of_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT knowledge_NN that_IN dismissal_NN follows_VBZ detection_NN ,_, the_DT practice_NN of_IN falsification_NN of_IN returns_NNS has_VBZ much_RB decreased_VBN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN males_NNS to_TO females_NNS vaccinated_VBN is_VBZ much_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD 205,156_CD males_NNS and_CC 174,341_CD females_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT vaccinations_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, arranged_VBD according_VBG to_TO caste_NN ,_, are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( vii_NN )_) in_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Division_NNP and_CC the_DT Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP 60.3_CD in_IN the_DT former_JJ and_CC 62.3_CD per-_JJ cent_NN ._.
in_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
This_DT bears_VBZ out_RP the_DT remark_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Dick_NNP who_WP ,_, in_IN the_DT year_NN 1863_CD ,_, stated_VBN &_CC quot_NN ;_: that_IN the_DT unwillingness_NN to_TO submit_VB young_JJ infants_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ observed_VBN elsewhere_RB ,_, is_VBZ rarely_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN Guzerat._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: 17_CD ._.
The_DT immense_JJ utility_NN of_IN successful_JJ vaccination_NN in_IN infancy_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB too_RB much_JJ impressed_VBN on_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
One_CD Superintendent_NNP (_( Northern_NNP Division_NNP ,_, Guzerat_NNP )_) has_VBZ remarked_VBN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: one_CD is_VBZ struck_VBN at_IN once_RB with_IN the_DT general_JJ freedom_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT marks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN and_CC other_JJ deformities_NNS ,_, produced_VBN by_IN theis_JJ disease_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT young_JJ population_NN ,_, while_IN among_IN the_DT old_JJ inhabitants_NNS are_VBP seen_VBN the_DT scarred_JJ ,_, blind_NN and_CC the_DT otherwise_RB horribly_RB deformed_VBN by_IN this_DT loathsome_JJ scourge._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: In_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Shikarpore_NNP under_IN Mr._NNP Ffolliott_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ paid_VBN particular_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT perfect_JJ vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD vaccinated_JJ 98_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
under_IN one_CD year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ greatly_RB to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP itself_PRP vaccination_NN under_IN one_CD year_NN is_VBZ not_RB more_RBR extensively_RB carried_VBN on_IN ,_, 40.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
only_RB being_VBG vaccinated_VBN below_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ._.

18_CD ._.
The_DT lymph_NN ,_, or_CC vaccine_NN virus_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN ascertained_VBN by_IN the_DT Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS and_CC officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN to_TO have_VB been_VBN generally_RB of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ._.

19_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

18_CD ._.

Something_VBG must_MD be_VB done_VBN ;_: these_DT are_VBP dangerous_JJ centres_NNS of_IN a_DT loathsome_NN and_CC virulent_NN disease_NN which_WDT may_MD or_CC may_MD not_RB spread_VB over_IN the_DT whole_JJ country_NN ,_, causing_VBG death_NN and_CC devastation_NN on_IN its_PRP$ track_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, in_IN nine_CD cases_NNS out_IN of_IN ten_NN ,_, the_DT cause_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS local_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ._.

15_CD SIND_NNP DIVISION_NNP ._.
Superintendent16_NNP 2_CD ._.

3_CD ._.
Another_DT thing_NN I_PRP would_MD notice_RB in_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT gradual_JJ effect_NN which_WDT the_DT spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ produced_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN very_RB strong_JJ evidence_NN of_IN the_DT Sindhis_NNP knowing_NN well_RB what_WP the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN is_VBZ still_RB only_RB too_RB evident_JJ that_IN thousands_NNS of_IN people_NNS submit_VBP their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN merely_RB because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT wish_NN of_IN Government_NNP that_IN they_PRP should_MD do_VB so_RB ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ faith_NN is_VBZ very_RB strong_JJ in_IN Government_NNP doing_VBG every_DT thing_NN for_IN their_PRP$ good_JJ ;_: on_IN account_NN of_IN this_DT faith_NN it_PRP is_VBZ seldom_RB that_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS meet_VBP with_IN any_DT opposition_NN ,_, and_CC 17_CD seldom_NNS indeed_RB with_IN persistent_JJ opposition_NN any_DT where_WRB in_IN carrying_VBG on_IN their_PRP$ operations_NNS ,_, though_IN they_PRP have_VBP a_DT thankless_JJ office_NN to_TO perform_VB ,_, and_CC one_CD which_WDT requires_VBZ the_DT exercise_NN of_IN a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN persuasion_NN :_: to_TO persuade_VB the_DT ignorant_NN is_VBZ often_RB no_DT easy_JJ matter_NN ,_, especially_RB when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP something_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, inoculation,18_JJ vaccinator_NN vaccinated_VBD 541_CD males_NNS and_CC 431_CD females_NNS ,_, being_VBG 55.48_CD and_CC 44.51_CD respectively_RB in_IN every_DT 100_CD ._.
These_DT three_CD establishments_NNS differ_VBP so_RB very_RB slightly_RB in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT relative_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS that_WDT one_CD would_MD be_VB inclined_VBN on_IN that_DT evidence_NN ,_, to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS have_VBP given_VBN the_DT correct_JJ relative_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT male_NN and_CC female_JJ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT fact_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT relative_JJ proportion_NN is_VBZ not_RB correct_JJ ,_, for_IN I_PRP have_VBP during_IN my_PRP$ inspections_NNS repeatedly_RB found_VBD female_JJ children_NNS entered_VBN in_IN the_DT male_JJ column_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP have_VBP never_RB found_VBN a_DT male_JJ child_NN entered_VBN in_IN the_DT female_JJ column.-_NN On_IN this_DT account_NN I_PRP believe_VBP these_DT figures_NNS are_VBP not_RB entirely_RB correct_JJ ,_, not_RB with_IN standing_VBG the_DT strong_JJ evidence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ correctness_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT chief_JJ reason_NN why_WRB there_EX are_VBP always_RB so_RB many_JJ more_JJR males_NNS than_IN females_NNS is_VBZ that_IN there_EX are_VBP very_RB few_JJ of_IN the_DT latter_NN vaccinated_VBD after_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN six_CD years_NNS ,_, because_IN many_JJ females_NNS of_IN that_DT age_NN are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB out_RP in_IN public_JJ ,_, especially_RB among_IN Hindoos_NNP ,_, whereas_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT such_JJ hindrance_NN to_TO males_NNS --_: The_DT late_JJ Dr._NNP Ritchie_NNP drew_VBD my_PRP$ attention_NN to_TO this_DT circumstance_NN as_IN the_DT likeliest_JJS reason_NN for_IN the_DT disparity_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP now_RB that_IN he_PRP was_VBD correct_JJ ,_, still_RB the_DT fact_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO me_PRP that_IN female_JJ children_NNS are_VBP entered_VBN occasionally_RB in_IN the_DT male_JJ column_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX are_VBP certainly_RB no_RB objections_NNS to_TO vaccinate_VB young_JJ female_JJ children_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP often_RB see_VBP adult_JJ Hindoo_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN Mussulman_NNP women_NNS who_WP have_VBP submitted_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ._.
9_CD ._.

10_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD vaccinated_VBN 15,601_CD under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ and_CC 53,094_CD above_IN that_DT age_NN ,_, being_VBG 22.71_CD under_IN and_CC 77.28_CD above_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ in_IN every_DT 100_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP sorry_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN I_PRP consider_VBP the_DT columns_NN of_IN ages_NNS untrustworthy_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT impression_NN left_VBD on_IN my_PRP$ mind_NN after_IN inspecting_VBG nearly_RB 8,000_CD vaccinated_JJ children_NNS last_JJ year_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBN under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ought_MD to_TO have_VB been_VBN very_RB much_JJ larger_JJR in_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS '_POS returns_NNS ,_, probably_RB nearly_RB double_RB what_WP has_VBZ been_VBN reported_VBN ._.

247_CD ,_, Shankat_NNP Rai_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT Nusseerabad_NNP talooka_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinator_NN Jani_NNP Mull_NNP was_VBD examined_VBN and_CC found_VBN satisfactory_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Larkhana_NNP I_PRP marched_VBD to_TO Mehur_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT intention_NN of_IN inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
230_CD Allah_NNP Buksh_NNP in_IN the_DT talooka_NN of_IN Mchur_NNP ,_, but_CC found_VBD him_PRP dying_VBG in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP there_EX :_: he_PRP died_VBD a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS after_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN ._.
Thence_NN passed_VBD on_IN to_TO Tigr_NNP talooka_NN to_TO inspect_VB local_JJ vaccinator_NN Hasso_NNP Mull_NNP 's_POS work_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN examining_VBG his_PRP$ records_NNS ,_, I_PRP saw_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD in_IN a_DT measure_NN falsified_VBN ,_, I_PRP bluntly_RB accused_VBD him_PRP of_IN falsification_NN and_CC pointed_VBD out_RP from_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ weekly_JJ reports_NNS that_IN his_PRP$ register_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB correct_JJ ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP his_PRP$ faults_NNS chiefly_VBP arose_RB from_IN laziness_NN and_CC carelessness_NN ;_: I_PRP dismissed_VBD him_PRP from_IN the_DT local_JJ establishment_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD only_RB been_VBN employed_VBN in_IN a_DT talooka_NN by_IN himself_PRP four_CD months_NNS ._.
From_IN Mehur_NNP district_NN I_PRP passed_VBD down_RB into_IN Sehwan_NNP district_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN Sehwan_NNP and_CC Dadoo_NNP examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinator_NN Rughu_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, with_IN which_WDT I_PRP was_VBD tolerably_RB well_RB satisfied_VBN ;_: his_PRP$ lymph_NN was_VBD good_JJ but_CC his_PRP$ records_NNS contained_VBD some_DT errors_NNS in_IN the_DT sexes_NNS and_CC ages_NNS columns_VBP regarding_VBG which_WDT I_PRP cautioned_VBD him_PRP ;_: they_PRP were_VBD of_IN a_DT very_RB minor_JJ description_NN and_CC such_JJ as_IN a_DT little_RB more_JJR care_NN could_MD have_VB prevented_VBN ._.
I_PRP also_RB examined_VBD some_DT work_NN in_IN the_DT talookas_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
77_CD ,_, Jettah_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD it_PRP satisfactory_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP I_PRP received_VBD temporary_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP at_IN Kotree_NNP from_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP McConneli_NNP ,_, and_CC handed_VBD them_PRP over_RP to_TO Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Colvill_NNP in_IN May_NNP ;_: during_IN the_DT month_NN I_PRP did_VBD all_DT I_PRP could_MD to_TO further_VB vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC neighbourhood_NN of_IN Kotree_NNP ._.
In_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
148_CD ,_, Lalloo_NNP ,_, in_IN Doaba_NNP talooka_NN of_IN Hydrabad_NNP collectorate_NN and_CC also_RB in_IN Kotree_NNP talooka_NN ._.
This_DT vaccinator_NN carried_VBD on_IN work_NN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT river_NN for_IN a_DT few_JJ months_NNS on_IN account_NN of_IN my_PRP$ having_VBG received_VBN a_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN and_CC about_IN Kotree_NNP ,_, at_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT Municipal_NNP vaccinator_NN had_VBD been_VBN dismissed_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, but_CC on_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN in_IN Kotree_NNP I_PRP only_RB found_VBD measles_NNS and_CC chicken-pox_NN ._.
I_PRP found_VBD Lalloo_NNP 's_POS work_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP always_RB has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, in_IN every_DT way_NN highly_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN May_NNP in_IN the_DT Jurruck_NNP districts_NNS the_DT work_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinator_NN Choteer_NNP Mull_NNP was_VBD examined_VBN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD not_RB so_RB well_RB done_VBN as_IN it_PRP might_MD have_VB been_VBN ;_: this_DT man_NN 's_POS house_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Tatta_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN going_VBG too_RB often_RB to_TO it_PRP to_TO the_DT neglect_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duty_NN ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ since_IN been_VBN dismissed_VBN for_IN losing_VBG his_PRP$ lymph_NN and_CC not_RB exerting_VBG himself_PRP to_TO obtain_VB other_JJ lymph_JJ 24_CD from_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT Indus_NNP ,_, within_IN a_DT few_JJ miles_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ working_VBG ground_NN ._.
From_IN Jurruck_NNP district_NN I_PRP crossed_VBD into_IN Shahbunder_NNP district_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Beyla_NNP talooka_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinator_NN Nubby_NNP Bux_NNP was_VBD inspected_VBN ._.
One_CD day_NN 's_POS lymph_NN was_VBD bad_JJ ,_, next_JJ day_NN 's_POS good_JJ :_: there_EX was_VBD a_DT strong_JJ hot_JJ wind_NN blowing_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, which_WDT Nubby_NNP Bux_NNP said_VBD was_VBD the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT deterioration_NN of_IN his_PRP$ lymph_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP observed_VBD that_IN such_PDT a_DT general_JJ cause_NN would_MD have_VB made_VBN both_DT day_NN 's_POS equally_RB bad_JJ ._.
The_DT fact_NN was_VBD he_PRP had_VBD vaccinated_VBN one_CD village_NN in_IN the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, under_IN a_DT strong_JJ hot_JJ wind_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT cool_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ morning_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT hot_JJ months_NNS the_DT operations_NNS should_MD all_DT be_VB performed_VBN in_IN the_DT cool_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ morning_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT probabilities_NNS will_MD be_VB many_JJ against_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS being_VBG good_JJ and_CC well_RB developed_VBN ._.
I_PRP ordered_VBD him_PRP to_TO vaccinate_VB in_IN the_DT early_JJ morning_NN only_RB throughout_IN the_DT hot_JJ season_NN ._.
During_IN June_NNP and_CC July_NNP I_PRP saw_VBD about_RB 360_CD vaccinated_JJ children_NNS in_IN 28_CD villages_NNS ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN Lalloo_NNP ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP of_IN Kotree_NNP 's_POS vaccinator_NN ,_, Majlis_NNP Rai_NNP ,_, and_CC local_JJ vaccinator_NN Ramzan_NNP in_IN the_DT Doaba_NNP and_CC Kotree_NNP talookas_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN August_NNP I_PRP went_VBD to_TO Kurrachee_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN inspecting_VBG work_NN on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT Mulleer_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN by_IN local_JJ vaccinator_NN Ram_NNP Chund_NNP ._.

In_IN other_JJ respects_NNS his_PRP$ records_NNS were_VBD quite_RB correct_JJ and_CC very_RB neatly_RB kept_VBN ,_, so_RB on_IN the_DT whole_NN I_PRP was_VBD satisfied_VBN with_IN him_PRP ._.

294_CD ,_, Jani_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT talooka_NN of_IN Nusseerabad_NNP ._.
25_CD The_DT marks_NNS were_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.

19_CD ._.
I_PRP tested_VBD closely_RB the_DT work_NN of_IN six_CD Government_NNP and_CC nine_CD local_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC also_RB examined_VBD ,_, without_IN testing_VBG the_DT records_NNS ,_, some_DT work_NN of_IN three_CD more_JJR Govern-_JJ ment_NN vaccinators_NNS ,_, one_CD Municipal_NNP vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD apothecary_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT dis-_JJ pensary_NN ;_: in_IN all_DT nineteen_JJ individuals_NNS '_POS work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN examined_VBN by_IN myself_PRP ._.

165,142_CD ,_, 199_CD ,_, 195_CD ,_, 246_CD and_CC 250_CD ._.
He_PRP pursued_VBD the_DT same_JJ method_NN as_IN myself_PRP ,_, viz._FW ,_, calling_VBG the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccinated_JJ children_NNS over_IN from_IN the_DT registers_NNS ._.

I_PRP examined_VBD 7,919_CD vaccinated_JJ children_NNS in_IN 377_CD villages_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN I_PRP travelled_VBD 1,452_CD miles_NNS between_IN encampments_NNS ._.
Assoo_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, 2nd_CD Assistant_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, examined_VBD in_IN the_DT Kurrachee_NNP Collectorate_NNP the_DT work_NN of_IN local_JJ vaccinators_NNS Chotecr_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, Nubby_NNP Bux_NNP ,_, and_CC Sookanund_NNP ._.

To_TO give_VB an_DT idea_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN gone_VBN over_IN in_IN inspecting_NN and_CC superintending_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necccssary_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN one_CD man_NN 's_POS work_NN was_VBD examined_VBN at_IN the_DT extreme_JJ end_NN of_IN the_DT Thur_NNP and_CC Parkur_NNP district_NN ,_, another_DT 's_POS on_IN the_DT Jeysulmeer_NNP boundary_JJ beyond_IN Kessrah_NNP ,_, a_DT third_JJ 's_POS in_IN Oobaora_NNP talooka_NN on_IN the_DT Bhawulpoor_NNP boundary_NN ,_, a_DT fourth_JJ 's_POS near_IN the_DT Murree_NNP hills_NNS ,_, a_DT fifth_NN 's_POS in_IN the_DT Cutchee_NNP between_IN Jacobabad_NNP and_CC the_DT hills_NNS to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN that_DT station_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT sixth_JJ 's_POS in_IN Kohistan_NNP ._.
I_PRP can_MD say_VB that_IN neither_DT myself_PRP nor_CC Hassah_NNP Mull_NNP have_VBP spared_VBN any_DT trouble_NN or_CC labour_NN in_IN trying_VBG to_TO spread_VB vaccination_NN to_TO the_DT utmost_JJ limits_NNS of_IN this_DT province_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN in_IN such_JJ remote_JJ talookas_NN we_PRP have_VBP shown_VBN the_DT vaccinators_NNS that_IN their_PRP$ remoteness_NN will_MD not_RB protect_VB them_PRP from_IN detection_NN should_MD they_PRP falsify_VB their_PRP$ records_NNS or_CC do_VBP any_DT other_JJ wrong_JJ thing_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
When_WRB I_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT Jacobabad_NNP district_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Bolton_NNP called_VBD a_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT Zemindars_NNP ,_, Mukhis_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ influential_JJ residents_NNS of_IN the_DT Sarhad_NNP talooka_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD held_VBN in_IN one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ tents_NNS on_IN the_DT 29th_CD of_IN January_NNP 1866_CD ,_, at_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Thoul_NNP ._.
The_DT meeting_NN was_VBD well_RB attended_VBN by_IN the_DT Zemindars_NNP ,_, Mukhis_NNP ,_, and_CC Patels_NNP of_IN villages_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Bolton_NNP and_CC I_PRP spoke_VBD to_TO the_DT meeting_NN on_IN the_DT subjects_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, inoculation_NN ,_, v4_FW 26_CD and_CC small-pox_NNS ;_: they_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB highly_RB interested_JJ ,_, freely_RB asked_VBN questions_NNS about_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC appeared_VBD quite_RB ready_JJ to_TO accept_VB it_PRP ,_, which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP since_IN done_VBN ._.
21_CD ._.
Before_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN in_IN Jacobabad_NNP district_NN ,_, Lieutenant_NNP Colonel_NNP Malcolm_NNP Green_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Political_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN that_DT frontier_NN ,_, had_VBD very_RB kindly_RB given_VBN a_DT purwana_NN to_TO Luchmon_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Bolton_NNP had_VBD given_VBN one_CD to_TO Kishen_NNP Chund_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN writing_VBG my_PRP$ last_JJ Annual_JJ Report_NNP I_PRP was_VBD ignorant_NN of_IN these_DT purwanas_NNS having_VBG been_VBN granted_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Sarhad_NNP talooka_NN had_VBD asked_VBN for_IN Assoo_NNP Mull_NNP 's_POS authority_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB ,_, I_PRP considered_VBD it_PRP advisable_JJ to_TO recommend_VB that_IN a_DT Sindhi_NNP Circular_NNP should_MD be_VB issued_VBN to_TO all_DT Zemindars_NNP ,_, Native_NNP officials_NNS and_CC other_JJ influential_JJ persons_NNS ,_, setting_VBG forth_NN all_PDT the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Mansfield_NNP ,_, on_IN receiving_VBG my_PRP$ recommendation_NN ,_, was_VBD pleased_JJ to_TO give_VB instructions_NNS for_IN such_PDT a_DT Circular_JJ to_TO be_VB issued_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD so_RB ,_, with_IN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP reason_NN to_TO believe_VB ,_, satisfaction_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS and_CC benefit_NN to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB pleasing_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT Jacobabad_NNP district_NN has_VBZ been_VBN once_RB gone_VBN over_RP in_IN less_JJR than_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, after_IN remaining_VBG all_DT but_CC untouched_VBD for_IN nearly_RB twenty_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ complaint_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN against_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS by_IN any_DT one_CD ._.
22_CD ,_, With_IN only_RB two_CD exceptions_NNS ,_, the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB good_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP have_VBP carried_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ duties_NNS in_IN a_DT creditable_JJ manner_NN ._.
The_DT two_CD exceptions_NNS were_VBD Wuttun_NNP Mull_NNP and_CC Chellah_NNP Ram_NNP ,_, regarding_VBG whom_WP I_PRP received_VBD from_IN the_DT Mookhtiarkar_NNP of_IN Methe_NNP a_DT complaint_NN of_IN their_PRP$ taking_VBG children_NNS with_IN vesicles_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ arms_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG from_IN them_PRP from_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ to_TO other_JJ villages_NNS in_IN an_DT uncourteous_JJ and_CC rude_JJ manner_NN ._.
I_PRP requested_VBD Major_NNP Tyrwhitt_NNP to_TO do_VB me_PRP the_DT favour_NN of_IN investigating_VBG into_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ;_: he_PRP very_RB kindly_RB did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN those_DT two_CD vaccinators_NNS had_VBD been_VBN rather_RB zealous_JJ and_CC inconsiderate_JJ ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB consider_VB them_PRP deserving_VBG of_IN dismissal_NN from_IN the_DT service_NN ._.
Major_JJ Tyrwhitt_NNP subsequently_RB did_VBD me_PRP the_DT favour_NN to_TO inform_VB me_PRP that_IN he_PRP had_VBD looked_VBN at_IN some_DT of_IN Chellah_NNP Ram_NNP 's_POS work_NN in_IN the_DT Nuggur_NNP Parkur_NNP talooka_NN and_CC that_IN be_VB considered_VBN it_PRP well_RB done_VBN ._.
Under_IN these_DT favorable_JJ circumstances_NNS I_PRP merely_RB cautioned_VBD those_DT two_CD men_NNS to_TO be_VB extremely_RB careful_JJ that_IN their_PRP$ conduct_NN be_VB always_RB courteous_JJ ,_, that_IN they_PRP pay_VBP parents_NNS fully_RB for_IN their_PRP$ loss_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP very_RB much_RB indebted_VBN to_TO Major_NNP Tyrwhitt_NNP for_IN the_DT active_JJ interest_NN he_PRP takes_VBZ in_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN his_PRP$ Political_JJ Superintendency_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT aid_NN he_PRP is_VBZ at_IN all_DT times_NNS so_RB ready_JJ and_CC willing_JJ to_TO give_VB me_PRP ._.
The_DT Head_NNP Vaccinator_NNP ,_, Hassah_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ also_RB 1st_CD Assistant_NNP Superintendent_NNP in_IN the_DT local_JJ establishment_NN ,_, has_VBZ done_VBN remarkably_RB good_JJ service_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN superintending_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN in_IN Hydrabad_NNP collectorate_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT Thur_NNP and_CC Parkur_NNP districts_NNS ._.
23_CD ._.

prevalence_NN of_IN small-_JJ pox_NN ,_, can_MD have_VB had_VBN little_JJ influence_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN that_DT disease_NN was_VBD happily_RB rare_JJ in_IN and_CC around_IN Sattara_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN question_NN ._.

1465_CD ,_, dated_VBD 3rd_CD May_NNP 1867_CD ,_, submitting_VBG his_PRP$ Annual_JJ Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN the_DT Bom-_NNP bay_NN Presidency_NNP ,_, including_VBG Sind_NNP ,_, for_IN 1866_CD ._.
RESOLUTION.xvi_NNP worthy_JJ returns_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB overrated_VBN ,_, and_CC Government_NNP trust_NN that_IN the_DT subject_NN will_MD always_RB be_VB kept_VBN in_IN prominent_JJ view_NN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
Mea-_JJ sures_NNS have_VBP recently_RB been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO ensure_VB this_DT information_NN being_VBG accurately_RB and_CC punctually_RB furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT several_JJ village_NN Officers_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT facts_NNS stated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Arnott_NNP in_IN paragraphs_NN 15_CD to_TO 17_CD of_IN his_PRP$ report_NN re-_NN garding_VBG infantile_JJ vaccination_NN are_VBP encouraging_VBG ._.
In_IN some_DT parts_NNS the_DT percentage_NN has_VBZ risen_VBN higher_JJR than_IN during_IN the_DT preceding_VBG season_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Shikarpoor_NNP the_DT rate_NN was_VBD 98_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, the_DT highest_JJS rate_NN ever_RB before_IN recorded_VBN ;_: for_IN which_WDT satisfactory_JJ result_NN great_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO Dr._NNP Ffolliott_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN that_DT place_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN the_DT Town_NNP and_CC Island_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP infantile_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB progressing_VBG so_RB satisfactorily_RB as_IN could_MD be_VB wished_VBN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS vaccinated_VBN under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN amounted_VBD to_TO 40_CD ½_NNS per_IN cent_NN ._.
only_RB during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Government_NNP also_RB regret_VBD to_TO observe_VB the_DT increase_NN in_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT casualties_NNS being_VBG nearly_RB double_RB those_DT in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Arnott_NNP should_MD be_VB particularly_RB requested_VBN to_TO give_VB his_PRP$ best_JJS and_CC early_JJ consideration_NN to_TO the_DT subject_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT question_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT advisability_NN or_CC otherwise_NN of_IN making_VBG inoculation_JJ penal_JJ ,_, is_VBZ now_RB engaging_VBG the_DT attention_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO forward_VB an_DT increased_JJ supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN tubes_NNS only_RB ,_, as_IN requested_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 21_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT Right_NNP Honorable_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP has_VBZ much_RB pleasure_NN in_IN re-_JJ cording_VBG his_PRP$ sense_NN of_IN the_DT praiseworthy_JJ exertions_NNS of_IN the_DT Native_NNP Chiefs_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT several_JJ Municipalities_NNS noticed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Arnott_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
