No_DT ._.
1406_CD OF_IN 1868_CD ._.
Bombay_NNP ,_, 27th_CD April_NNP 1868_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT INSPECTOR_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To_TO the_DT CHIEF_NNP SECRETARY_NNP to_TO GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, (_( iv_NN )_) Excellency_VBD the_DT Commander-in-Chief_NNP for_IN employment_NN in_IN Abyssinia_NNP ._.
The_DT Regiment_NNP to_TO which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN did_VBD not_RB proceed_VB during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, being_VBG under_IN orders_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ active_JJ superintendence_NN ceased_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ appointment_NN to_TO military_JJ duty_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
In_IN Sind_NNP Surgeon_NNP Pinkerton_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN Superintendent_NNP since_IN 1863_CD ,_, was_VBD required_VBN in_IN March_NNP to_TO take_VB up_RP temporarily_RB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP at_IN Kotree_NNP ._.
This_DT did_VBD not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, much_RB interfere_VB with_IN his_PRP$ superintendence_NN in_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT interruption_NN was_VBD not_RB of_IN long_JJ duration_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP nothing_NN interfered_VBD to_TO arrest_VB the_DT progress_NN of_IN superintendence_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Western_JJ Circle_NNP ,_, as_IN mentioned_VBN in_IN previous_JJ Reports_NNS ,_, the_DT super-_JJ vision_NN was_VBD divided_VBN between_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD almost_RB ineffective_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT appointment_NN was_VBD given_VBN ,_, in_IN 1865_CD ,_, to_TO Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Blanc_NNP while_IN in_IN Abyssinia_NNP ,_, but_CC since_IN his_PRP$ nomination_NN to_TO it_PRP the_DT superintendence_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN of_IN an_DT active_JJ character_NN ,_, as_IN Doctors_NNS Day_NNP and_CC Turnbull_NNP have_VBP had_VBN as_IN much_JJ or_CC more_JJR than_IN they_PRP could_MD attend_VB to_TO in_IN traversing_VBG their_PRP$ own_JJ Circles_NNS ._.
The_DT Western_JJ Circle_NNP has_VBZ a_DT long_JJ tract_NN of_IN sea-coast_NN ,_, dotted_VBN with_IN numerous_JJ ports_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB important_JJ that_NNS ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS are_VBP available_JJ ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB a_DT Superintendent_JJ working_NN in_IN its_PRP$ districts_NNS ._.
Situated_VBN in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Concan_NNP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT territory_NN of_IN the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: Hubshee_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO which_WDT I_PRP alluded_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ Report_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT I_PRP again_RB mention_NN as_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT vaccination_NN carried_VBD on_IN in_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ close_JJ to_TO Bombay_NNP ,_, with_IN which_WDT city_NN there_EX is_VBZ constant_JJ intercourse_NN ._.
Small-pox_NNP is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO be_VB frequent_JJ in_IN Hubshan_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Concan_NNP is_VBZ a_DT Native_JJ State_NNP named_VBD &_CC quot_NN ;_: Jowar_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: ,_, the_DT Raja_NNP of_IN which_WDT ,_, I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO state_NN ,_, has_VBZ desired_VBN that_IN a_DT Vaccinator_NNP may_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP and_CC Punch_NNP Mahals_NNP the_DT supervision_NN extends_VBZ over_IN only_RB four_CD months_NNS of_IN each_DT year_NN :_: it_PRP was_VBD complete_JJ for_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN Kattiawar_NNP it_PRP was_VBD incomplete_JJ ._.
Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Blomfield_NNP carried_VBD it_PRP on_IN with_IN activity_NN for_IN four_CD months_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP itself_PRP the_DT superintendence_NN by_IN the_DT Local_NNP Superin-_NNP tendent_NN was_VBD unbroken_JJ ._.
Remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT superin-_JJ tendence_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB observed_VBN from_IN the_DT above_NN that_IN the_DT vaccination_NN superinten-_JJ dence_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN so_RB active_JJ and_CC close_JJ as_IN could_MD be_VB desired_VBN ._.
As_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT essential_JJ part_NN of_IN a_DT system_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ proved_VBN itself_PRP to_TO be_VB the_DT best_JJS suited_VBN to_TO the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN it_PRP should_MD over_RB be_VB weak_JJ (_( v_NN )_) ened_VBD in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT emergencies_NNS of_IN the_DT general_JJ service_NN ._.
Being_VBG fully_RB convinced_VBN of_IN the_DT positive_JJ good_JJ done_VBN by_IN Superintendents_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT necessity_NN there_EX always_RB is_VBZ for_IN active_JJ and_CC unbroken_JJ supervision_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB but_CC hope_VBP that_IN in_IN future_JJ no_DT need_NN will_MD exist_VB for_IN withdrawing_VBG these_DT officers_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
Circles_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT Circles_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP throughout_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ Superintendents_NNS ,_, were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( vi_NN )_) remain_VBP about_IN four_CD hundred_NNS and_CC ten_NNS thousand_VBP to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ;_: so_CC that_IN if_IN the_DT present_JJ rate_NN was_VBD continued_VBN there_RB would_MD probably_RB not_RB be_VB more_JJR than_IN twenty_CD thousand_NNS who_WP year_NN by_IN year_NN would_MD go_VB unvaccinated_JJ in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP ._.

(_( xvii_NN )_) Value_NNP of_IN infantile_JJ vac-_JJ cination_NN ._.

40_CD ._.

43_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP the_DT registration_NN of_IN births_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Act_NNP ,_, gives_VBZ no_DT idea_NN of_IN what_WP the_DT vaccination_NN requirements_NNS are_VBP ._.

This_DT would_MD be_VB a_DT most_RBS gratifying_JJ result_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT registration_NN shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN births_NNS to_TO population_NN is_VBZ only_RB about_RB 7_CD per_IN thousand_NN ;_: whereas_CC the_DT acknowledged_JJ rate_NN to_TO population_NN is_VBZ about_RB 30_CD to_TO 33_CD per_IN thousand_NN ._.

67_CD ._.

The_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Pahlunpoor_NNP and_CC Mahee_NNP Kanta_NNP is_VBZ also_RB attributable_JJ to_TO similar_JJ causes_NNS ._.
Vaccination_NN was_VBD not_RB carried_VBN on_IN at_IN Rhadunpoor_NNP for_IN five_CD months_NNS (_( from_IN April_NNP to_TO August_NNP inclusive_NN )_) ._.
In_IN Deodur_NNP Talooka_NNP no_DT work_NN was_VBD done_VBN in_IN November_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP was_VBD on_IN leave_NN ._.
One_CD Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Mahee_NNP Kanta_NNP lost_VBD his_PRP$ lymph_NN during_IN the_DT rains_NNS ;_: a_DT fresh_JJ supply_NN was_VBD sent_VBN from_IN Surat_NNP ,_, but_CC nearly_RB one_CD month_NN was_VBD lost_VBN before_IN he_PRP could_MD commence_VB work_NN again_RB ._.
4_CD ._.
Notwithstanding_VBG this_DT decrease_NN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ progressing_VBG satis-_JJ factorily_RB in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ,_, for_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT steady_JJ increase_NN each_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS vaccinated_VBN under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ,_, as_IN is_VBZ seen_VBN from_IN the_DT following_VBG table_JJ :8_JJ 7_CD ._.
Only_RB one_CD supply_NN of_IN fresh_JJ lymph_NN from_IN England_NNP was_VBD received_VBN ,_, towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD tried_VBN on_IN two_CD young_JJ and_CC unprotected_JJ children_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT result_NN was_VBD unsuccessful_JJ ._.
8_CD ._.
Among_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS of_IN this_DT establishment_NN the_DT following_JJ changes_NNS occurred_VBD :_: the_DT Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Rhadunpoor_NNP was_VBD dismissed_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN inefficiency_NN and_CC misconduct_NN ;_: Apprentice_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Bhikumbhai_NNP Bholoobhai_NNP (_( General_NNP No_NNP ._.
270_CD )_) ,_, of_IN Morasa_NNP ,_, was_VBD also_RB dismissed_VBN ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN sending_VBG false_JJ entries_NNS ;_: Apprentice_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Peerkhan_NNP Mahomedkhan_NNP (_( General_NNP No_NNP ._.
273_CD )_) ,_, of_IN Gogo_NNP ,_, resigned_VBD the_DT Service_NNP of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ;_: and_CC Assistant_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Venaik_NNP Janardhun_NNP (_( General_NNP No_NNP ._.
47_CD )_) ,_, of_IN Oolpar_NNP ,_, was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO retire_VB from_IN the_DT Service_NNP ._.
All_PDT the_DT vacancies_NNS were_VBD filled_VBN up_RP in_IN due_JJ time_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT Rhadunpoor_NNP Vaccinatorship_NNP ,_, to_TO fill_VB which_WDT a_DT young_JJ man_NN of_IN industrious_JJ habits_NNS was_VBD sent_VBN ,_, but_CC His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Nawab_NNP of_IN Rhadunpoor_NNP objected_VBD to_TO confirm_VB him_PRP ._.
Much_JJ time_NN was_VBD lost_VBN (_( nearly_RB five_CD months_NNS )_) in_IN correspondence_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC ultimately_RB the_DT then_RB Political_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Pahlunpoor_NNP took_VBD upon_RP himself_PRP the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN filling_VBG up_RP the_DT vacancy_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS of_IN the_DT whole_JJ Circle_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN them_PRP are_VBP hardworking_VBG and_CC industrious_JJ ;_: there_EX are_VBP a_DT few_JJ men_NNS of_IN bad_JJ character_NN and_CC indolent_JJ habits_NNS :_: these_DT are_VBP being_VBG gradually_RB weeded_VBN out_RP ._.
10_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN small-pox_NN prevailed_VBN in_IN nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT Divisions_NNP of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ._.
Whilst_NNP I_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT Pahlunpoor_NNP States_NNPS ,_, in_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, I_PRP accidentally_RB came_VBD to_TO know_VB of_IN the_DT breaking_VBG out_IN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Tehrwara_NNP (_( talooka_JJ Deodur_NNP )_) and_CC the_DT neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS ._.
Within_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS 140_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN ,_, yet_RB no_DT intimation_NN of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN was_VBD given_VBN by_IN the_DT Thakore_NNP or_CC the_DT other_JJ village_NN officials_NNS to_TO the_DT Vaccinator_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO the_DT Political_JJ Superintendent_NN himself_PRP ._.
The_DT Vaccinator_NNP of_IN the_DT talooka_NN was_VBD able_JJ soon_RB to_TO introduce_VB lymph_NN into_IN Tehrwara_NNP and_CC commence_NN operations_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT mis-_JJ chief_NN was_VBD already_RB done_VBN ,_, for_IN he_PRP could_MD find_VB only_RB a_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN children_NNS to_TO vaccinate_VB ._.
The_DT negligence_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN officials_NNS was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Political_NNP Super-_NNP intendent_NN of_IN Pahlunpoor_NNP ._.
In_IN Mahee_NNP Kanta_NNP it_PRP prevailed_VBD in_IN the_DT hot_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN many_JJ talookas_NN ;_: difficulty_NN was_VBD felt_VBN in_IN sending_VBG our_PRP$ men_NNS to_TO all_PDT the_DT places_NNS where_WRB it_PRP prevailed_VBD ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN there_EX being_VBG only_RB four_CD Vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT whole_JJ zilla_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD represented_VBN to_TO the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, who_WP readily_RB assented_VBD to_TO the_DT addition_NN of_IN a_DT fifth_JJ Vaccinator_NNP ._.
The_DT new_JJ man_NN commenced_VBD work_NN in_IN October_NNP last_JJ ._.
At_IN Patree_NNP and_CC Mundal_NNP ,_, two_CD remote_JJ portions_NNS of_IN talooka_NN Veerumgaum_NNP ,_, it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP suddenly_RB in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ;_: no_DT time_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB lost_VBN ,_, for_IN all_DT at_IN once_RB reports_NNS reached_VBD me_PRP of_IN its_PRP$ outbreak_NN from_IN the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, from_IN the_DT Mamlutdars_NNP ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN from_IN our_PRP$ Vaccinators_NNS ,_, who_WP asked_VBD for_IN an_DT extra_JJ hand_NN ._.
The_DT nearest_JJS Vaccinator_NN of_IN Sanund_NNP promptly_RB obeyed_VBD orders_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN two_CD working_VBG men_NNS the_DT outbreak_NN soon_RB subsided_VBD ._.
In_IN the_DT Kaira_NNP Districts_VBZ it_PRP prevailed_VBD to_TO a_DT very_RB small_JJ extent_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Broach_NNP and_CC Surat_NNP Districts_NNP reports_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ existence_NN were_VBD received_VBN from_IN such_JJ places_NNS as_IN were_VBD chiefly_NNS inhabited_VBN by_IN Kolies_NNP (_( fishermen_NNS )_) ._.
9_CD 11_CD ._.
With_IN small-pox_JJ measles_NNS also_RB prevailed_VBD as_IN an_DT epidemic_NN in_IN almost_RB all_DT parts_NNS of_IN this_DT Division_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS it_PRP was_VBD so_RB very_RB fatal_JJ ,_, from_IN secondary_JJ chest_NN affections_NNS and_CC dysenteric_JJ purging_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS devoutly_RB wished_VBD the_DT Sirkar_NNP (_( Government_NNP )_) would_MD find_VB out_RP some_DT remedy_NN for_IN Ooree_NNP (_( measles_NNS )_) as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN for_IN Devi_NNP Matta_NNP (_( small-pox_JJ )_) ._.
12_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Mahee_NNP Kanta_NNP States_NNPS ,_, whilst_VBP inspecting_VBG the_DT Malpoor_NNP Talooka_NNP ,_, I_PRP noticed_VBD that_IN in_IN many_JJ villages_NNS the_DT people_NNS dreaded_VBD mine_NN and_CC the_DT Vaccinators_NNP '_POS approach_NN ,_, and_CC oftentimes_NNS hours_NNS were_VBD lost_VBN before_IN the_DT children_NNS could_MD be_VB collected_VBN for_IN inspection_NN or_CC vaccination_NN ._.

13_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

12_CD 8_CD ._.
I_PRP will_MD now_RB state_NN briefly_NN the_DT result_NN of_IN my_PRP$ inquiries_NNS in_IN the_DT Broach_NNP Districts_NNPS ._.

In_IN none_NN of_IN these_DT could_MD I_PRP find_VB a_DT single_JJ child_NN with_IN marks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT child_NN that_WDT was_VBD said_VBD to_TO have_VB had_VBN small-pox_NNS at_IN all_DT ,_, however_RB mild_NN ._.

The_DT more_JJR one_CD inquires_VBZ into_IN this_DT subject_NN the_DT more_JJR it_PRP becomes_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN small-pox_NN breaks'out_IN only_RB in_IN such_JJ villages_NNS as_IN have_VBP hitherto_VBN resisted_VBN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN to_TO them_PRP ._.
Even_RB at_IN so_RB recent_JJ a_DT date_NN as_IN December_NNP last_JJ ,_, it_PRP broke_VBD out_RP in_IN two_CD large_JJ villages_NNS of_IN the_DT Jumboosur_NNP Talooka_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, Sarode_NNP and_CC Kavee,14_NNP local_JJ establishments_NNS would_MD exceed_VB 60,000_CD per_IN annum_NN ;_: for_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD years_NNS after_IN the_DT creation_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ establishment_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 1865_CD and_CC 1866_CD ,_, the_DT total_JJ vaccinations_NNS did_VBD considerably_RB exceed_VB that_IN number_NN ,_, being_VBG respectively_RB 62,415_CD and_CC 67,720_CD ;_: but_CC the_DT arrears_NNS of_IN unprotected_JJ children_NNS in_IN the_DT province_NN have_VBP been_VBN worked_VBN up_RP faster_RBR than_IN I_PRP anticipated_VBD ,_, as_IN is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT chief_JJ cause_NN of_IN the_DT decrease_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, is_VBZ the_DT reduced_JJ number_NN of_IN unprotected_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT province_NN ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ also_RB another_DT reason_NN which_WDT deserves_VBZ notice_NN :_: it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN many_JJ thinly-populated_JJ parts_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP have_VBP been_VBN more_RBR carefully_RB gone_VBN over_IN than_IN it_PRP was_VBD formerly_RB possible_JJ to_TO do_VB with_IN the_DT inadequate_JJ number_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT Government_NNP establishment_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT men_NNS employed_VBN in_IN those_DT parts_NNS have_VBP done_VBN much_RB less_RBR work_NN than_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
Still_RB I_PRP am_VBP not_RB quite_RB satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP establishment_NN ,_, and_CC think_VBP a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP could_MD have_VB done_VBN more_JJR work_NN by_IN a_DT little_RB more_JJR exertion_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP worth_VBZ while_IN to_TO say_VB something_NN here_RB on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT numbers_NNS which_WDT ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, may_MD be_VB annually_RB available_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Sind_NNP in_IN future_JJ years_NNS ._.
I_PRP may_MD say_VB that_IN this_DT question_NN has_VBZ engaged_VBN my_PRP$ best_JJS attention_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN gathering_VBG information_NN to_TO arrive_VB at_IN a_DT conclusion_NN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ;_: but_CC to_TO enable_VB me_PRP to_TO give_VB a_DT correct_JJ answer_NN to_TO it_PRP ,_, I_PRP should_MD require_VB much_RB more_RBR precise_JJ information_NN than_IN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ obtainable_JJ from_IN any_DT source_NN whatsoever_NN ;_: in_IN fact_NN ,_, precise_JJ information_NN does_VBZ not_RB exist_VB ._.
However_RB ,_, my_PRP$ own_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN is_VBZ now_RB considerable_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP received_VBN such_JJ information_NN as_IN the_DT Revenue_NNP and_CC Political_JJ Officers_NNS are_VBP able_JJ to_TO give_VB me_PRP ._.
To_TO start_VB with_IN then_RB ,_, I_PRP estimate_VBP the_DT population_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, including_VBG the_DT Khyr-_NNP poor_JJ State_NNP ,_, at_IN 2,500,000_CD ._.
But_CC the_DT populations_NNS of_IN the_DT Sudder_NNP Stations_NNS are_VBP not_RB vacci-_JJ nated_VBN by_IN my_PRP$ men_NNS ;_: there_EX is_VBZ a_DT Vaccinator_NNP under_IN each_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, who_WP provides_VBZ for_IN the_DT wants_VBZ of_IN his_PRP$ station_NN ;_: the_DT medical_JJ subordinates_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN Dispensaries_NNP vaccinate_NN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP stationed_VBN ._.
His_PRP$ Highness_NNP Meer_NNP Ali_NNP Murad_NNP has_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ Vaccinator_NNP ;_: the_DT Kotree_NNP Municipality_NNP maintains_VBZ a_DT Vaccinator_NNP for_IN Kotree_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ environs_NNS ,_, and_CC there_EX are_VBP some_DT vaccinations_NNS done_VBN at_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP of_IN Jacobabad_NNP ;_: these_DT com-_NNS bined_VBD provided_VBN for_IN about_IN 500,000_CD of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, thus_RB leaving_VBG 2,000,000_CD to_TO be_VB pro-_JJ vided_VBN for_IN by_IN my_PRP$ Vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT annual_JJ births_NNS in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 2,000,000_CD ,_, taking_VBG the_DT birth-rate_NN at_IN 1_CD in_IN 30_CD per_IN annum_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB 66,666_CD ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO vaccinate_VB all_DT who_WP are_VBP born_VBN ,_, because_IN there_EX are_VBP (_( a_DT )_) still-births_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) deaths_NNS which_WDT occur_VBP in_IN (_( say_VBP )_) two_CD years_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ about_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN time_NN which_WDT should_MD elapse_VB between_IN the_DT visits_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ;_: (_( c_NN )_) children_NNS protected_VBN by_IN natural_JJ small-pox_NN ;_: and_CC (_( d_NN )_) children_NNS who_WP from_IN various_JJ causes_NNS do_VBP not_RB come_VB under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB I_PRP over-estimate_JJ these_DT at_IN ten_NNS per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: thus_RB reducing_VBG the_DT available_JJ children_NNS for_IN my_PRP$ establishments_NNS to_TO 60,000_CD per_IN annum_NN :_: and_CC now_RB that_IN the_DT arrears_NNS have_VBP been_VBN worked_VBN off_RP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT maximum_JJ average_JJ number_NN that_WDT can_MD be_VB annu-_JJ ally_NN ,_, for_IN any_DT given_VBN series_NN of_IN years_NNS ,_, vaccinated_VBN by_IN the_DT men_NNS under_IN me_PRP ._.
And_CC ,_, arguing_VBG in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN ,_, the_DT average_JJ maximum_JJ total_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS ,_, from_IN all_DT sources_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT 15_CD province_NN should_MD be_VB 75,000_CD per_IN annum_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB expect_VB that_IN the_DT maximum_NN will_MD be_VB constantly_RB obtained_VBN in_IN future_JJ years_NNS ,_, for_IN it_PRP never_RB has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN years_NNS past_RB ._.
The_DT area_NN of_IN Sind_NNP ,_, by_IN recent_JJ returns_NNS obtained_VBN from_IN the_DT Revenue_NNP and_CC Political_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, is_VBZ shown_VBN to_TO be_VB 52,555_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, taking_VBG its_PRP$ population_NN at_IN 2,500,000_CD ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ an_DT average_NN of_IN 47.5_CD persons_NNS to_TO the_DT square_NN mile_NN ._.
The_DT mass_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ located_VBN within_IN twenty_JJ miles_NNS of_IN the_DT river_NN Indus_NNP ,_, on_IN both_DT banks_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT talookas_NN at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN more_JJR than_IN twenty_NN miles_NNS from_IN the_DT river_NN are_VBP much_RB less_RBR populous_JJ than_IN the_DT average_JJ above_JJ mentioned_VBN :_: for_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT Thur_NNP and_CC Parkur_NNP Talookas_NNP contain_VBP about_IN 15,000_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC have_VBP only_RB a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN 200,000_CD ,_, or_CC 13_CD persons_NNS to_TO the_DT square_NN mile_NN :_: again_RB ,_, in_IN Kohistan_NNP there_EX are_VBP 2,693_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC 2,645_CD inha-_JJ bitants_NNS ,_, or_CC less_JJR than_IN one_CD person_NN to_TO the_DT square_NN mile_NN :_: and_CC in_IN the_DT Kurrachee_NNP Talooka_NNP ,_, there_EX are_VBP 1,292_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, exclusive_JJ of_IN Kurrachee_NNP town_NN ,_, only_RB 7,199_CD inhabitants_NNS ,_, or_CC 5.5_CD to_TO the_DT square_NN mile_NN ._.
If_IN we_PRP exclude_VBP these_DT very_RB thinly_RB populated_JJ parts_NNS from_IN the_DT averages_NNS ,_, the_DT rest_NN of_IN Sind_NNP has_VBZ about_RB 70_CD persons_NNS to_TO the_DT square_NN mile_NN ._.
To_TO work_VB steadily_RB over_IN the_DT province_NN I_PRP have_VBP thirty_JJ Vaccinators_NNS ;_: they_PRP can_MD go_VB over_IN it_PRP in_IN about_IN two_CD years_NNS or_CC there-_JJ abouts_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB it_PRP would_MD be_VB advisable_JJ to_TO go_VB over_RP even_RB the_DT more_RBR populous_JJ part_NN ,_, oftener_JJR than_IN every_DT eighteen_JJ months_NNS ,_, because_IN ,_, in_IN such_PDT a_DT thinly_RB populated_JJ country_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD ,_, in_IN many_JJ places_NNS ,_, be_VB difficult_JJ for_IN Vaccinators_NNS to_TO keep_VB good_JJ lymph_NN going_VBG ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinated_JJ children_NNS being_VBG too_RB limited_VBN to_TO ensure_VB always_RB vaccinating_VBG from_IN good_JJ typical_JJ vesicles_NNS ;_: I_PRP think_VBP ,_, indeed_RB ,_, that_IN two_CD years_NNS is_VBZ about_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN time_NN which_WDT should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO elapse_VB ,_, at_IN present_JJ ,_, between_IN the_DT visits_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ._.
When_WRB the_DT population_NN shall_MD have_VB reached_VBN 4,000,000_CD ,_, then_RB it_PRP may_MD become_VB advisable_JJ to_TO go_VB over_IN the_DT more_RBR densely_RB populated_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN every_DT year_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ ,_, then_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT annual_JJ births_NNS in_IN the_DT talookas_NN gone_VBN over_IN by_IN my_PRP$ Vaccinators_NNS may_MD be_VB estimated_VBN at_IN about_IN 66,666_CD ;_: but_CC this_DT number_NN is_VBZ diminished_VBN by_IN the_DT unknown_JJ quantities,16_NN annum_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB said_VBD ,_, we_PRP can_MD hardly_RB expect_VB the_DT Vaccinators_NNS to_TO reach_VB the_DT maximium_NN :_: it_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR probable_JJ that_IN the_DT general_JJ average_NN will_MD be_VB something_NN less_JJR than_IN 2,000_CD ._.
From_IN these_DT calculations_NNS ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN twenty-seven_JJ regular_JJ working_VBG Vacci-_JJ nators_NNS are_VBP sufficient_JJ for_IN Sind_NNP with_IN its_PRP$ present_JJ population_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP establish-_JJ ment_NN consists_VBZ of_IN seventeen_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT local_JJ establishment_NN of_IN thirteen_NN ,_, making_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN thirty_JJ Vaccinators_NNS :_: but_CC two_CD are_VBP employed_VBN superintending_VBG the_DT others_NNS ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ duty_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP not_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, attached_VBD to_TO any_DT particular_JJ talookas_NN ;_: they_PRP moreover_RB ,_, go_VB over_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN a_DT collectorate_NN ._.
Excluding_VBG them_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ still_RB one_CD more_JJR than_IN the_DT requisite_JJ twenty-seven_JJ ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT junior_JJ Vaccinator_NNP is_VBZ nearly_RB always_RB only_RB a_DT beginner_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB calculate_VB on_IN his_PRP$ having_VBG charge_NN of_IN a_DT talooka_NN ._.
The_DT joint_JJ establish-_JJ ment_NN then_RB is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNP is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, sufficient_NN for_IN the_DT province_NN at_IN present_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN a_DT third_JJ Assistant_NNP Superintendent_NNP would_MD add_VB to_TO the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN both_DT establishments_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PRP would_MD enable_VB me_PRP to_TO have_VB one_CD Assistant_NNP for_IN the_DT Kurrachee_NNP Collectorate_NNP ,_, including_VBG Kohistan_NNP ,_, another_DT for_IN the_DT Hydra-_NNP bad_JJ Collectorate_NNP and_CC the_DT Thurr_NNP and_CC Parkur_NNP Political_NNP Superintendency_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT third_JJ for_IN the_DT Shikarpoor_NNP Collectorate_NNP and_CC the_DT Frontier_NNP of_IN Upper_NNP Sind_NNP Political_JJ Super-_NNP intendency_NN ._.
The_DT more_JJR I_PRP see_VBP of_IN our_PRP$ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN the_DT more_JJR am_VBP I_PRP convinced_VBD that_IN Sir_NNP George_NNP Clerk_NNP 's_POS idea_NN ,_, of_IN employing_VBG Native_NNP Deputy_NNP Superintendents_NNP to_TO assist_VB the_DT Euro-_JJ pean_NN Superintendents_NNP ,_, was_VBD wise_NN and_CC correct_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT carrying_NN of_IN it_PRP into_IN practice_NN would_MD ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, bring_VBG the_DT several_JJ vaccination_NN establishments_NNS to_TO a_DT degree_NN of_IN efficiency_NN never_RB yet_RB reached_VBN even_RB in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, where_WRB so_RB much_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN effected_VBN without_IN their_PRP$ assistance_NN ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ a_DT waste_NN of_IN time_NN to_TO argue_VB in_IN favour_NN of_IN Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Superintendents_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT thing_NN stands_VBZ self-evident_JJ ,_, that_IN no_DT single_JJ unaided_JJ European_JJ Officer_NNP can_MD exercise_VB a_DT continuous_JJ watch_NN over_IN men_NNS scattered_VBN over_RP fifty_JJ or_CC sixty_JJ thousand_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ._.
And_CC here_RB I_PRP may_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO say_VB ,_, in_IN advocating_VBG the_DT employment_NN of_IN Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Superintendents_NNP ,_, that_IN Sir_NNP George_NNP Clerk_NNP 's_POS idea_NN ,_, although_IN a_DT wise_NN one_CD ,_, was_VBD marred_VBN ,_, and_CC ultimately_RB rendered_VBN futile_NN by_IN employing_VBG Sub-Assistant_JJ Surgeons_NNS as_IN Deputy_JJ Superintendents_NNS ._.

Still_RB this_DT failure_NN by_IN no_DT means_NN implies_VBZ that_IN a_DT plan_NN for_IN employing_VBG other_JJ natives_NNS would_MD also_RB fail_VB ._.
Head_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Hassah_NNP Mull_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN three_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC Vaccinator_NNP Assoo_NNP Mull_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN nearly_RB two_CD years_NNS ,_, my_PRP$ Assistant_NNP ;_: and_CC I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN them_PRP useful_JJ to_TO a_DT degree_NN I_PRP had_VBD not_RB even_RB anticipated_VBN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN that_IN when_WRB Surgeon_NNP Pearson_NNP ,_, some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ,_, adopted_VBD the_DT Bombay_NNP system_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB fail_VB to_TO strike_VB the_DT one_CD blot_NN in_IN our_PRP$ system_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP included_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ establishments_NNS a_DT grade_NN of_IN Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Superintendents_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT opening_NN paragraph_NN of_IN my_PRP$ Report_NNP on_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1866_CD ,_, I_PRP mentioned_VBD that_IN only_RB one_CD small_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT province_NN then_RB remained_VBD a_DT virgin_JJ field_NN for_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ;_: that_IN part_NN was_VBD Veerow_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN Assistant_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Lulloo_NNP (_( a_DT Mussulman_NNP )_) ,_, when_WRB sent_NN there_RB last_JJ September_NNP ,_, found_VBD no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN persuading_VBG the_DT Koso_NNP Beloochees_NNP to_TO accept_VB vacci-_JJ nation_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP vaccinated_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS in_IN the_DT hills_NNS and_CC dells_NNS about_IN Veerow_NNP ,_, although_IN Assistant_NNP Vaccinator_NNP Jettah_NNP Mull_NNP (_( a_DT Hindoo_NNP )_) had_VBD a_DT few_JJ months_NNS previously_RB been_VBN unable_JJ to_TO succeed_VB among_IN those_DT Koso_NNP Beloochees_NNP ._.
No_DT part_NN of_IN Sind_NNP now_RB remains_VBZ unvaccinated_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ again_RB my_PRP$ pleasing_VBG duty_NN to_TO report_VB that_IN I_PRP and_CC the_DT Vaccinators_NNS have_VBP ,_, throughout_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, received_VBD every_DT assistance_NN from_IN the_DT Revenue_NNP and_CC Political_NNP Officers_NNP in_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
I_PRP had_VBD particular_JJ occasion_NN to_TO call_VB on_IN Captain_NNP Bolton_NNP ,_, the_DT Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP of_IN Mahomed_NNP Khan_NNP 's_POS Tanda_NNP District_NNP ,_, to_TO use_VB his_PRP$ influence_NN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN in_IN his_PRP$ district_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP last_JJ ,_, Colonel_NNP Sir_NNP Henry_NNP Green_NNP asked_VBD me_PRP to_TO lend_VB a_DT Vacci-_JJ nator_NN to_TO His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Khan_NNP of_IN Khelat_NNP ._.
On_IN submitting_VBG the_DT request_NN to_TO the_DT late_JJ Commissioner_NNP Mr._NNP Mansfield_NNP ,_, he_PRP gave_VBD me_PRP his_PRP$ sanction_NN to_TO lend_VB a_DT local_JJ Vaccinator_NN to_TO His_PRP$ Highness_NNP ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, Kishen_NNP Chand_NNP was_VBD sent_VBN by_IN Sir_NNP Henry_NNP Green_NNP to_TO Khelat_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD employed_VBN for_IN some_DT time_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP found_VBD the_DT people_NNS there_EX object_VBP so_RB strongly_RB to_TO his_PRP$ taking_VBG lymph_NN from_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS ,_, wherewith_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB other_JJ children_NNS ,_, that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB keep_VB his_PRP$ lymph_NN going_VBG ,_, and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Khan_NNP was_VBD unwilling_VBG to_TO force_VB his_PRP$ subjects_NNS to_TO allow_VB lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS ._.
Kishen_NNP Chand_NNP informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN there_EX were_VBD no_DT objections_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN ;_: that_DT ,_, in_IN fact_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD glad_VBN to_TO have_VB it_PRP ;_: but_CC that_IN the_DT objection_NN to_TO allow_VB the_DT lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS was_VBD insurmountable_JJ ._.
Colonel_NNP Sir_NNP Henry_NNP Green_NNP considered_VBD it_PRP a_DT good_JJ opportunity_NN for_IN showing_VBG the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS of_IN Khelat_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN introducing_VBG the_DT practice_NN among_IN them_PRP ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB hoped_VBN that_IN the_DT benefit_NN derived_VBN by_IN the_DT few_JJ hundreds_NNS whom_WP Kishen_NNP Chand_NNP vaccinated_VBD may_MD yet_RB induce_VB His_PRP$ Highness_NNP to_TO entertain_VB Vaccinators_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
If_IN I_PRP thought_VBD my_PRP$ presence_NN in_IN Khelat_NNP could_MD 3v_CD 18_CD influence_NN His_PRP$ Highness_NN to_TO keep_VB up_RP Vaccinators_NNS ,_, I_PRP would_MD most_RBS willingly_RB go_VBP there_RB ,_, and_CC try_VB what_WP I_PRP could_MD do_VB ;_: but_CC after_IN the_DT recent_JJ trial_NN ,_, I_PRP fear_VBP some_DT time_NN must_MD elapse_VB before_IN I_PRP could_MD do_VB much_RB good_JJ ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN are_VBP a_DT few_JJ causes_NNS of_IN the_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNS :_: 1st_CD ._.
Jettah_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, Wuttun_NNP Mull_NNP ,_, and_CC Nubby_NNP Bux_NNP were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN thinly_RB populated_JJ talookas_NN ;_: 2nd_CD ._.
One_CD Assistant_NNP Vaccinator_NNP was_VBD dismissed_VBN the_DT Service_NNP for_IN being_VBG absent_NN from_IN his_PRP$ talooka_NN without_IN leave_VBP ;_: 3rd_CD ._.
Thackoordass_NN lost_VBD one_CD month_NN 's_POS work_NN by_IN being_VBG prevented_VBN from_IN returning_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ talooka_NN from_IN privilege_NN leave_VBP during_IN the_DT time_NN intercourse_NN was_VBD forbidden_VBN with_IN Upper_NNP Sind_NNP on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN cholera_NN there_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT chief_JJ reason_NN of_IN the_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN already_RB stated_VBN in_IN the_DT opening_NN paragraph_NN of_IN this_DT Report_NNP ,_, the_DT diminished_JJ number_NN of_IN unprotected_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP vaccinated_VBD 18,661_CD males_NNS and_CC 15,160_CD females_NNS ,_, being_VBG 55.17_CD and_CC 44.82_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, respectively_RB ._.
The_DT local_JJ Vaccinators_NNS vaccinated_VBD 12,020_CD males_NNS and_CC 9,834_CD females_NNS ,_, or_CC 55.0_CD and_CC 44.99_CD ,_, respectively_RB ,_, in_IN each_DT hundred_CD ._.
The_DT Khyrpoor_NNP Vaccinator_NNP vaccinated_VBD 1,409_CD males_NNS and_CC 1,120_CD females_NNS ,_, or_CC 55.71_CD of_IN the_DT former_JJ and_CC 44.28_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN in_IN every_DT hundred_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT total_NN ,_, the_DT percentage_NN of_IN males_NNS is_VBZ 55.29_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN females_NNS 44.69_CD ._.
This_DT is_VBZ nearly_RB the_DT same_JJ proportion_NN as_IN the_DT sexes_NNS bore_VBD to_TO each_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT Report_NNP for_IN 1866_CD ;_: the_DT difference_NN being_VBG only_RB 0.40_CD less_JJR of_IN males_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ fraction_NN more_JJR of_IN females_NNS ,_, this_DT year_NN in_IN every_DT hundred_CD ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN shows_VBZ the_DT percentages_NNS of_IN the_DT castes_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN three_CD Establishments_NNS :19_JJ young_JJ child_NN with_IN confluent_JJ small-pox_NN in_IN a_DT bunyia_NN 's_POS house_NN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Kotree_NNP ;_: the_DT child_NN was_VBD in_IN a_DT pingah_NN (_( a_DT kind_NN of_IN swinging_VBG cradle_NN )_) ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT same_JJ cradle_NN there_EX were_VBD two_CD other_JJ children_NNS who_WP had_VBD never_RB suffered_VBN from_IN small-pox_NN ,_, nor_CC had_VBD ever_RB been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ._.
The_DT father_NN and_CC mother_NN only_RB submitted_VBD the_DT two_CD unprotected_JJ ,_, children_NNS to_TO the_DT Vaccinator_NNP on_IN my_PRP$ bringing_VBG the_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ._.
Again_NNP ,_, a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ago_RB ,_, my_PRP$ 1st_CD Assistant_NNP brought_VBD to_TO my_PRP$ notice_NN that_IN local_JJ Vaccinator_NNP Ramzan_NNP had_VBD received_VBN eight_CD annas_NNS from_IN each_DT of_IN two_CD bunyias_NNS to_TO let_VB off_RP their_PRP$ two_CD children_NNS from_IN being_VBG vaccinated_VBN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD vaccinating_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ village_NN of_IN Meeranshah_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Mehur_NNP Talooka_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 19,027_CD persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ,_, and_CC 39,177_CD above_IN that_DT age_NN ._.
This_DT gives_VBZ 31.2_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT former_JJ and_CC 68.7_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, being_VBG 8.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
more_RBR under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ than_IN 1866_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unquestionably_RB of_IN great_JJ import-_JJ ance_NN that_IN children_NNS be_VB vaccinated_VBN early_RB in_IN life_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP that_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN too_RB much_JJ advocated_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB without_IN very_RB strong_JJ reasons_NNS and_CC much_JJ thought_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN that_IN I_PRP put_VBP forward_RB this_DT opinion_NN ,_, opposed_VBN as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO the_DT best_JJS authorities_NNS in_IN England_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT views_NNS again_RB and_CC again_RB expressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Heads_NNP of_IN my_PRP$ Department_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ annual_JJ reports_NNS on_IN Vaccina-_NNP tion_NN ;_: but_CC my_PRP$ experience_NN has_VBZ led_VBN me_PRP to_TO the_DT belief_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD arrived_VBN at_IN sixty_CD years_NNS ago_RB in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Germany_NNP ,_, that_IN children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ are_VBP less_RBR susceptible_JJ to_TO small-pox_JJ and_CC vaccination_NN than_IN children_NNS over_IN that_DT age_NN ._.
In_IN Bavaria_NNP ,_, this_DT belief_NN has_VBZ in_IN a_DT measure_NN regulated_VBD the_DT period_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, stipulated_VBN by_IN law_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN must_MD be_VB practised_VBN ._.
The_DT law_NN in_IN that_DT country_NN since_IN 1807_CD (_( Bavaria_NNP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ country_NN in_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN was_VBD made_VBN compulsory_NN )_) compels_VBZ all_DT children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN be-_JJ tween_NN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN May_NNP and_CC end_NN of_IN July_NNP who_WP were_VBD born_VBN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ calendar_NN year_NN ;_: i._CC e._VB ,_, excepting_VBG such_JJ as_IN are_VBP ill_JJ and_CC unfit_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ;_: there_EX must_MD ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB a_DT large_JJ number_NN vaccinated_VBN above_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: blue_CC book_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT history_NN and_CC prac-_JJ tice_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, presented_VBN to_TO both_DT Houses_NNP of_IN Parliament_NNP in_IN 1857_CD ,_, Mr._NNP Simon_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT note_NN at_IN page_NN XXXII._NNP ,_, thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT full_JJ susceptibility_NN to_TO small-pox_NN is_VBZ developed_VBN most_JJS in_IN the_DT second_JJ and_CC third_JJ years_NNS of_IN life_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP presume_VBP that_DT susceptibility_NN to_TO vac-_JJ cination_NN is_VBZ also_RB greatest_JJS at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP am_VBP absolutely_RB certain_JJ that_IN the_DT susceptibility_NN to_TO vaccination_NN increases_NNS from_IN birth_NN to_TO three_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
When_WRB I_PRP examine_VBP on_IN the_DT eighth_JJ day_NN after_IN vaccination_NN the_DT children_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN among_IN whom_WP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT number_NN of_IN infants_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ certain_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT considerable_JJ proportion_NN of_IN them_PRP requiring_VBG re-vaccination_NN ,_, whereas_IN those_DT above_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ seldom_NN fail_NN to_TO be_VB successful_JJ on_IN the_DT first_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
Again_RB ,_, the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: insertion_NN success_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: is_VBZ very_RB much_JJ less_JJR among_IN very_RB young_JJ infants_NNS than_IN among_IN children_NNS of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS old_JJ ._.

During_IN this_DT experience_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP often_RB noticed_VBN that_IN infants_NNS of_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ months_NNS old_JJ are_VBP less_RBR susceptible_JJ of_IN vaccinatian_JJ than_IN older_JJR children_NNS ;_: taking_VBG this_DT in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT lesser_JJR susceptibility_NN to_TO small-pox_NN also_RB ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP to_TO be_VB unnecessary_JJ to_TO urge_VB very_RB strongly_RB the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN infants_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, in_IN Sind_NNP the_DT people_NNS do_VBP object_VB ,_, though_IN not_RB much_JJ ,_, to_TO vaccinate_VB very_RB young_JJ infants_NNS ,_, except_IN when_WRB small-pox_NN is_VBZ present_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP bring_VBP them_PRP readily_RB to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, although_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ days_NNS old_JJ ._.

285_CD ,_, so_RB that_IN there_EX are_VBP few_JJ children_NNS to_TO vaccinate_VB ,_, and_CC nearly_RB all_DT under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ ._.

250_CD (_( Wuttun_NNP Mull_NNP )_) ._.

18_CD ._.
Neither_DT myself_PRP nor_CC the_DT two_CD Assistants_NNS discovered_VBD a_DT single_JJ instance_NN of_IN falsifi-_JJ cation_NN of_IN records_NNS ,_, although_IN 8,671_CD names_NNS were_VBD called_VBN from_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNP '_POS Registers_NNS ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT means_NNS of_IN obtaining_VBG statistics_NNS regarding_VBG small-pox_JJ do_NN not_RB at_IN present_JJ exist_NN in_IN this_DT province_NN :_: without_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN village_NN registration_NN ,_, or_CC perhaps_RB a_DT system_NN of_IN registration_NN in_IN each_DT Deh_NNP ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO get_VB any_DT thing_NN like_IN even_RB approximately_RB correct_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN births_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS ,_, or_CC of_IN any_DT diseases_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, as_IN I_PRP said_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ Report_NN for_IN 1863_CD ,_, I_PRP may_MD say_VB more_JJR emphatically_RB again_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT faces_VBZ of_IN the_DT younger_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN are_VBP living_VBG proofs_NN of_IN the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT pitted_JJ faces_VBZ ,_, the_DT blind_NN ,_, the_DT halt_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT lame_NN among_IN the_DT older_JJR ,_, affords_NNS ample_JJ evidence_NN of_IN how_WRB small-pox_JJ ravaged_VBD the_DT country_NN in_IN years_NNS gone_VBN by_IN ._.
And_CC again_RB ,_, the_DT remarks_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN on_IN the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT Hindoo_NNP town_NN of_IN Manjanda_NNP ,_, where_WRB there_RB died_VBN about_IN 25_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT people_NNS attacked_VBD ,_, still_RB show_VB how_WRB deadly_JJ small-pox_JJ is_VBZ ._.
20_CD ._.
The_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN generally_RB very_RB good_JJ ;_: still_RB I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN to_TO find_VB fault_NN with_IN two_CD for_IN working_VBG with_IN deteriorated_JJ lymph_NN ._.

The_DT foregoing_NN gives_VBZ ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, a_DT fair_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP and_CC Local_NNP Vaccination_NNP Establishments_NNP ,_, in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
KATTIAWAR_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.30_NNP 1_CD ._.
Three_CD Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNS were_VBD dismissed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN for_IN misconduct_NN ;_: the_DT places_NNS of_IN these_DT have_VBP been_VBN filled_VBN up_RP by_IN men_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN instructed_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ superintendence_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
One_CD acts_VBZ as_RB Carkoon_NNP to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, a_DT duty_NN which_WDT he_PRP performs_VBZ remark-_NN ably_RB well_RB ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ taught_VBN himself_PRP English_NNP ,_, never_RB having_VBG been_VBN to_TO school_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP reads_VBZ and_CC writes_VBZ it_PRP well_RB ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ the_DT entire_JJ conduct_NN of_IN the_DT Gujerathi_NNP correspondence_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB considerable_JJ ,_, and_CC requires_VBZ an_DT intimate_JJ acquaintance_NN with_IN the_DT various_JJ districts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
He_PRP receives_VBZ no_DT remuneration_NN beyond_IN his_PRP$ pay_NN of_IN 20_CD rupees_NNS per_IN month_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ obliged_VBN to_TO support_VB his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, and_CC keep_VB a_DT tattoo_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ absolutely_RB necessary_JJ for_IN him_PRP when_WRB accompanying_VBG me_PRP on_IN a_DT tour_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT other_JJ seven_CD Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNS have_VBP performed_VBN 7,829_CD operations_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 1,200_CD in_IN excess_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC still_RB falls_VBZ far_RB short_JJ of_IN what_WP they_PRP ought_MD to_TO perform_VB ._.
I_PRP see_VBP in_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS Report_NNP that_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT man_NN in_IN Sind_NNP is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN double_RB that_IN done_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC there_RB I_PRP believe_VBP each_DT man_NN gets_VBZ batta_RP when_WRB travelling_NN ,_, while_IN here_RB they_PRP get_VBP no_DT allowance_NN beyond_IN their_PRP$ their_PRP$ monthly_JJ pay_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO make_VB them_PRP care_VB much_JJ about_IN the_DT Service_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN is_VBZ put_VBN at_IN much_RB too_RB high_JJ a_DT figure_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN any_DT work_NN so_RB good_JJ except_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT Station_NNP Vaccinator_NNP ,_, who_WP only_RB brings_VBZ the_DT successful_JJ cases_NNS for_IN my_PRP$ inspection_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO impress_VB on_IN them_PRP the_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT case_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB considered_VBN successful_JJ unless_IN two_CD well-marked_JJ cicatrices_NNS at_IN least_JJS remain_NN ._.
5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccinators.31_NNP to_TO have_VB this_DT effected_VBN previous_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ departure_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD called_VBN upon_RB many_JJ of_IN them_PRP to_TO appoint_VB Vaccinators_NNS ._.
In_IN a_DT letter_NN which_WDT I_PRP addressed_VBD to_TO Colonel_NNP Keatinge_NNP in_IN May_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, I_PRP proposed_VBD that_IN a_DT general_JJ fund_NN should_MD be_VB established_VBN to_TO which_WDT every_DT Chief_NN should_MD subscribe_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT payment_NN and_CC entire_JJ control_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS should_MD be_VB intrusted_VBN to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP ;_: to_TO this_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT principal_JJ Chiefs_NNP would_MD not_RB consent_VB ._.
They_PRP agreed_VBD to_TO appoint_VB as_IN many_JJ Vaccinators_NNS as_IN were_VBD necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO give_VB the_DT control_NN of_IN them_PRP to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, but_CC they_PRP must_MD be_VB the_DT Chiefs_NNP '_POS servants_NNS ,_, and_CC paid_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._.
Still_RB I_PRP think_VBP that_IN my_PRP$ proposition_NN might_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT petty_NN Chiefs_NNP ,_, most_JJS of_IN whom_WP now_RB pay_VBP nothing_NN ;_: every_DT Chief_NNP pos-_JJ sessing_NN fifty_NN villages_NNS might_MD be_VB called_VBN upon_IN to_TO appoint_VB a_DT Vaccinator_NNP ,_, while_IN those_DT with_IN less_JJR could_MD pay_VB a_DT subscription_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN their_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT superintendence_NN of_IN these_DT men_NNS ,_, Colonel_NNP Keatinge_NNP sug-_NN gested_VBD that_IN four_CD Assistant_JJ Superintendents_NNS should_MD be_VB appointed_VBN ,_, each_DT on_IN a_DT salary_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 50_CD per_IN month_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB paid_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP now_RB employed_VBZ to_TO be_VB discharged_VBN ._.
This_DT plan_NN would_MD no_DT doubt_NN increase_VB the_DT returns_NNS considerably_RB ,_, which_WDT would_MD look_VB very_RB well_RB on_IN paper_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP question_VBP if_IN real_JJ vaccination_NN would_MD be_VB much_RB advanced_VBN by_IN it_PRP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN finding_VBG really_RB trustworthy_JJ men_NNS to_TO fill_VB the_DT office_NN of_IN Assistant_NNP Superintendent_NNP ;_: and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN nothing_NN can_MD supply_VB the_DT place_NN of_IN personal_JJ inspection_NN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, if_IN he_PRP takes_VBZ an_DT interest_NN in_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ well_RB supported_VBN by_IN the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO inspect_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN almost_RB every_DT Vaccinator_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP three_CD principal_JJ States_NNPS in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ;_: of_IN these_DT Bhownuggur_NNP employs_VBZ eight_CD Vaccinators_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN them_PRP called_VBD a_DT Superintendent_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO visit_VB any_DT of_IN these_DT districts_NNS ;_: I_PRP was_VBD on_IN my_PRP$ way_NN there_RB in_IN November_NNP when_WRB recalled_VBN to_TO camp_VB ._.

14_CD ._.
Joonaghur_NNP employs_VBZ three_CD ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB report_VB favourably_RB of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN these_DT men_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP was_VBD formerly_RB in_IN Government_NNP employ_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ now_RB infirm_JJ from_IN paralysis_NN ,_, and_CC unfit_VB for_IN much_JJ work_NN ._.
The_DT Durbar_NNP has_VBZ never_RB given_VBN me_PRP any_DT assistance_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, the_DT Karbaree_NNP at_IN Joonaghur_NNP refused_VBD to_TO help_VB me_PRP at_IN all_DT when_WRB on_IN my_PRP$ tour_NN of_IN inspection_NN in_IN April_NNP ,_, and_CC said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD not_RB the_DT custom_NN to_TO have_VB the_DT children_NNS inspected_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT head_NN man_NN at_IN Kotiana_NNP ,_, another_DT large_JJ town_NN ,_, would_MD not_RB assist_VB me_PRP at_IN all_DT ._.

15_CD ._.
Nuggur_NNP formerly_RB employed_VBD two_CD Vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN Colonel_NNP Keatinge_NNP ,_, arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO increase_VB the_DT number_NN to_TO five_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ almost_RB too_RB small_JJ a_DT number_NN to_TO carry_VB on_IN the_DT work_NN properly_RB ._.

17_CD ._.
The_DT lymph_NN that_WDT is_VBZ at_IN present_NN in_IN use_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN from_IN England_NNP in_IN January_NNP 1867_CD ,_, on_IN points_NNS ;_: one_CD small_JJ vesicle_NN resulted_VBD ,_, from_IN which_WDT the_DT lymph_NN has_VBZ been_VBN propagated_VBN and_CC distributed_VBN to_TO all_PDT the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.

18_CD ._.

REWA_NNP KANTA_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.34_NNP detect_VBP any_DT fictitious_JJ names_NNS ._.

The_DT percentage_NN of_IN children_NNS vaccinated_VBN in_IN the_DT Punch_NNP Mahals_NNP last_JJ year_NN ,_, under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ,_, was_VBD rather_RB more_JJR than_IN 62_CD ,_, but_CC this_DT year_NN the_DT returns_NNS only_RB show_VBP a_DT per-_JJ centage_NN of_IN little_RB more_JJR than_IN 53_CD ._.

of_IN children_NNS were_VBD under_IN one_CD year_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.

of_IN operations_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ._.
The_DT assistant_NN at_IN Kalole_NNP (_( who_WP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT best_JJS Vaccinators_NNS )_) ,_, according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ returns_NNS ,_, operated_VBD on_IN 89_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
under_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT errors_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ returns_NNS amounted_VBD to_TO 12_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT real_JJ percentage_NN therefore_NN is_VBZ only_RB 77_CD ,_, which_WDT ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ very_RB creditable_JJ ,_, considering_VBG the_DT district_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO work_VB ._.
As_IN the_DT Patels_NNP and_CC Talatees_NNP ,_, under_IN instructions_NNS from_IN Mr._NNP Propert_NNP ,_, Agent_NNP to_TO the_DT Governor_NNP ,_, are_VBP now_RB keeping_VBG lists_NNS of_IN the_DT children_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN other_JJ ways_NNS assisting_VBG the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT more_RBR civilised_JJ parts_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP seldom_NN object_NN to_TO their_PRP$ children_NNS being_VBG vaccinated_VBN in_IN infancy_NN ._.
In_IN Dohud_NNP ,_, as_IN vaccination_NN from_IN door_NN to_TO door_VB completely_RB failed_VBN this_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT work_NN was_VBD solely_RB carried_VBN on_IN by_IN means_NNS of_IN the_DT Talatees_NNP '_POS list_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT way_NN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT children_NNS vaccinated_VBN (_( about_IN 200_CD in_IN number_NN )_) were_VBD operated_VBN on_IN when_WRB three_CD months_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT large_JJ towns_NNS these_DT lists_NNS are_VBP very_RB imperfect_JJ ,_, and_CC always_RB will_MD be_VB so_RB until_IN some_DT attempt_NN is_VBZ made_VBN to_TO register_VB the_DT births_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD exaggerated_VBN ,_, but_CC not_RB to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN ._.
In_IN February_NNP ,_, I_PRP inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT assistants_NNS in_IN Jahalode_NNP and_CC Loonawara_NNP ._.

253_CD )_) ,_, Dohud_NNP ,_, who_WP always_RB works_VBZ well_RB and_CC diligently_RB ,_, I_PRP resumed_VBD my_PRP$ tour_NN in_IN November_NNP ._.

279_CD )_) ._.

255_CD )_) ,_, Kalole_NNP ,_, was_VBD next_JJ inspected_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, was_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.

262_CD )_) :_: some_DT of_IN the_DT cicatrices_NNS were_VBD very_RB good_JJ ,_, but_CC others_NNS were_VBD indifferent_JJ ._.
Fresh_JJ lymph_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN ._.
The_DT conduct_NN of_IN all_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, with_IN one_CD exception_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ._.
Purbha_NNP sunker_NN Jeewunram_NNP ,_, assistant_NN in_IN Barriah_NNP ,_, after_IN giving_VBG much_JJ annoyance_NN and_CC trouble_NN ,_, 35_CD sent_NN in_IN his_PRP$ resignation_NN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN September_NNP ._.
Mahasook_NNP Kudoojee_NNP ,_, a_DT candidate_NN from_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO the_DT vacancy_NN ,_, and_CC joined_VBD in_IN November_NNP ._.
A_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT Dohud_NNP Districts_NNP during_IN May_NNP and_CC June_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN July_NNP one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS in_IN Chota_NNP Oodeypoor_NNP were_VBD also_RB reported_VBN ._.
I_PRP met_VBD with_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.

PRESIDENCY_NNP DIVISION_NNP ._.
Local_JJ Superintendent.36_NNP Such_NNP of_IN the_DT Force_NNP as_IN were_VBD vaccinated_VBN here_RB gave_VBD us_PRP abundance_NN of_IN fresh_JJ vaccine_NN lymph_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT we_PRP could_MD vaccinate_VB every_DT one_CD that_WDT applied_VBD for_IN vaccination_NN during_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT last_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC so_RB soon_RB as_IN that_DT source_NN of_IN supply_NN was_VBD exhausted_VBN we_PRP were_VBD as_RB badly_RB off_IN for_IN lymph_NN as_IN ever_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT greater_JJR pity_NN as_IN this_DT want_NN occurred_VBD at_IN the_DT very_RB time_NN it_PRP was_VBD most_RBS needed_VBN ,_, when_WRB ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT setting_NN in_IN of_IN the_DT small-pox_JJ season_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN applicants_NNS for_IN the_DT operation_NN began_VBD to_TO increase_VB ._.
Nothing_VBG short_JJ of_IN legislative_JJ enactment_NN can_MD meet_VB this_DT kind_NN of_IN emergency_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ humble_JJ opinion_NN ,_, it_PRP behoves_VBZ the_DT superior_JJ authorities_NNS to_TO take_VB the_DT subject_NN into_IN their_PRP$ serious_JJ consideration_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP fully_RB persuaded_VBN that_IN if_IN an_DT enactment_NN making_VBG it_PRP compulsory_NN to_TO get_VB one_CD 's_POS child_NN vaccinated_VBD ,_, and_CC ,_, when_WRB successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, to_TO allow_VB lymph_NN from_IN it_PRP ,_, is_VBZ passed_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB meet_VB with_IN any_DT serious_JJ opposition_NN from_IN any_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT commu-_JJ nity_NN on_IN the_DT score_NN of_IN religion_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ humble_JJ opinion_NN ,_, is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ thing_NN worth_IN paying_VBG any_DT attention_NN to_TO ._.
My_PRP$ experience_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT experience_NN of_IN every_DT officer_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccine_NNP Department_NNP ,_, has_VBZ shown_VBN us_PRP ,_, beyond_IN any_DT possibility_NN of_IN being_VBG deceived_VBN ,_, the_DT great_JJ eagerness_NN and_CC anxiety_NN shown_VBN by_IN almost_RB all_DT classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN to_TO get_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.
The_DT only_JJ drawback_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT insufficiency_NN of_IN good_JJ lymph_NN wherewith_NN to_TO carry_VB on_IN the_DT operations_NNS ._.
Inconvenience_NN and_CC trouble_NN are_VBP the_DT only_JJ things_NNS that_WDT could_MD at_IN all_DT seriously_RB be_VB pleaded_VBN by_IN anybody_NN against_IN allowing_VBG lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN matters_NNS at_IN present_JJ stand_NN ,_, the_DT rich_JJ and_CC well-to-do_JJ people_NNS receive_VBP ,_, as_IN they_PRP consider_VBP it_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN right_JJ all_PDT the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN without_IN in_IN the_DT least_JJS partici-_JJ pating_NN in_IN the_DT troubles_NNS and_CC inconveniences_NNS necessarily_RB attending_VBG upon_IN it_PRP ;_: for_IN ,_, secure_NN in_IN the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN any_DT molestation_NN from_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, they_PRP can_MD afford_VB to_TO laugh_VB at_IN their_PRP$ impotent_NN attempts_NNS at_IN securing_VBG a_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN from_IN the_DT arms_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS ._.
Should_MD the_DT poorer_JJR people_NNS be_VB vaccinated_VBN in_IN preference_NN to_TO these_DT rich_JJ folks_NNS ,_, they_PRP know_VBP that_IN they_PRP have_VBP but_CC to_TO represent_VB the_DT matter_NN to_TO the_DT superior_JJ authorities_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, they_PRP believe_VBP ,_, can_MD not_RB but_CC take_VB notice_NN of_IN what_WP ,_, appa-_JJ rently_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ dereliction_NN of_IN duty_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, the_DT richer_JJR and_CC upper_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN have_VBP it_PRP all_PDT their_PRP$ own_JJ way_NN ,_, reaping_VBG all_PDT the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT poorer_NN and_CC lower_JJR classes_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB see_VB why_WRB the_DT convenience_NN of_IN the_DT rich_JJ ,_, well-to-do_JJ upper_JJ classes_NNS should_MD be_VB respected_VBN more_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT poorer_NN ,_, lower_JJR classes_NNS ;_: and_CC as_IN legislative_JJ enactment_NN would_MD go_VB far_RB to_TO equalise_VB matters_NNS and_CC bring_VB all_DT to_TO a_DT level_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD establish_VB vaccination_NN on_IN a_DT sounder_JJ basis_NN ,_, which_WDT could_MD not_RB fail_VB soon_RB to_TO extend_VB its_PRP$ benefits_NNS over_IN the_DT entire_JJ length_NN and_CC breadth_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC of_IN the_DT whole_JJ Presidency_NNP ;_: thus_RB holding_VBG completely_RB under_IN sway_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB quite_RB eradicating_VBG ,_, the_DT fell_VBD disease_JJ small-pox_NN ,_, which_WDT now_RB annually_RB numbers_NNS its_PRP$ victims_NNS by_IN thousands_NNS ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT best_JJS efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT superior_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN we_PRP received_VBD from_IN the_DT different_JJ Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccina-_NNP tion_NN 144_CD charged_VBD capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD ,_, in_IN our_PRP$ turn_NN ,_, to_TO supply_VB lymph_JJ to_TO different_JJ persons_NNS ,_, the_DT Abyssinian_JJ Field_NNP Force_NNP included_VBD ,_, to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN 484_CD charged_VBD ivory_NN points_NNS ,_, 4_CD pairs_NNS of_IN glasses_NNS ,_, 121_CD capillary_JJ tubes_NNS ,_, and_CC 4_CD scabs_NNS ._.
The_DT subordinates_NNS have_VBP all_DT steadily_RB worked_VBN on_IN during_IN the_DT period_NN under_IN report_NN ._.

TANNA_NNP ._.

Sex.49_NNP During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN the_DT Station_NNP Vaccinator_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Kolapoor_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN the_DT Petta_NNP Kurveer_NNP ,_, amounts_VBZ to_TO 1,751_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ more_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT year_NN preceding_NN by_IN 77_CD ,_, and_CC less_JJR than_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT 5_CD preceding_VBG years_NNS by_IN 476_CD ._.

Vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ year_NN was_VBD not_RB conducted_VBN at_IN all_DT satisfactorily_RB ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN great_JJ opposition_NN experienced_VBD both_DT from_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Bhooj_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT from_IN the_DT districts_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT districts_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Rao_NNP ,_, the_DT Vaccinators_NNS every_DT now_RB and_CC then_RB met_VBD with_IN great_JJ opposition_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD removed_VBN by_IN orders_NNS from_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP bringing_VBG them_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ right_JJ senses_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT districts_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT Bhyats_NNP vaccinating_NN was_VBD 56_CD altogether_RB out_IN of_IN question_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT greatest_JJS opposition_NN was_VBD met_VBN therein_RB ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN one_CD caste_NN ,_, the_DT Borahs_NNP ,_, the_DT people_NNS generally_RB are_VBP averse_JJ to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC are_VBP greatly_RB in_IN favour_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ;_: for_IN I_PRP observed_VBD ,_, during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ of_IN small-pox_NN that_WDT broke_VBD out_RP last_JJ year_NN ,_, that_IN numbers_NNS of_IN them_PRP flocked_VBD to_TO the_DT inoculators_NNS ,_, even_RB at_IN the_DT sacri-_JJ fice_NN of_IN some_DT money_NN ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN them_PRP ,_, except_IN the_DT Borahs_NNP ,_, of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN resorted_VBD either_DT to_TO the_DT Dispensary_NNP or_CC to_TO the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP received_VBN similar_JJ reports_NNS from_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT districts_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS are_VBP impressed_VBN with_IN the_DT idea_NN that_IN of_IN those_DT inoculated_VBN not_RB one_CD ever_RB dies_VBZ from_IN small-pox_NN ;_: hence_NN they_PRP are_VBP found_VBN ready_JJ to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS inoculated_VBN ._.
but_CC show_VBP great_JJ opposition_NN to_TO vaccination_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ raged_VBD very_RB violently_RB because_IN inoculation_NN was_VBD practised_VBN to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN ._.

1739_CD ,_, dated_VBD 25th_CD May_NNP 1868_CD (_( xx_NN )_) performed_VBD on_IN children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 159,575_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN on_IN children_NNS above_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 231,840_CD ,_, is_VBZ nearly_RB as_RB 41_CD to_TO 59_CD ,_, which_WDT also_RB indicates_VBZ some_DT improvement_NN over_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT ratio_NN between_IN the_DT respective_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN children_NNS under_IN and_CC above_IN one_CD year_NN operated_VBD on_IN was_VBD as_IN 37_CD to_TO 63_CD ._.

3_CD ._.
From_IN paragraphs_$ 3_CD to_TO 12_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, Government_NNP observe_VBP that_IN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT withdrawal_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT exigencies_NNS of_IN the_DT service_NN ,_, the_DT supervision_NN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS was_VBD not_RB as_IN com-_JJ plete_NN as_IN might_MD be_VB wished_VBN ._.

The_DT results_NNS given_VBN in_IN paragraphs_NN 15_CD and_CC 16*_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN are_VBP very_RB interesting_JJ ._.
Number_NNP vaccinated_VBD ._.
*_RB 15_CD ._.
Exclusive_CD of_IN vaccination_NN performed_VBN in_IN military_JJ cantonments_NNS ,_, the_DT total_JJ numberoperated_JJ on_IN during_IN the_DT year_NN amounted_VBD to_TO 391,415_CD ,_, being_VBG an_DT increase_NN over_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN of_IN 11,918_CD ._.
This_DT must_MD be_VB deemed_VBN most_RBS satisfactory_JJ ;_: for_IN if_IN the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP is_VBZ practised_VBN in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN sixteen_JJ millions_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB computed_VBN that_IN the_DT births_NNS annually_RB may_MD average_VB four_CD hundred_CD and_CC eighty_JJ thousand_NN ._.

Cost_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
As_RB far_RB as_IN can_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN ,_, the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ vaccination_NN to_TO Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, in_IN Government_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, is_VBZ five_CD annas_NNS and_CC seven_CD pies_NNS ;_: increased_VBN vaccination_NN will_MD bring_VB this_DT down_RP still_RB further_RB ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB ,_, should_MD compulsory_VB vaccination_NN be_VB introduced_VBN ,_, the_DT private_JJ practitioners_NNS should_MD be_VB remunerated_VBN ,_, as_IN in_IN England_NNP and_CC Scotland_NNP ,_, for_IN each_DT certified_VBN successful_JJ case_NN ._.
(_( xxi_NN )_) 5_CD ._.

The_DT greatest_JJS fluctuations_NNS in_IN 1867_CD are_VBP observable_JJ in_IN the_DT Central_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP Circles_NNP ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP has_VBZ read_VBN the_DT report_NN from_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP with_IN much_JJ inter-_NN est_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT satisfactory_JJ result_NN ex-_JJ hibited_VBN therein_NN is_VBZ creditable_JJ to_TO the_DT Officers_NNPS concerned_VBD ._.
From_IN the_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT total_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT British_JJ territory_NN is_VBZ 12,045_CD ,_, made_VBD up_IN of_IN that_DT in_IN the_DT Government_NNP return_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 10,305_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT local_JJ return_NN 1,740_CD ,_, against_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ a_DT partial_JJ set_NN off_RP in_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT Khyrpoor_NNP return_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 1,554_CD ._.
The_DT net_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ Province_NN is_VBZ reduced_VBN to_TO 10,491_CD ._.
This_DT consi-_JJ derable_JJ decline_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT returns_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT territories_NNS of_IN Native_NNP Chiefs_NNP show_VBP an_DT increase_NN on_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN of_IN upwards_NNS of_IN 8,000_CD ._.
This_DT is_VBZ ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, satisfactory_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP observes_VBZ that_IN in_IN Cutch_NNP the_DT num-_JJ ber_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN by_IN each_DT Vaccinator_NNP amounted_VBD to_TO only_RB 176_CD ._.
The_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, urges_NNS ,_, in_IN paragraphs_JJ 23_CD and_CC 24_CD of_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT general_JJ system_NN under_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS requires_VBZ *_JJ 17_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT last_JJ seven_CD years_NNS the_DT number_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN have_VBP steadily_RB ,_, and_CC pro_JJ rata_NN ,_, increased_VBD ,_, as_IN the_DT following_VBG table_NN will_MD show_VB :_: (_( xxii_NN )_) considerable_JJ amendment_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT course_NN necessary_JJ for_IN perfecting_VBG the_DT existing_VBG system_NN ,_, recommends_VBZ (_( paragraph_VB 25_CD )_) that_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT Native_NNP Chiefs_NNP should_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB placed_VBN under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, and_CC receive_VB there_EX pay_VB on_IN the_DT Super-_NNP intendent_NN 's_POS certificates_NNS ._.
In_IN paragraph_NN 26_CD the_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP shows_VBZ the_DT distribution_NN of_IN these_DT States_NNS into_IN the_DT several_JJ Circles_NNP of_IN superintendence_NN ._.

8_CD ._.

To_TO the_DT SECRETARY_NNP to_TO GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, am_VBP not_RB aware_JJ whether_IN Mr._NNP Marson_NNP of_IN the_DT National_NNP Vaccine_NNP Institution_NNP ,_, London_NNP ,_, practices_NNS this_DT precautionary_JJ test_NN before_IN supplying_VBG tubes_NNS to_TO India_NNP ,_, but_CC I_PRP know_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ practised_VBN by_IN Doctor_NNP Husband_NNP of_IN the_DT Royal_NNP Dispensary_NNP in_IN Edinburgh_NNP ._.

These_DT dates_NNS would_MD enable_VB the_DT new_JJ lymph_NN to_TO be_VB propa-_JJ gated_VBN in_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN ._.

8_CD ._.

27_CD )_) to_TO be_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: almost_RB continually_RB practised._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: The_DT two_CD Native_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Bunsda_NNP and_CC Dhurmpoor_NNP are_VBP noticed_VBN as_IN never_RB having_VBG had_VBD a_DT Vaccinator_NNP within_IN their_PRP$ boundaries_NNS ._.

9_CD ._.

10_CD ._.
The_DT addition_NN of_IN five_CD Vaccinators_NNS under_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, namely_RB ,_, two_CD by_IN the_DT Jam_NNP of_IN Nownuggur_NNP ,_, two_CD by_IN the_DT Nawab_NNP of_IN Joonagur_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD in_IN the_DT Sunkeira_NNP Mewas_NNP in_IN the_DT Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP ,_, and_CC seven_CD entertained_VBN by_IN Municipa-_NNP lities_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, Sangolee_NNP ,_, Nassick_NNP ,_, Indapoor_NNP ,_, Bagulkote_NNP ,_, Kulladgee_NNP ,_, Panwell_NNP ,_, and_CC Malseerus_NNP is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS pleasing_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT Report_NNP ._.

7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP Surgeon_NNP Day_NNP resigned_VBD the_DT appointment_NN of_IN Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP late_RB in_IN 1867_CD ,_, but_CC continued_VBD to_TO carry_VB on_IN the_DT office_NN work_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD months_NNS of_IN 1868_CD ._.

There_EX was_VBD no_DT active_JJ superintendence_NN in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP until_IN November_NNP (_( vi_NN )_) Neither_CC Dr._NNP Day_NNP nor_CC Surgeon_NNP Major_NNP Pitman_NNP could_MD travel_VB in_IN the_DT districts_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP each_DT held_VBD charge_NN of_IN a_DT Regiment_NNP in_IN Belgaum_NNP ._.

8_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Western_JJ Circle_NNP there_EX was_VBD no_DT active_JJ superintendence_NN until_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Cody_NNP took_VBD up_RP his_PRP$ acting_JJ appointment_NN ._.

In_IN it_PRP the_DT Political_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lieutenant_NNP Colonel_NNP Schneider_NNP ,_, has_VBZ taken_VBN great_JJ pains_NNS to_TO spread_VB vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN his_PRP$ foster-_JJ ing_NN care_NN ,_, vaccination_NN has_VBZ made_VBN great_JJ progress_NN ._.
When_WRB I_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, I_PRP examined_VBD two_CD large_JJ schools_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ the_DT result_NN :_: (_( vii_NN )_) August_NNP ._.

11_CD ._.

12_CD ._.
The_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN depends_VBZ in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN on_IN steady_JJ and_CC active_JJ superintendence_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP that_IN the_DT changes_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD during_IN last_JJ year_NN were_VBD unavoidable_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP need_VBP do_VBP no_DT more_JJR than_IN express_VB a_DT hope_NN that_IN Superintendents_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB withdrawn_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ vac-_JJ cination_NN duties_NNS except_IN under_IN very_RB pressing_VBG emergencies_NNS :_: and_CC when_WRB ,_, from_IN any_DT cause_NN ,_, a_DT Superintendent_NNP has_VBZ to_TO leave_VB his_PRP$ appointment_NN ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP his_PRP$ place_NN will_MD be_VB filled_VBN up_RP as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.

13_CD ._.
Since_IN I_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, the_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP directed_VBD me_PRP to_TO draw_VB up_RP in_IN separate_JJ papers_NNS ,_, for_IN submission_NN to_TO Government_NNP ,_, several_JJ recommen-_JJ dations_NNS for_IN the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN previously_RB laid_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Arnott_NNP before_IN Government_NNP in_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT I_PRP may_MD here_RB put_VB on_IN record_NN :_: (_( viii_NN )_) tors_NNS who_WP have_VBP never_RB before_RB been_VBN well_RB paid_VBN ,_, will_MD ,_, I_PRP feel_VBP well_RB assured_VBN ,_, be_VB grateful_JJ for_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN pay_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD now_RB value_NN their_PRP$ places_NNS too_RB well_RB to_TO carelessly_RB risk_VB the_DT loss_NN of_IN them_PRP ;_: previously_RB many_JJ of_IN them_PRP looked_VBD on_IN dis-_JJ missal_NN from_IN the_DT service_NN as_RB little_JJ or_CC no_DT punishment_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT Peons_NNPS having_VBG now_RB been_VBN put_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ footing_NN as_IN that_DT of_IN Peons_NNS in_IN the_DT Revenue_NNP department_NN ,_, they_PRP also_RB will_MD remain_VB content_JJ and_CC not_RB constantly_RB seek_VB to_TO leave_VB the_DT Department_NNP ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Circles_NNP it_PRP was_VBD becoming_VBG difficult_JJ to_TO get_VB Peons_NNS on_IN the_DT old_JJ rate_NN of_IN pay_NN ._.
I_PRP no_RB longer_RBR apprehend_VB any_DT difficulty_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG good_JJ men_NNS to_TO fill_VB the_DT places_NNS of_IN Peons_NNS ._.

23_CD ._.
The_DT local_JJ establishment_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Sind_NNP has_VBZ maintained_VBN its_PRP$ position_NN for_IN usefulness_NN ._.
