As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT new_JJ Local_NNP Fund_NNP Act_NNP comes_VBZ into_IN operation_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP would_MD be_VB advisable_JJ for_IN each_DT collectorate_NN to_TO give_VB an_DT annual_JJ grant_NN to_TO increase_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN other_JJ ways_NNS increase_VB the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT Department_NNP ,_, by_IN the_DT appoint-_JJ ment_NN of_IN Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Superintendents_NNP ,_, to_TO aid_VB the_DT European_JJ officers_NNS in_IN guiding_NN ,_, supervising_VBG ,_, testing_VBG ,_, and_CC controlling_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.
Truthfulness_NN of_IN returns_NNS ._.
24_CD ._.
It_PRP affords_VBZ me_PRP great_JJ pleasure_NN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT Superin-_JJ tendents_NNS have_VBP pronounced_VBN the_DT returns_NNS to_TO be_VB generally_RB free_JJ from_IN any_DT false_JJ names_NNS ;_: some_DT other_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN errors_NNS have_VBP been_VBN ,_, in_IN several_JJ instances_NNS ,_, noticed_VBN :_: as_IN was_VBD stated_VBN in_IN last_JJ annual_JJ report_NN ,_, one_CD reason_NN for_IN no_DT longer_RBR finding_VBG false_JJ names_NNS is_VBZ the_DT facilities_NNS afforded_VBN by_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS for_IN commencing_VBG work_NN :_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB the_DT chief_NN and_CC best_JJS reason_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNPS test_VB Vac-_NNP cinators_NNS '_POS work_NN closely_RB by_IN calling_VBG over_RP ,_, from_IN the_DT registers_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT villages_NNS ,_, the_DT names_NNS of_IN vaccinated_JJ children_NNS ;_: falsification_NN can_MD not_RB escape_VB such_JJ a_DT test_NN ._.
Only_RB one_CD Vaccinator_NNP was_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN falsifying_VBG his_PRP$ returns_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD in_IN Kattiawar_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP does_VBZ not_RB say_VB whether_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT Government_NNP or_CC Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccinator_NNP ._.
Small-pox_NNP ._.
25_CD ._.
Small-pox_JJ occurred_VBD both_DT sporadically_RB and_CC epidemically_RB in_IN all_DT Circles_NNP except_IN in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT reason_NN why_WRB Kat-_NNP tiawar_NN escaped_VBD ,_, may_MD be_VB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN that_DT Province_NNP in_IN 1867_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP no_DT exact_JJ information_NN before_IN me_PRP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, nor_CC do_VBP I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN such_JJ information_NN is_VBZ obtainable_JJ from_IN any_DT source_NN whatsoever_NN at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ;_: years_NNS hence_RB ,_, when_WRB registration_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN continued_VBN regularly_RB ,_, we_PRP may_MD hope_VB to_TO obtain_VB exact_JJ information_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT information_NN I_PRP have_VBP is_VBZ of_IN the_DT most_RBS general_JJ kind_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ of_IN such_JJ little_JJ use_NN that_IN I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP barely_RB worth_JJ recording_VBG ._.
Still_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO complete_VB ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP can_MD ,_, this_DT report_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD briefly_VB summarize_VB the_DT information_NN contained_VBN in_IN the_DT reports_NNS received_VBD from_IN Superintendents_NNS and_CC others_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP there_EX were_VBD 47,236_CD cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN reported_VBN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 1,848_CD had_VBD been_VBN previously_RB vaccinated_VBN ;_: of_IN the_DT vaccinated_JJ 8.7_CD and_CC of_IN the_DT unvaccinated_JJ 9.5_CD died_VBD ;_: but_CC I_PRP apprehend_VBP that_IN these_DT figures_NNS are_VBP of_IN little_JJ or_CC no_DT value_NN ,_, as_IN other_JJ eruptive_JJ diseases_NNS must_MD have_VB been_VBN included_VBN ,_, for_IN such_PDT a_DT low_JJ death_NN rate_NN among_IN the_DT unprotected_JJ is_VBZ quite_RB unknown_JJ ,_, where_WRB exact_JJ information_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ob-_JJ tained_VBN ._.
In_IN those_DT instances_NNS in_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP myself_PRP collected_VBN information_NN ,_, the_DT (_( xv_NN )_) death_NN rate_NN among_IN unprotected_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN from_IN 20_CD to_TO 25_CD per_IN centum_NN ,_, and_CC here_RB it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB 9.5_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP the_DT disease_NN was_VBD epidemic_JJ in_IN Beedee_NNP talooka_NN in_IN Belgaum_NNP collectorate_NN ,_, regarding_VBG which_WDT the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, from_IN personal_JJ observation_NN ,_, says_VBZ that_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN vaccination_NN into_IN Beedee_NNP talooka_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: is_VBZ attended_VBN with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS difficulty_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT prejudices_NNS and_CC non-belief_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ efficacy._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: The_DT disease_NN was_VBD also_RB epidemic_JJ in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN Canara_NNP collectorate_NN ,_, but_CC &_CC quot_NN ;_: was_VBD not_RB of_IN long_JJ duration_NN ,_, nor_CC has_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN been_VBN reported_VBN as_IN any_DT way_NN severe._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Raby_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, gives_VBZ an_DT instance_NN where_WRB the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN a_DT village_NN noticed_VBD the_DT protecting_VBG power_NN of_IN vaccination_NN and_CC eagerly_RB brought_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ._.
He_PRP desired_VBD the_DT inhabitants_NNS to_TO mention_VB the_DT circumstances_NNS to_TO all_DT their_PRP$ neighbouring_NN villagers_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP epidemic_JJ small-pox_NN broke_VBD out_RP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1867_CD ,_, and_CC continued_VBD till_VB the_DT following_JJ rains_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT table_NN in_IN the_DT Superinten-_NNP dent_NN 's_POS report_NN showing_NN when_WRB and_CC where_WRB the_DT disease_NN existed_VBD ,_, from_IN which_WDT it_PRP ap-_JJ pears_NNS that_IN this_DT Circle_NNP was_VBD only_RB free_JJ of_IN small-pox_NN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN August_NNP and_CC October_NNP ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ from_IN reports_NNS that_IN the_DT disease_NN did_VBD not_RB pre-_JJ vail_NN to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN except_IN in_IN the_DT collectorate_NN of_IN Surat_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Super-_NNP intendent_NN attributes_VBZ its_PRP$ continued_JJ prevalence_NN there_RB to_TO the_DT ignorant_JJ opposi-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT continued_JJ practice_NN of_IN variolous_JJ inoculation_NN ._.
He_PRP thinks_VBZ small-pox_JJ not_RB at_IN all_PDT an_DT evil_JJ ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN it_PRP does_VBZ more_RBR to_TO convince_VB the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN vaccination_NN than_IN anything_NN else_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP gives_VBZ the_DT following_JJ instance_NN in_IN point_NN ._.
The_DT town_NN of_IN Sarode_NNP is_VBZ divided_VBN by_IN a_DT deep_JJ ravine_NN ,_, one_CD side_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ inhabitated_VBN by_IN Mussulmans_NNPS ,_, who_WP had_VBD never_RB accepted_VBN vaccination_NN ;_: the_DT other_JJ side_NN is_VBZ inhabited_VBN by_IN Hindoos_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD availed_VBN themselves_PRP of_IN it_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT disease_NN appeared_VBD the_DT unpro-_JJ tected_JJ Mussulmans_NNPS suffered_VBD severely_RB ,_, while_IN the_DT protected_JJ Hindoos_NNP did_VBD not_RB ;_: this_DT opened_VBD their_PRP$ eyes_NNS and_CC the_DT Mussulmans_NNPS eagerly_RB sought_VBN for_IN vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC so_RB troublesome_JJ were_VBD they_PRP ,_, that_IN they_PRP would_MD seldom_VB allow_NN of_IN an_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS on_IN the_DT eighth_JJ day_NN ,_, or_CC permit_NN lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN Sind_NNP the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ been_VBN sporadic_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC except_IN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Roree_NNP and_CC Sukkur_NNP it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB spread_VBN or_CC caused_VBN much_JJ mortality_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN into_IN Roree_NNP from_IN Bahawulpoor_NNP territory_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD propagated_VBN in_IN and_CC around_IN Roree_NNP by_IN inoculation_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD 300_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT deaths_NNS 31_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB probable_JJ that_IN a_DT consider-_JJ able_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT 300_CD were_VBD protected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, as_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN steadily_RB practised_VBN for_IN 10_CD or_CC 12_CD years_NNS back_RB in_IN both_DT Roree_NNP and_CC Sukkur_NNP ,_, hence_VBD the_DT small_JJ mortality_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Butler_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Kattiawar_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, says_VBZ :_: &_CC quot_NN ;_: I_PRP have_VBP neither_DT heard_NN of_IN nor_CC seen_VBN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, although_IN I_PRP have_VBP travelled_VBN 1,110_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_CC visited_VBD 132_CD villages_NNS ;_: &_CC quot_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP saw_VBD two_CD children_NNS who_WP (_( xvi_NNP )_) had_VBD been_VBN well_RB vaccinated_VBN and_CC had_VBD both_DT subsequently_RB suffered_VBN from_IN severe_JJ small-pox_NN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ._.
Had_NNP they_PRP not_RB been_VBN vaccinated_VBN ,_, they_PRP would_MD pro-_VB bably_RB not_RB have_VB lived_VBN for_IN him_PRP to_TO see_VB them_PRP ._.
In_IN Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP Circle_NNP an_DT epidemic_JJ occurred_VBD in_IN Halole_NNP in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ,_, which_WDT caused_VBD several_JJ deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD brought_VBN from_IN the_DT Guicowar_NNP 's_POS territory_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD then_RB prevalent_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP small-pox_NN is_VBZ always_RB prevalent_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP can_MD see_VB no_DT help_NN for_IN this_DT while_NN vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB compulsory_JJ ._.
In_IN such_PDT a_DT large_JJ city_NN ,_, into_IN which_WDT strangers_NNS from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN Asia_NNP and_CC Africa_NNP come_VBP ,_, it_PRP must_MD in_IN the_DT very_JJ nature_NN of_IN things_NNS exist_VBP as_IN a_DT permanent_JJ evil_NN ._.
Small-pox_NNP existed_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_JJR at_IN the_DT following_VBG Civil_JJ Stations_NNS :_: (_( xvii_NN )_) would_MD be_VB unbecoming_VBG of_IN me_PRP to_TO again_RB urge_VB on_IN the_DT Government_NNP the_DT advisa-_JJ bility_NN of_IN making_VBG inoculation_JJ penal_JJ ,_, so_RB shortly_RB after_IN their_PRP$ recent_JJ decision_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS of_IN Bansda_NNP and_CC Dhurmpoor_NNP to_TO the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT Northern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, vaccination_NN has_VBZ never_RB been_VBN regularly_RB introduced_VBN ,_, nor_CC are_VBP any_DT Vaccinators_NNS kept_VBD up_RP in_IN them_PRP ._.
From_IN these_DT States_NNS inoculators_NNS enter_VBP the_DT Surat_NNP collectorate_NN and_CC carry_NN on_IN their_PRP$ deadly_JJ work_NN ._.
Endeavours_NNS will_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO induce_VB these_DT States_NNS to_TO employ_VB Vaccinators_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP already_RB communicated_VBN with_IN the_DT Governor_NNP 's_POS Agent_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB he_PRP may_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO prevent_VB inoculators_NNS intruding_VBG themselves_PRP into_IN our_PRP$ territory_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN be_VB able_JJ to_TO convince_VB these_DT two_CD small_JJ States_NNS that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB better_JJR to_TO maintain_VB Vac-_NNP cinators_NNS than_IN foster_JJ inoculators_NNS ._.
Total_JJ Vaccinations_NNP ._.
28_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN civil_JJ life_NN was_VBD ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ._. 426,253_CD and_CC in_IN the_DT Army_NNP ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ._. 5,931_CD Total_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ..._: 432,184_CD but_CC I_PRP will_MD omit_VB the_DT army_NN returns_NNS from_IN the_DT following_JJ calculations_NNS ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP no_DT previous_JJ returns_NNS to_TO compare_VB with_IN those_DT now_RB submitted_VBN ._.
Success_NN ._.
29_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN 34,838_CD vaccinations_NNS in_IN civil_JJ life_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ;_: this_DT I_PRP consider_VBP highly_RB satis-_JJ factory_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB creditable_JJ to_TO the_DT whole_JJ department_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 426,253_CD operations_NNS 398,988_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, 12,789_CD unsuccessful_JJ ,_, and_CC 14,476_CD doubtful_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, 93.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN successful_JJ ,_, and_CC 6.5_CD of_IN unsuccessful_JJ and_CC doubtful_JJ ;_: this_DT is_VBZ about_IN the_DT same_JJ as_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
Sex_NN ._.
30_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 230,343_CD of_IN males_NNS and_CC 195,910_CD of_IN females_NNS vaccinated_VBN ,_, or_CC 56_CD of_IN the_DT former_JJ to_TO 44_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
This_DT dis-_JJ parity_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_JJ exists_NNS in_IN all_DT Circles_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ about_IN the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO explain_VB why_WRB the_DT dis-_JJ parity_NN is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN the_DT actual_JJ disparity_NN of_IN the_DT sexes_NNS in_IN the_DT general_JJ population_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB so_RB great_JJ ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP Superintendents_NNS ,_, when_WRB test-_JJ ing_NN records_NNS ,_, will_MD see_VB that_IN no_DT errors_NNS are_VBP made_VBN in_IN the_DT columns_NN for_IN the_DT sexes_NNS ._.
Caste_NN ._.
31_CD ._.
In_IN table_JJ VII_NNP ._.
the_DT number_NN of_IN each_DT caste_NN shown_VBN and_CC expressed_VBN in_IN percentages_NNS is_VBZ 0.5_CD Christians_NNPS ,_, 73.7_CD Hindoos_NNP ,_, 20.5_CD Mussulmans_NNPS ,_, 0.3_CD Parsees_NNS ,_, and_CC 4.9_CD other_JJ castes_NNS ._.
Age_NNP ._.
32_CD There_EX were_VBD 177,276_CD under_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ and_CC 243,978_CD above_IN one_CD year_NN old_JJ vaccinated_VBN ,_, or_CC 41.1_CD of_IN the_DT former_JJ to_TO 58.9_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ nearly_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN 3_CD vac_NN (_( xviii_NN )_) in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN much_JJ importance_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB as_IN early_RB in_IN life_NN as_IN possible_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN a_DT much_RB higher_JJR proportion_NN of_IN infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS than_IN this_DT can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN about_RB 70_CD in_IN every_DT hundred_CD persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN were_VBD under_IN two_CD years_NNS old_JJ ._.
Cost_NN ._.
33_CD ._.
I_PRP make_VBP out_RP the_DT total_JJ cost_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN civil_JJ life_NN to_TO be_VB in_IN 1868_CD about_IN Rupees_NNP 1,11,524_CD ,_, which_WDT gives_VBZ Annas_NNP 4_CD and_CC Pies_NNS 2_CD for_IN each_DT vaccination_NN ._.
In_IN next_JJ report_NN the_DT expenditure_NN will_MD probably_RB be_VB larger_JJR ,_, because_IN Superintendents_NNS have_VBP in_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN held_VBD their_PRP$ appointments_NNS and_CC the_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN increased_VBN ._.
In_IN 1867_CD the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT vaccination_NN was_VBD stated_VBN to_TO be_VB Annas_NNP 5_CD and_CC Pies_NNS 7_CD ,_, or_CC 1_CD Anna_NNP and_CC 5_CD Pies_NNS more_RBR than_IN in_IN 1868_CD ;_: this_DT expenditure_NN includes_VBZ all_DT establishments_NNS ,_, Government_NNP ,_, Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, Local_NNP ,_, and_CC Municipal_NNP ._.
Assistance_NN from_IN Civil_NNP Authorities_NNP ._.
34_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendents_NNP warmly_WDT acknowledge_VBP the_DT assistance_NN that_IN they_PRP and_CC the_DT Vaccinators_NNS have_VBP received_VBN from_IN the_DT Civil_NNP authorities_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO their_PRP$ aid_NN is_VBZ due_JJ in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN the_DT increase_NN of_IN operations_NNS in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
35_CD ._.
I_PRP think_VBP there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO be_VB pleased_VBN with_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 's_POS operations_NNS ._.
I_PRP would_MD beg_VB to_TO commend_VB to_TO the_DT favourable_JJ notice_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN the_DT zealous_JJ exertions_NNS of_IN Drs_NNP ._.
Butler_NNP and_CC Colah_NNP ,_, and_CC although_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNP Ffolliott_NNP and_CC Raby_NNP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN long_RB in_IN the_DT department_NN ,_, yet_CC their_PRP$ exertions_NNS are_VBP also_RB very_RB praiseworthy_JJ ._.
Mr._NNP Anunta_NNP Chandroba_NNP has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN most_RBS active_JJ and_CC zealous_JJ at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ many_JJ difficulties_NNS to_TO contend_VB with_IN ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP the_DT temporary_JJ loss_NN of_IN the_DT able_JJ services_NNS of_IN the_DT Senior_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO Europe_NNP for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN his_PRP$ health_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO myself_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB much_JJ to_TO say_VB ._.
During_IN the_DT rains_NNS I_PRP was_VBD in_IN Bombay_NNP employed_VBD in_IN revising_VBG the_DT pay_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN of_IN the_DT depart-_JJ ment_NN ,_, which_WDT though_IN not_RB difficult_JJ ,_, was_VBD laborious_JJ ._.
At_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN I_PRP visited_VBD Sattara_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN making_VBG inquiries_NNS in_IN re-_JJ ference_NN to_TO a_DT recommendation_NN made_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP to_TO transfer_VB Sattara_NNP Zillah_NNP to_TO the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC Kulladghee_NNP Zillah_NNP to_TO the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ tour_NN I_PRP went_VBD through_IN both_DT Zillahs_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP met_VBD the_DT Acting_NNP Collector_NNP of_IN Sattara_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Bosanquet_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB Mr._NNP Havelock_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Revenue_NNP Commis-_NNP sioner_NN Southern_NNP Division_NNP ,_, who_WP both_DT agree_VBP with_IN Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP 's_POS geographical_JJ and_CC lingual_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN recommending_VBG the_DT transfer_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS of_IN Sattara_NNP Zillah_NNP speak_VBD the_DT language_NN of_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, Maratha_NNP ;_: the_DT greater_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN Kulladghee_NNP Zillah_NNP speak_VBP Canarese_NNP like_IN a_DT greater_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
The_DT position_NN of_IN Sattara_NNP Zillah_NNP connects_VBZ it_PRP closer_RBR with_IN (_( xix_NN )_) the_DT Central_NNP than_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT position_NN of_IN Kulladghee_NNP Zillah_NNP is_VBZ closer_RBR to_TO the_DT Southern_NNP than_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP says_VBZ that_IN the_DT language_NN alone_RB should_MD be_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ reason_NN for_IN the_DT transfer_NN ,_, because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ unknown_JJ to_TO himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ office_NN people_NNS ,_, and_CC documents_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB often_RB translated_VBN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Kulladghee_NNP into_IN English_NNP or_CC Maratha_NNP ._.
After_IN having_VBG visited_VBN both_DT Zillahs_NNP and_CC having_VBG seen_VBN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN both_DT Cir-_NNP cles_NNS ,_, I_PRP would_MD beg_VB to_TO recommend_VB that_DT on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN next_JJ January_NNP ,_, Sattara_NNP Zillah_NNP be_VB tranferred_VBN from_IN the_DT Southern_NNP to_TO the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN Kullad-_NNP ghee_NN Zillah_NNP be_VB transferred_VBN from_IN the_DT Central_NNP to_TO the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP ._.
37_CD ._.
I_PRP marched_VBD through_IN Sattara_NNP Zillah_NNP to_TO Sholapoor_NNP ,_, and_CC on_IN my_PRP$ way_NN I_PRP examined_VBD the_DT village_NN registers_NNS at_IN all_DT my_PRP$ camping_NN places_NNS ,_, and_CC saw_VBD some_DT vac-_JJ cinated_JJ children_NNS here_RB and_CC there_RB ._.
These_DT registers_NNS are_VBP of_IN immense_JJ use_NN in_IN show-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT Vaccinators_NNPS where_WRB there_EX are_VBP unprotected_JJ children_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ usefulness_NN will_MD increase_VB year_NN by_IN year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN shows_VBZ how_WRB he_PRP makes_VBZ use_NN of_IN them_PRP ;_: I_PRP commend_VBP his_PRP$ example_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ Superintendents_NNS ._.
When_WRB at_IN Sholapoor_NNP ,_, I_PRP met_VBD Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD laid_VBN up_RP there_RB with_IN fever_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ since_IN compelled_VBN him_PRP to_TO proceed_VB to_TO Europe_NNP ._.
From_IN Sholapoor_NNP I_PRP marched_VBD through_IN Kulladghee_NNP to_TO Belgaum_NNP ,_, where_WRB I_PRP met_VBD Mr._NNP Raby_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX saw_VBD some_DT vaccinations_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
Here_RB the_DT year_NN closed_VBD ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ next_JJ annual_JJ report_NN ,_, be_VB able_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT better_JJR account_NN of_IN my_PRP$ travels_NNS ._.
I_PRP may_MD say_VB I_PRP had_VBD only_RB two_CD travelling_VBG months_NNS in_IN 1868_CD ._.
38_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT rains_NNS I_PRP occasionally_RB visited_VBD the_DT vaccine_NN stations_NNS in_IN Bom-_NNP bay_NN ,_, and_CC 1_CD feel_NN satisfied_VBD that_IN nothing_NN short_JJ of_IN a_DT Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP will_MD ever_RB do_VB much_RB to_TO improve_VB the_DT state_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC I_PRP need_VBP not_RB say_VB more_JJR on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN laid_VBN before_IN Government_NNP ._.
39_CD ._.
In_IN table_JJ VIII_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP shown_VBN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Army_NNP for_IN 1868_CD ,_, for_IN which_WDT information_NN I_PRP am_VBP indebted_VBN to_TO the_DT Secre-_NNP tary_NN to_TO the_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT first_JJ time_NN they_PRP have_VBP ever_RB been_VBN incorporated_VBN with_IN the_DT annual_JJ report_NN ;_: hitherto_VBZ an_DT annual_JJ return_NN has_VBZ been_VBN submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander-in-Chief_NNP only_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD somewhat_RB less_JJR vaccination_NN in_IN Regiments_NNP ,_, Lines_NNP and_CC Depart-_NNP ments_NNS ,_, but_CC an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT operations_NNS in_IN Cantonments_NNS and_CC Bazaars_NNP ._.

CENTRAL_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.2_JJ Central_NNP to_TO the_DT Western_JJ Circle_NNP ._.
Under_IN the_DT Municipalities_NNP there_EX is_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN 4_CD Vaccinators_NNS ;_: 1_CD for_IN Nassick_NNP ,_, 1_CD for_IN Kulladghee_NNP ,_, 1_CD for_IN Bhagulkote_NNP ,_, and_CC 1_CD for_IN Indapoor_NNP ._.
The_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS remain_VBP as_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, 2_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN ,_, as_IN will_MD also_RB be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT table_NN ,_, is_VBZ increased_VBN in_IN the_DT Government_NNP establishment_NN ,_, being_VBG 961_CD ,_, against_IN 95.5_CD per_IN centum_NN for_IN 1867_CD ;_: in_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS 93.3_CD per_IN centum_NN ,_, against_IN 84.9_CD for_IN 1867_CD ;_: and_CC in_IN Municipalities_NNP 87.3_CD ,_, against_IN 85.1_CD per_IN centum_NN for_IN 1867_CD ._.

15_CD ._.
I_PRP next_RB examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN General_NNP No_NNP ._.
296_CD ,_, Kondajee_NNP Mukumdrow_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ returns_NNS I_PRP found_VBD correct_NN ,_, but_CC his_PRP$ lymph_NN was_VBD exceedingly_RB bad_JJ ._.
I_PRP renewed_VBD it_PRP for_IN him_PRP with_IN some_DT points_NNS of_IN English_NNP lymph_NN I_PRP received_VBD from_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP for_IN trial_NN ,_, and_CC warned_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB more_RBR careful_JJ for_IN the_DT future_NN ._.
I_PRP must_MD here_RB mention_VB the_DT difficulty_NN I_PRP found_VBD in_IN collecting_VBG children_NNS for_IN inspection_NN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Bhewndy_NNP and_CC Callian_NNP ._.
The_DT officials_NNS were_VBD eager_JJ enough_RB to_TO render_VB every_DT assistance_NN in_IN their_PRP$ power_NN ,_, but_CC such_JJ good_JJ intentions_NNS were_VBD frustrated_VBN by_IN the_DT indifference_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.

16_CD ._.
During_IN my_PRP$ tour_NN I_PRP am_VBP sure_JJ I_PRP saw_VBD just_RB as_IN many_JJ children_NNS unprotected_VBD as_IN were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ._.
A_DT good_JJ many_JJ of_IN them_PRP no_DT doubt_NN were_VBD protected_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN and_CC in_IN a_DT few_JJ rare_JJ instances_NNS I_PRP saw_VBD marks_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD propagating_VBG the_DT evil_NN that_IN vac-_JJ cination_NN is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO guard_VB against_IN ._.
Looking_VBG at_IN the_DT ._.
fewness_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS in_IN such_PDT a_DT large_JJ Collectorate_NNP as_IN Tanna_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ that_IN it_PRP should_MD be_VB otherwise_RB ._.
There_EX are_VBP only_RB six_CD men_NNS to_TO meet_VB the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN a_DT district_NN nearly_RB 10,000_CD square_JJ miles_NNS in_IN area_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG a_DT population_NN of_IN nearly_RB one_CD million_CD ._.
20_CD NORTHERN_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent21_NNP prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN bringing_VBG out_RP many_JJ children_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN ,_, who_WP otherwise_RB would_MD have_VB been_VBN kept_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP 's_POS reach_NN ;_: to_TO a_DT certain_JJ extent_NN also_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT increased_VBN energy_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
To_TO this_DT report_NN is_VBZ annexed_VBN a_DT table_NN which_WDT gives_VBZ a_DT comparative_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN performed_VBD during_IN the_DT years_NNS 1867_CD and_CC 1868_CD ,_, with_IN some_DT other_JJ particulars_NNS ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN the_DT three_CD establishments_NNS is_VBZ 96,458_CD ;_: of_IN this_DT 60,212_CD were_VBD children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ,_, and_CC 36,246_CD above_IN that_DT age_NN ._.
This_DT gives_VBZ 62.4_CD per_IN centum_NN of_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, and_CC 37.5_CD of_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
Taking_VBG the_DT sexes_NNS ,_, the_DT operations_NNS in_IN males_NNS exceeds_NNS females_NNS ,_, the_DT percentage_NN being_VBG 53.5_CD in_IN males_NNS ,_, and_CC 46.4_CD in_IN females_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT general_JJ result_NN ,_, the_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN in_IN the_DT Government_NNP (_( 91.8_CD )_) and_CC Native_JJ States_NNS '_POS establishments_NNS (_( 90.7_CD )_) is_VBZ almost_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP establishment_NN it_PRP is_VBZ 91.9_CD ,_, being_VBG two_CD per_IN centum_NN lower_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP think_VBP the_DT percentage_NN is_VBZ actually_RB much_JJ greater_JJR ,_, vaccinated_JJ children_NNS leaving_VBG their_PRP$ villages_NNS before_IN the_DT week_NN day_NN ,_, or_CC concealed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ parents_NNS through_IN fear_NN of_IN lymph_NN being_VBG taken_VBN from_IN them_PRP ,_, are_VBP entered_VBN as_IN doubtful_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
The_DT lymph_NN in_IN use_NN in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP is_VBZ to_TO all_DT appearances_NNS good_VBD ;_: the_DT resulting_JJ vesicles_NNS are_VBP normal_JJ in_IN size_NN and_CC appearance_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, so_RB good_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD in_IN past_JJ years_NNS ,_, because_IN the_DT cicatrices_NNS are_VBP not_RB so_RB large_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS they_PRP become_VBP very_RB indistinct_JJ ._.
7_CD ._.
Three_CD supplies_NNS of_IN English_NNP lymph_NN were_VBD received_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ supply_NN in_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS was_VBD successfully_RB used_VBN in_IN Cambay_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN Febru-_NNP ary_NN ._.
The_DT second_JJ supply_NN was_VBD on_IN ivory_JJ points_NNS ;_: it_PRP was_VBD received_VBN in_IN August_NNP ;_: and_CC on_IN trial_NN ,_, failed_VBD entirely_RB ._.
The_DT last_JJ supply_NN ,_, received_VBD almost_RB at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, was_VBD partly_RB in_IN tubes_NNS and_CC partly_RB on_IN ivory_NN points_NNS ;_: it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN at_IN Mundul_NNP ,_, and_CC failed_VBD entirely_RB ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB desirable_JJ that_IN endeavours_VBZ be_VB made_VBN here_RB for_IN procuring_VBG cow-lymph_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN successful_JJ ,_, the_DT replace-_JJ ment_NN of_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ lymph_NN now_RB in_IN use_NN by_IN such_JJ fresh_JJ cow-lymph_NN ,_, would_MD be_VB very_RB beneficial_JJ ._.
8_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN supplies_NNS of_IN lymph_NN in_IN capillary_JJ tubes_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Staff_NNP Surgeons_NNP of_IN Nusseerabad_NNP and_CC Aboo_NNP Sanitarium_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Rajpootana_NNP Dis-_NNP pensaries_NNS and_CC Vaccination_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, Kaira_NNP ,_, the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT 14th_CD Regiment_NNP N._NNP I._NNP ,_, Mhow_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Local_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT Dispensaries_NNPS of_IN Dakore_NNP and_CC Gogo_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT year_NN was_VBD marked_VBN by_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN a_DT severe_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
This_DT disease_NN made_VBD its_PRP$ appearance_NN in_IN December_NNP 1867_CD in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ two_CD 22_CD months_NNS of_IN 1868_CD it_PRP was_VBD not_RB much_JJ known_VBN ,_, but_CC on_IN the_DT approach_NN of_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN ,_, it_PRP began_VBD to_TO spread_VB with_IN marked_JJ vigour_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB till_VB the_DT rains_NNS set_VBN in_IN that_DT its_PRP$ virulence_NN abated_VBN ._.
It_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB understood_JJ that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ disappeared_VBN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB lingering_VBG in_IN some_DT parts_NNS ,_, and_CC may_MD again_RB appear_VB to_TO a_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR extent_JJ during_IN the_DT hot_JJ months_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
Epidemics_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, though_IN in_IN their_PRP$ result_NN very_RB disastrous_JJ ,_, are_VBP not_RB with-_JJ out_IN some_DT advantages_NNS ._.
If_IN no_DT human_JJ persuasion_NN and_CC example_NN can_MD teach_VB a_DT person_NN the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, a_DT visit_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN his_PRP$ family_NN teaches_VBZ him_PRP thoroughly_RB ._.
Hence_NNP each_DT epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ establishes_NNS the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN ,_, and_CC makes_VBZ many_JJ con-_JJ verts_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP must_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT same_JJ in_IN previous_JJ ones_NNS ,_, the_DT greatest_JJS prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN was_VBD in_IN places_NNS which_WDT had_VBD resisted_VBN vaccination_NN ._.
In_IN December_NNP 1867_CD it_PRP prevailed_VBD to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ extent_NN in_IN two_CD populous_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Jumbooseer_NNP talooka_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
;_: in_IN Sarode_NNP and_CC Kavee_NNP ._.
I_PRP took_VBD my_PRP$ camp_NN to_TO Sarode_NNP shortly_RB after_IN (_( in_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN January_NNP 1868_CD )_) ,_, and_CC learnt_VBZ the_DT following_JJ particulars_NNS :_: Sarode_NNP is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ village_NN ,_, divided_VBN into_IN two_CD parts_NNS by_IN a_DT deep_JJ ravine_NN ;_: one_CD part_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Tulput_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ chiefly_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN Mahomedan_NNP agriculturists_NNS and_CC others_NNS ;_: the_DT other_JJ part_NN ,_, called_VBN Wanta_NNP ,_, is_VBZ inhabited_VBN by_IN Hindoos_NNP ,_, Kolies_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN This_DT latter_NN ,_, the_DT Wanta_NNP portion_NN ,_, had_VBD admit-_NN ted_VBN vaccination_NN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT Tulput_NNP portion_NN had_VBD baffled_VBN all_PDT the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ,_, who_WP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN dismayed_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB not_RB visited_VBN the_DT village_NN again_RB for_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT late_JJ outbreak_NN most_RBS small-pox_JJ prevailed_VBN in_IN the_DT Tulput_NNP portion_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD there_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT breaking_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, vaccination_NN was_VBD eagerly_RB sought_VBN after_IN ,_, and_CC ,_, before_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP could_MD commence_VB work_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS took_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO Broach_NNP for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Even_RB during_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ ,_, whenever_WRB they_PRP got_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS readily_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD so_RB annoying_JJ and_CC troublesome_JJ ,_, as_IN not_RB to_TO show_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS on_IN the_DT week-day_JJ following_NN ,_, but_CC closed_VBD up_RP their_PRP$ doors_NNS as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP was_VBD known_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN the_DT street_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
During_IN epidemic_JJ seasons_NNS the_DT greatest_JJS mischief_NN always_RB is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO occur_VB in_IN Kusba_NNP towns_NNS and_CC cities_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN such_JJ places_NNS that_WDT ,_, on_IN the_DT breaking_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, people_NNS shake_VBP off_RP their_PRP$ apathy_NN ,_, and_CC admit_DT vaccination_NN ._.
Occasional_JJ instances_NNS are_VBP known_VBN where_WRB the_DT prejudice_NN is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ as_IN to_TO make_VB the_DT people_NNS believe_VBP in_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN as_IN a_DT divine_JJ dispensation_NN ._.
Such_JJ people_NNS oppose_VBP vaccination_NN even_RB during_IN epi-_JJ demic_JJ seasons_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT entreaties_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB replied_VBN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Jao_NNP Jee_NNP ,_, kia_NN toom_NN Allah_NNP se_NN bhi_NN burrah_NN ho_NN ke_NN ?_.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: (_( Are_VBP you_PRP mightier_JJR than_IN the_DT Almighty_NNP God_NNP :_: go_VB your_PRP$ way_NN )_) ._.
13_CD ._.
As_IN an_DT instance_NN of_IN extreme_JJ reluctance_NN to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD mention_VB one_CD case_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ._.
Small-pox_NNP broke_VBD out_RP in_IN Pahlunpore_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ and_CC populous_JJ Kusba_NNP ,_, about_RB 18_CD miles_NNS from_IN the_DT important_JJ military_JJ cantonment_NN of_IN Deesa_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT Vaccinator_NNP attached_VBN to_TO this_DT place_NN ,_, in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Kusba_NNP and_CC surrounding_VBG villages_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD working_VBG in_IN Pahlunpore_NNP at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN checking_VBG the_DT epidemic_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Deesa_NNP Cantonment_NNP was_VBD 23_CD ordered_VBN to_TO Pahlunpore_NNP ._.
Both_DT together_RB commenced_VBN operations_NNS ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ combined_JJ efforts_NNS were_VBD successful_JJ to_TO only_RB a_DT limited_JJ extent_NN ;_: for_IN ,_, working_VBG three_CD days_NNS in_IN a_DT week_NN in_IN the_DT Kusba_NNP ,_, they_PRP could_MD only_RB get_VB sixty_JJ children_NNS for_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
The_DT Mahomedan_NNP population_NN resisted_VBD even_RB during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ._.
The_DT Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Pahlunpore_NNP ,_, Dana_NNP Bhava_NNP ,_, is_VBZ now_RB of_IN twenty_CD years_NNS '_POS standing_NN in_IN the_DT service_NN ._.
From_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ observation_NN of_IN this_DT man_NN ,_, borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT testimony_NN of_IN another_DT medical_JJ officer_NN now_RB high_JJ in_IN the_DT service_NN ,_, but_CC who_WP was_VBD for_IN a_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ,_, I_PRP can_MD say_VB of_IN him_PRP that_IN in_IN industry_NN and_CC zeal_NN in_IN popularizing_VBG himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ art_NN ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ personal_JJ demeanour_NN to_TO all_DT ,_, there_EX is_VBZ now_RB no_DT equal_JJ to_TO him_PRP among_IN the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS '_POS Vaccinators_NNS ._.
Yet_RB strange_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, fault_NN was_VBD found_VBN with_IN him_PRP ._.
From_IN information_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD have_VB been_VBN entirely_RB incorrect_JJ ,_, he_PRP was_VBD said_VBD to_TO be_VB inefficient_JJ ,_, and_CC not_RB fit_VB for_IN the_DT post_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ removal_NN was_VBD desired_VBN ._.
The_DT loss_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN felt_VBN nowhere_RB more_JJR than_IN in_IN Pahlunpore_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO make_VB a_DT satisfactory_JJ representation_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO retain_VB this_DT man_NN in_IN his_PRP$ post_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
Though_IN the_DT carrying_VBG on_IN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN a_DT place_NN infected_VBN with_IN small-pox_NN is_VBZ beneficial_JJ ,_, yet_RB among_IN ignorant_JJ people_NNS ,_, such_PDT a_DT proceeding_NN is_VBZ often_RB more_RBR or_CC less_RBR hazardous_JJ ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP may_MD bring_VB discredit_NN on_IN vaccination_NN by_IN children_NNS already_RB infected_VBN with_IN the_DT contagion_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ being_VBG vaccinated_VBN during_IN or_CC about_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC thereafter_RB both_DT diseases_NNS ,_, variola_NN and_CC vaccinia_NN ,_, breaking_VBG out_RP on_IN the_DT children_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD so_RB happen_VB that_IN a_DT child_NN ,_, after_IN being_VBG thus_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, may_MD have_VB small-pox_JJ very_RB severely_RB and_CC die_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT utmost_JJ importance_NN for_IN this_DT Department_NNP that_IN it_PRP may_MD receive_VB all_DT possible_JJ assistance_NN from_IN high_JJ influential_JJ quarters_NNS during_IN quiet_JJ times_NNS ,_, when_WRB no_DT epidemic_JJ influence_NN prevails_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN such_JJ assist-_JJ ance_NN being_VBG rendered_VBN to_TO it_PRP in_IN epidemic_JJ seasons_NNS only_RB ._.

As_IN to_TO the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT small-pox_NN prevailed_VBD in_IN the_DT different_JJ parts_NNS and_CC towns_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN reports_NNS received_VBN from_IN our_PRP$ Vaccinators_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP no_DT other_JJ good_JJ source_NN of_IN information_NN ._.

16_CD ._.
From_IN what_WP is_VBZ reported_VBN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN whereas_JJ small-pox_NN prevailed_VBN in_IN the_DT other_JJ districts_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP to_TO a_DT limited_JJ extent_NN ,_, its_PRP$ occurrence_NN in_IN Surat_NNP districts_NNS was_VBD general_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB of_IN some_DT importance_NN to_TO know_VB what_WP is_VBZ the_DT state_NN and_CC progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN these_DT districts_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS I_PRP may_MD say_VB that_IN they_PRP are_VBP as_IN good_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ Zillah_NNP ;_: many_JJ of_IN them_PRP are_VBP old_JJ and_CC experienced_JJ hands_NNS ._.
That_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB inactive_JJ ,_, and_CC that_DT vaccination_NN in_IN their_PRP$ districts_NNS is_VBZ progressing_VBG ,_, will_MD appear_VB from_IN the_DT following_VBG statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ eight_CD years_NNS :25_VBP It_PRP must_MD be_VB stated_VBN here_RB that_IN ,_, comparing_VBG Surat_NNP with_IN other_JJ Zillahs_NNP of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ,_, vaccination_NN in_IN it_PRP is_VBZ attended_VBN with_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ difficulties_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN which_WDT were_VBD men-_NNS tioned_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 15_CD of_IN my_PRP$ Report_NNP for_IN 1867_CD ._.
But_CC for_IN the_DT ignorant_JJ opposition_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS ,_, the_DT work_NN each_DT year_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN greater_JJR ._.
17_CD ._.
Notwithstanding_VBG all_PDT the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN this_DT establishment_NN to_TO push_VB on_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT Surat_NNP districts_NNS ,_, still_RB there_EX is_VBZ always_RB some_DT amount_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ prevailing_NN in_IN these_DT parts_NNS ._.
And_CC this_DT is_VBZ principally_RB due_JJ to_TO inoculation_NN being_VBG still_RB in_IN favour_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN from_IN year_NN to_TO year_NN this_DT injurious_JJ custom_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP this_DT keeps_VBZ small-pox_JJ going_VBG ._.
In_IN epidemic_JJ seasons_NNS the_DT contagion_NN spreads_VBZ easily_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT inoculators_NNS also_RB getting_VBG more_JJR work_NN in_IN these_DT times_NNS ,_, become_VBP the_DT principal_JJ agents_NNS for_IN the_DT propagation_NN and_CC diffusion_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ virus_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN two_CD reports_NNS at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS were_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Chicklee_NNP regarding_VBG the_DT carrying_VBG on_IN of_IN inoculation_NN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Ranveree_NNP ,_, Rankoova_NNP ,_, and_CC Tulaochora_NNP ._.
These_DT were_VBD ,_, without_IN loss_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Surat_NNP ._.
Reports_NNS were_VBD also_RB received_VBN from_IN Bulsar_NNP ;_: but_CC these_DT came_VBD very_RB late_JJ (_( in_IN September_NNP )_) after_IN all_PDT the_DT mischief_NN was_VBD over_RB ._.
18_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Guzerat_NNP ,_, from_IN Mount_NNP Aboo_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, to_TO Bugwarra_NNP in_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN Kutch_NNP and_CC Kattiawar_NNP in_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT extensive_JJ territories_NNS in_IN the_DT east_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Guicowar_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Political_NNP Agency_NNP of_IN Rewa_NNP Kanta_NNP and_CC Rajpeepla_NNP ,_, vaccination_NN is_VBZ now_RB being_VBG carried_VBN on_IN steadily_RB ._.
19_CD ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP two_CD small_JJ territories_NNS in_IN the_DT southernmost_JJ part_NN of_IN Guzerat_NNP where_WRB vaccination_NN is_VBZ unknown_JJ ._.
These_DT lie_NN to_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN the_DT Chicklee_NNP ,_, Bulsar_NNP ,_, and_CC Bugwarra_NNP talookas_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP the_DT territories_NNS of_IN the_DT Rajahs_NNP of_IN Bansda_NNP and_CC Dhurrumpoor_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP surrounded_VBN on_IN all_DT sides_NNS by_IN vaccinated_JJ districts_NNS ._.
Their_PRP$ western_JJ boundary_NN is_VBZ already_RB mentioned_VBN ;_: to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT Bansda_NNP State_NNP is_VBZ Guicowary_NNP territory_NN lying_VBG very_RB near_IN to_TO Walor_NNP of_IN Bardolee_NNP talooka_NN ;_: to_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN the_DT Bansda_NNP and_CC Dhurumpoor_NNP States_NNPS lie_VBP the_DT Solgana_NNP and_CC Peint_NNP States_NNPS ,_, in_IN which_WDT last_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT establishment_NN of_IN the_DT Central_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
To_TO the_DT east_NN of_IN Solgana_NNP and_CC Peint_NNP States_NNPS lie_VBP Khandeish_JJ districts_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT territories_NNS of_IN the_DT Rajahs_NNP of_IN Bansda_NNP and_CC Dhurrumpoor_NNP ,_, which_WDT are_VBP not_RB blessed_VBN with_IN Vaccinators_NNS ,_, reside_VB the_DT inoculators_NNS ,_, who_WP each_DT year_NN infest_RB our_PRP$ territories_NNS ,_, and_CC do_VBP a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN mischief_NN ,_, by_IN carrying_VBG on_IN inoculation_NN ._.
Whilst_NNP I_PRP was_VBD in_IN Surat_NNP ,_, during_IN the_DT last_JJ rains_NNS ,_, I_PRP called_VBD upon_IN the_DT Collector_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ also_RB Agent_NNP for_IN the_DT Governor_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN such_JJ is_VBZ the_DT medium_NN of_IN communication_NN with_IN these_DT States_NNS ;_: I_PRP suggested_VBD to_TO him_PRP the_DT desirability_NN of_IN addressing_VBG the_DT Durbars_NNP of_IN the_DT two_CD States_NNS ,_, to_TO check_VB the_DT inoculators_NNS from_IN coming_VBG into_IN our_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
To_TO introduce_VB vaccination_NN in_IN these_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS would_MD not_RB ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, be_VB difficult_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT last_JJ epidemic_JJ the_DT Vaccinator_NNP of_IN Bulsar_NNP ,_, being_VBG at_IN the_DT time_NN very_RB near_IN Dhurrumpoor_NNP ,_, was_VBD sent_VBN for_IN by_IN the_DT Rajah_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT hopeful_JJ sign_NN ._.

21_CD ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ strong_JJ belief_NN that_IN a_DT simple_JJ extension_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT quarter_NN abovementioned_VBD will_MD not_RB result_VB in_IN the_DT abatement_NN ,_, much_RB less_JJR the_DT suppression_NN 4_CD v_NN 26_CD of_IN inoculation_NN in_IN the_DT Surat_NNP districts_NNS ._.
At_IN present_JJ there_EX is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, a_DT strong_JJ prohibitory_NN order_NN on_IN every_DT Patel_NN of_IN a_DT village_NN not_RB to_TO allow_VB inoculation_NN ;_: nevertheless_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ being_VBG permitted_VBN ;_: and_CC when_WRB found_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT case_NN investigated_VBD ,_, the_DT invariable_JJ rule_NN for_IN the_DT Patel_NNP and_CC the_DT people_NNS inoculated_VBN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT subjects_NNS of_IN inoculation_NN had_VBD gone_VBN to_TO friends_NNS or_CC relations_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS of_IN the_DT Bansda_NNP or_CC Dhurrumpoor_NNP States_NNPS ,_, and_CC were_VBD there_RB inoculated_VBN ._.
There_EX will_MD always_RB be_VB some_DT inoculators_NNS prejudicing_VBG the_DT minds_NNS of_IN ignorant_JJ people_NNS ,_, practising_VBG their_PRP$ injurious_JJ vocation_NN ,_, and_CC thereby_RB keeping_VBG up_RP the_DT poison_NN of_IN variola_NN to_TO activity_NN ._.
Nothing_VBG short_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, of_IN making_VBG inoculation_JJ criminal_NN ,_, and_CC prohibiting_VBG it_PRP by_IN law_NN ,_, will_MD meet_VB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
Towards_IN the_DT suppression_NN of_IN what_WP greater_JJR evil_NN can_MD Government_VB interfere_RB for_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ?_.
Is_VBZ not_RB small-pox_JJ more_RBR highly_RB contagious_JJ and_CC more_RBR certainly_RB destructive_JJ to_TO the_DT people_NNS than_IN syphilis_NNS ?_.
and_CC yet_RB Government_NNP have_VBP passed_VBN an_DT Act_NNP to_TO prevent_VB syphilis_NN ._.
22_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

24_CD ._.

56_CD ,_, 20_CD ,_, 31_CD ,_, and_CC 296_CD of_IN Duskroe_NNP ,_, Sanund_NNP ,_, Veerungaum_NNP ,_, and_CC Mundul_NNP talookas_NN ,_, of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP Zillah_NNP ._.
To_TO sum_VB up_RP ,_, I_PRP inspected_VBD ,_, in_IN all_DT ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN twenty-two_JJ persons_NNS ;_: of_IN these_DT 18_CD belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT Government_NNP establishment_NN ,_, one_CD was_VBD a_DT Native_JJ State_NNP Vaccinator_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD Municipal_JJ Vaccinators_NNS ,_, of_IN Dholka_NNP and_CC Veerungaum_NNP ,_, at_IN which_WDT last_JJ place_NN the_DT vaccina-_JJ tions_NNS carried_VBD on_IN at_IN the_DT Dispensary_NNP were_VBD examined_VBN ._.

28_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT twenty-two_JJ Vaccinators_NNS whose_WP$ work_NN was_VBD examined_VBN ,_, the_DT lymph_NN of_IN fourteen_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB good_JJ ;_: six_CD Vaccinators_NNS were_VBD working_VBG with_IN deteriorated_JJ lymph_NN ,_, which_WDT did_VBD not_RB produce_VB quite_RB satisfactory_JJ vesicles_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD was_VBD working_VBG with_IN very_RB bad_JJ lymph_NN ._.

29_CD ._.
There_EX have_VBP been_VBN in_IN all_DT five_CD dismissals_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD necessitated_VBN by_IN the_DT following_JJ circumstances_NNS :31_VBD he_PRP was_VBD somewhat_RB well_RB ,_, but_CC no_DT sooner_NN had_VBD he_PRP returned_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, than_IN he_PRP took_VBD again_RB very_RB ill_JJ ,_, and_CC died_VBD in_IN November_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT best_JJS men_NNS next_IN to_TO Dana_NNP Bhava_NNP ,_, of_IN Pahlunpore_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP therefore_VBP regret_JJ his_PRP$ loss_NN ._.
As_IN early_JJ information_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN was_VBD received_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO make_VB arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT carrying_VBG on_IN of_IN work_NN in_IN Kakhrej_NNP talooka_NN ,_, and_CC vaccination_NN there_RB has_VBZ again_RB been_VBN going_VBG on_IN since_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN November_NNP ._.
31_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD many_JJ breaks_NNS in_IN vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: more_JJR than_IN what_WP is_VBZ usual_JJ ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN these_DT occurred_VBN after_IN unusually_RB heavy_JJ rains_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT consequent_JJ high_JJ floods_NNS in_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS were_VBD prevented_VBN from_IN going_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ week_NN 's_POS work_NN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ stations_NNS being_VBG surrounded_VBN by_IN water_NN ;_: these_DT lost_VBD their_PRP$ lymph_NN entirely_RB ._.
Others_NNS were_VBD out_RB on_IN their_PRP$ week_NN 's_POS work_NN in_IN villages_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD there_RB weather-bound_JJ ;_: these_DT lost_VBD their_PRP$ lymph_NN partially_RB ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ a_DT list_NN of_IN places_NNS where_WRB lymph_NN was_VBD lost_VBN ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT above-mentioned_JJ cause_NN :32_NN ments_NNS ,_, the_DT loss_NN amounts_VBZ to_TO the_DT work_NN of_IN two_CD Vaccinators_NNS for_IN eight_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
But_CC for_IN these_DT breaks_NNS ,_, the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN 's_POS work_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN very_RB consider-_JJ able_JJ ._.
34_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS of_IN this_DT Circle_NNP I_PRP may_MD say_VB ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN a_DT couple_NN or_CC so_RB who_WP are_VBP decidedly_RB idle_JJ ,_, nearly_RB all_DT are_VBP industrious_JJ ._.
They_PRP have_VBP met_VBN my_PRP$ demands_NNS for_IN increased_JJ work_NN to_TO their_PRP$ utmost_JJ capability_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ general_JJ conduct_NN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ observation_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB exemplary_JJ ._.
35_CD ._.
In_IN paragraph_JJ 29_CD of_IN this_DT Report_NNP I_PRP mentioned_VBD the_DT circumstance_NN of_IN the_DT dis-_JJ missal_NN of_IN two_CD Vaccinators_NNS for_IN the_DT misappropriation_NN of_IN money_NN to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ use_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN giving_VBG it_PRP to_TO parents_NNS of_IN children_NNS ,_, carried_VBD for_IN vaccine_NN purposes_NNS from_IN one_CD village_NN to_TO another_DT ._.
My_PRP$ attention_NN was_VBD drawn_VBN to_TO the_DT getting_VBG up_IN of_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: remuneration_NN putrucks_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC of_IN Forms_NNP V._NNP 2_CD ,_, of_IN all_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP found_VBD that_IN the_DT village_NN Patels_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ business_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO attest_VB the_DT truthfulness_NN of_IN the_DT forms_NNS ,_, and_CC thereby_RB be_VB a_DT check_NN on_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, were_VBD in_IN the_DT loose_JJ habit_NN of_IN putting_VBG their_PRP$ signatures_NNS on_IN them_PRP anyhow_VBP ,_, even_RB on_IN blank_NN forms_NNS ,_, without_IN ascertaining_VBG in_IN the_DT least_JJS to_TO what_WP statement_NN their_PRP$ signature_NN was_VBD re-_JJ quired_JJ :_: thus_RB the_DT object_NN for_IN which_WDT these_DT forms_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN was_VBD lost_VBN ._.

This_DT has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN done_VBN ,_, and_CC as_RB much_RB good_JJ as_IN could_MD result_VB by_IN making_VBG the_DT object_NN of_IN the_DT putrucks_NNS known_VBN is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, now_RB derived_VBN ._.

KATTIAWAR_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.37_NNP and_CC they_PRP object_VBP to_TO the_DT Vaccinators_NNS of_IN other_JJ Chiefs_NNP coming_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ villages_NNS ,_, for_IN fear_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT Chief_NNP who_WP entertains_VBZ the_DT Vaccinators_NNS laying_VBG claim_NN to_TO a_DT part_NN or_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, the_DT very_RB act_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP going_VBG there_RB and_CC vaccinating_VBG would_MD ,_, help_VB to_TO ._.

The_DT second_JJ reason_NN is_VBZ this_DT :_: (_( but_CC I_PRP must_MD first_RB go_VB back_RB a_DT few_JJ years_NNS :_: )_) When_WRB I_PRP came_VBD to_TO Kattiawar_VB it_PRP was_VBD the_DT custom_NN ,_, on_IN a_DT vacancy_NN occurring_VBG ,_, that_IN the_DT Super-_NNP intendent_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP should_MD appoint_VB the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ,_, independent_JJ of_IN the_DT Durbar_NNP or_CC Chief_NNP to_TO whom_WP he_PRP was_VBD then_RB sent_VBN ._.

Besides_IN ,_, the_DT Chiefs_NNP immediately_RB began_VBD to_TO increase_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN their_PRP$ Vacci-_JJ nators_NNS ._.
2nd_CD reason38_NN occurred_VBD illustrative_JJ of_IN this_DT ._.
The_DT Mangrole_NNP Chief_NNP engaged_VBD a_DT Vaccinator_NNP ;_: after_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD months_NNS ,_, I_PRP received_VBD no_DT returns_NNS from_IN him_PRP ;_: I_PRP wrote_VBD three_CD months_NNS successively_RB for_IN his_PRP$ returns_NNS ,_, and_CC getting_VBG only_RB evasive_JJ answers_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT returns_NNS ,_, I_PRP sent_VBD a_DT man_NN to_TO act_VB ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD the_DT Mangrole_NNP Vaccinator_NNP into_IN Rajkote_NNP ._.
He_PRP came_VBD ,_, accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT Mangrole_NNP Wukeel_NNP ._.

I_PRP asked_VBD the_DT Wukeel_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: Who_NNP paid_VBD the_DT Vaccinator_NNP ?_. &_CC quot_NN ;_: He_PRP ,_, answered_VBD :_: &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT Mangrole_NNP Durbar._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: Then_RB I_PRP said_VBD ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: Send_NNP one_CD return_NN to_TO me_PRP ,_, and_CC one_CD to_TO the_DT Joonaghur_NNP Durbar._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: They_PRP were_VBD quite_RB satisfied_JJ ,_, but_CC Joonaghur_NNP was_VBD not_RB ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP also_RB states_VBZ that_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT superintendence_NN is_VBZ weak._JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: For_IN nearly_RB one_CD year_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT time_NN I_PRP was_VBD away_RB on_IN sick_JJ leave_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD no_DT practical_JJ superintendence_NN whatever_WDT ;_: there_EX was_VBD virtually_RB no_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ;_: the_DT duties_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT regiment_NN at_IN Rajkote_NNP ._.

The_DT senior_JJ Vaccinator_NNP writes_VBZ the_DT official_JJ correspondence_NN ,_, and_CC travels_NNS about_IN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ to_TO find_VB him_PRP a_DT tent_NN ,_, and_CC pay_VB for_IN fodder_NN for_IN his_PRP$ horse_NN ;_: for_IN he_PRP certainly_RB could_MD not_RB do_VB either_RB on_IN rupees_NNS 20_CD per_IN month_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ all_PDT the_DT pay_NN he_PRP gets_VBZ ,_, and_CC he_PRP must_MD have_VB some_DT means_NNS of_IN getting_VBG about_IN ._.
During_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN 1867_CD Dr._NNP Blomfield_NNP was_VBD Acting_VBG Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, but_CC on_IN account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ being_VBG ordered_VBN to_TO take_VB charge_NN of_IN the_DT 17th_CD Regi-_JJ ment_NN N._NNP I._NNP and_CC station_NN at_IN Rajkote_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD only_RB able_JJ to_TO travel_VB eighty_JJ days_NNS ;_: so_CC that_IN for_IN nearly_RB two_CD years_NNS there_RB was_VBD no_DT practical_JJ supervision_NN ,_, except_IN those_DT eighty_JJ days_NNS ._.
4.The_CD disturbed_JJ state_NN of_IN Kattiawar_NNP has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN a_DT serious_JJ obstacle_NN to_TO vacci-_JJ nation_NN being_VBG properly_RB and_CC efficiently_RB carried_VBN on_IN in_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
5.The_CD returns_NNS for_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD show_NN a_DT considerable_JJ increase_NN on_IN the_DT total_NN for_IN 1867_CD ,_, greater_JJR in_IN proportion_NN than_IN the_DT increase_NN of_IN 1867_CD ,_, above_IN the_DT total_NN for_IN 1866_CD ._.
I_PRP thought_VBD last_JJ year_NN the_DT number_NN had_VBD nearly_RB reached_VBN the_DT maximum_NN ;_: the_DT great_JJ increase_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB more_RBR satisfactory_JJ than_IN I_PRP had_VBD any_DT reason_NN to_TO expect_VB ,_, as_IN from_IN the_DT best_JJS computation_NN I_PRP can_MD make_VB ,_, 50,000_CD subjects_NNS yearly_RB are_VBP all_PDT that_IN can_MD be_VB estimated_VBN as_IN available_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB made_VBN this_DT calculation_NN altogether_RB from_IN the_DT annual_JJ birth_NN rate_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO estimate_VB that_DT correctly_RB ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT migratory_JJ habits_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: but_CC have_VBP taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN strangers_NNS that_WDT visit_VBP Kattiawar_NNP yearly_RB ._.
39_CD 6.In_CD the_DT commencement_NN of_IN my_PRP$ report_NN I_PRP mentioned_VBD that_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN Kat-_NNP tiawar_NN was_VBD ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT last_JJ census_NN ,_, 1,880,240_CD ;_: this_DT includes_VBZ the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Guickwar_NNP 's_POS territories_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP not_RB under_IN my_PRP$ superintendence_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT population_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ estimated_VBN at_IN upwards_NNS of_IN 300,000_CD ._.
If_IN this_DT estimate_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, little_JJ or_CC no_DT increase_NN can_MD be_VB expected_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS for_IN 1869_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB commenced_VBN this_DT part_NN of_IN my_PRP$ Report_NNP till_NN to-day_JJ (_( January_NNP 5th_CD )_) ,_, in_IN hopes_NNS that_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT returns_NNS for_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN December_NNP might_MD have_VB arrived_VBN ,_, but_CC as_IN only_RB one_CD Government_NNP Vaccinator_NNP 's_POS report_NN has_VBZ yet_RB come_VBN to_TO hand_NN ,_, and_CC very_RB few_JJ from_IN the_DT Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccinators_NNS ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB put_VB it_PRP off_RP longer_RBR ,_, and_CC must_MD therefore_VB only_RB take_VB eleven_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC compare_VB them_PRP with_IN the_DT corresponding_VBG eleven_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ._.
7.The_CD total_JJ vaccinated_VBN from_IN January_NNP to_TO November_NNP in_IN 1867_CD was_VBD 35,860_CD ;_: the_DT total_NN for_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ months_NNS 1868_CD is_VBZ 44,440_CD ;_: showing_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 8,580_CD ._.
There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT tendency_NN to_TO increase_VB in_IN the_DT latter_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN former_JJ returns_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT monthly_JJ average_NN from_IN January_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN pretty_RB equal_JJ ,_, with_IN one_CD exception_NN ,_, the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ;_: the_DT large_JJ number_NN returned_VBN for_IN that_DT month_NN was_VBD the_DT result_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP being_VBG sent_VBN to_TO the_DT talooka_NN of_IN Wankaneer_NNP ,_, where_WRB there_EX had_VBD never_RB been_VBN a_DT resident_JJ Vaccinator_NN before_IN ._.
Of_IN course_NN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN months_NNS show_VBP a_DT greater_JJR average_NN than_IN the_DT hot_JJ and_CC rainy_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT difference_NN is_VBZ not_RB nearly_RB so_RB great_JJ as_IN might_MD be_VB expected_VBN ,_, because_IN vaccination_NN can_MD be_VB carried_VBN on_IN all_PDT the_DT year_NN round_NN in_IN Kat-_NNP tiawar_NN ,_, the_DT change_NN of_IN temperature_NN during_IN the_DT different_JJ seasons_NNS not_RB being_VBG very_RB marked_VBN ._.
The_DT steady_JJ monthly_JJ average_NN is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, another_DT proof_NN that_IN the_DT maximum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN reached_VBN ._.
8.Altogether_CD ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN 42_CD ,_, 34_CD Chiefs_NNP '_POS ,_, and_CC 8_CD Government_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP nine_CD Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNS in_IN all_DT ;_: but_CC one_CD travels_NNS about_IN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, and_CC writes_VBZ the_DT official_JJ correspondence_NN ;_: an-_JJ other_JJ is_VBZ the_DT station_NN Vaccinator_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ returns_NNS go_VB in_IN separately_RB ._.
Although_IN there_EX are_VBP 34_CD Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccinators_NNS ,_, on_IN paper_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN for_IN all_DT practical_JJ purposes_NNS is_VBZ much_RB less_JJR ;_: for_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT Jam_NNP of_IN Nowanuggur_NNP entertains_VBZ four_CD Vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC generally_RB only_RB two_CD are_VBP properly_RB employed_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB the_DT Vaccinators_NNS '_POS fault_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT Durbar_NNP 's_POS ,_, who_WP will_MD not_RB assist_VB them_PRP ._.
Then_RB there_EX are_VBP always_RB two_CD or_CC three_CD who_WP are_VBP utterly_JJ incompetent_NN for_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
The_DT Mallia_NNP Vaccinator_NNP is_VBZ an_DT instance_NN of_IN this_DT ;_: he_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN so_RB since_IN he_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP requested_VBN his_PRP$ removal_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP will_MD mention_VB the_DT Vaccinators_NNS in_IN detail_NN ,_, when_WRB reporting_VBG on_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
Four_CD additional_JJ Vaccinators_NNS have_VBP been_VBN appointed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: two_CD in_IN January_NNP by_IN the_DT Jam_NNP of_IN Nowanuggur_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD in_IN March_NNP by_IN the_DT Nawab_NNP of_IN Joonaghur_NNP ,_, making_VBG thirty-four_JJ in_IN all_DT ,_, four_CD more_JJR than_IN in_IN 1867_CD ._.
9.The_CD Chief_NNP of_IN Bhownuggur_NNP has_VBZ for_IN some_DT years_NNS past_IN made_VBD one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ Vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS do_VBP duty_NN as_IN a_DT Native_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, having_VBG increased_VBN his_PRP$ pay_NN to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
20_CD per_IN month_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB found_VBN that_IN the_DT work_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN any_DT better_JJR for_IN the_DT extra_JJ super-_JJ intendence_NN ;_: indeed_RB ,_, the_DT returns_NNS do_VBP not_RB come_VB in_IN as_RB regularly_RB as_IN before_RB ;_: but_CC I_PRP highly_RB approve_IN of_IN the_DT appointment_NN nevertheless_RB ,_, as_IN being_VBG something_NN for_IN the_DT other_JJ Vaccinators_NNS 40_CD to_TO look_VB forward_RB to_TO ,_, especially_RB if_IN given_VBN ,_, as_IN in_IN this_DT case_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT most_RBS deserving_JJ ._.
The_DT Nawab_NNP of_IN Joonaghur_NNP is_VBZ desirous_JJ of_IN making_VBG a_DT similar_JJ appointment_NN ._.
The_DT late_JJ Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, Colonel_NNP Keatinge_NNP ,_, recommended_VBD that_IN there_EX should_MD be_VB four_CD Native_JJ Superintendents_NNS ,_, each_DT on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
50_CD per_IN mensem_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP should_MD be_VB withdrawn_VBN ._.
This_DT would_MD be_VB a_DT good_JJ arrangement_NN if_IN either_DT of_IN the_DT systems_NNS as_IN above_IN were_VBD inaugurated_VBN ;_: but_CC trustworthy_JJ men_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB got_VBN for_IN Rs_NNP ._.
50_CD a_DT month_NN ,_, every_DT thing_NN is_VBZ so_RB dear_JJ in_IN Kattiawar_NNP ;_: a_DT horse_NN alone_RB costs_VBZ Rs_NNP ._.
30_CD a_DT month_NN to_TO keep_VB ;_: besides_NNS ,_, Kattiawar_NNP would_MD lose_VB the_DT services_NNS of_IN eight_CD Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP whom_WP the_DT Superintendent_NN can_MD order_NN off_RB at_IN a_DT moment_NN 's_POS notice_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP are_VBP generally_RB employed_VBN where_WRB no_DT Vaccina-_NNP tor_NN would_MD be_VB kept_VBN ,_, except_IN at_IN the_DT Government_NNP expense_NN ._.

There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT change_NN amongst_VBZ the_DT Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNP ;_: one_CD man_NN was_VBD fined_VBN 4_CD Rs_NNP ._.
for_IN losing_VBG lancets_NNS ;_: otherwise_RB no_DT punishment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN inflicted_VBN on_IN any_DT of_IN them_PRP ._.
10.During_VBG the_DT year_NN one_CD Chief_NNP 's_POS Vaccinator_NNP died_VBD ;_: he_PRP was_VBD very_RB old_JJ ,_, almost_RB pastdoing_VBG his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, and_CC should_MD have_VB given_VBN up_RP work_NN some_DT years_NNS since_IN ,_, but_CC had_VBD no_DT pension_NN to_TO retire_VB on_IN ;_: otherwise_NN I_PRP would_MD have_VB got_VBD him_PRP invalided_VBD long_RB ago_RB ._.

Two_CD Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS took_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ discharge_NN on_IN getting_VBG better_RBR employment_NN ;_: one_CD was_VBD discharged_VBN for_IN laziness_NN ;_: three_CD were_VBD fined_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ reason_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN not_RB forwarding_VBG their_PRP$ returns_NNS regularly_RB ._.
11.The_CD Government_NNP Vaccinators_NNS have_VBP worked_VBN well_RB during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

(_( I_PRP know-_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB true_JJ as_RB far_RB as_IN Nowanuggur_NNP is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._. )_)

Toolsee_NNP Geega_NNP of_IN Bhownuggur_NNP has_VBZ vaccinated_VBN the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS ;_: but_CC as_IN I_PRP have_VBP not_RB inspected_VBN his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB report_VB on_IN it_PRP ._.

From_IN the_DT 20th_CD May_NNP till_VB 3rd_CD October_NNP I_PRP was_VBD in_IN Rajkote_NNP ,_, performing_VBG my_PRP$ Civil_JJ duties_NNS ._.

141_CD ,_, 186_CD ,_, 305_CD ,_, and_CC 307_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT Rajkote_NNP ,_, Gondul_NNP ,_, Porebunder_NNP ,_, Joonaghur_NNP and_CC Bantwa_NNP Chiefs_NNP '_POS Vaccinators_NNS ._.

All_PDT the_DT Durbars_NNP I_PRP have_VBP visited_VBN during_IN my_PRP$ tour_NNS have_VBP treated_VBN me_PRP ,_, individually_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS kindness_NN and_CC courtesy_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT of_IN Porebunder_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Rana_NNP showed_VBD me_PRP no_DT attention_NN whatever_WDT ;_: for_IN one_CD whole_JJ day_NN I_PRP could_MD not_RB get_VB supplies_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN ,_, although_IN I_PRP wrote_VBD twice_RB ,_, and_CC sent_VBD four_CD verbal_JJ mes-_NN sages_NNS by_IN different_JJ messengers_NNS ._.
Nowanuggur_NNP and_CC Gondul_NNP will_MD not_RB assist_VB their_PRP$ Vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS as_IN they_PRP ought_MD to_TO do_VB ;_: they_PRP think_VBP as_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP pay_VBP them_PRP ,_, they_PRP have_VBP done_VBN their_PRP$ duty_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT same_JJ complaint_NN every_DT year_NN about_IN them_PRP ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT smaller_JJR Durbars_NNS have_VBP given_VBN trouble_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ generally_RB been_VBN where_WRB four_CD or_CC more_JJR Chiefs_JJ con-_NN jointly_RB entertain_VBP one_CD Vaccinator_NNP ,_, and_CC therefore_RB very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO arrive_VB at_IN the_DT truth_NN ._.
Joonaghur_NNP and_CC Bhownuggur_NNP both_DT employ_VBP a_DT large_JJ staff_NN of_IN Vaccinators_NNS ,_, and_CC take_VB much_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN ._.

12_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN ,_, as_IN reported_VBN by_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ,_, is_VBZ much_RB too_RB high_JJ ;_: the_DT highest_JJS percentage_NN by_IN the_DT most_RBS careful_JJ Vaccinators_NNS whose_WP$ work_NN I_PRP have_VBP inspected_VBN might_MD be_VB put_VBN down_RP at_IN 92_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN done_VBN by_IN some_DT Vaccinators_NNS is_VBZ as_RB low_JJ as_IN 75_CD per_IN centum_NN ._.
43_CD 13.I_CD have_VBP received_VBN lymph_JJ several_JJ times_NNS from_IN England_NNP and_CC from_IN different_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ all_DT proved_VBN inert_NN ._.

As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS have_VBP long_JJ enter-_JJ tained_VBD the_DT belief_NN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP permits_VBZ the_DT forcible_JJ taking_NN of_IN lymph_NN from_IN a_DT successfully_RB vaccinated_JJ child_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ this_DT belief_NN that_WDT enables_VBZ us_PRP to_TO obtain_VB fresh_JJ lymph_NN ;_: once_RB disabused_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_, I_PRP need_VBP not_RB say_VB that_IN one_CD and_CC all_DT will_MD absolutely_RB refuse_VB ,_, and_CC naturally_RB so_RB ,_, to_TO give_VB any_DT lymph_NN ;_: and_CC then_RB vaccination_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN course_NN ,_, must_MD come_VB to_TO a_DT stand_NN still_RB ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB a_DT question_NN of_IN time_NN for_IN the_DT poor_JJ to_TO follow_VB the_DT rich_NN in_IN refusing_VBG lymph_NN ._.

1867_CD 4,273_CD ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 4,153_CD 97.2_CD 1868_CD 4,604_CD 331_CD ..._: ..._: 4,489_CD 97.5_CD The_DT returns_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN now_RB under_IN report_NN exhibit_NN an_DT increase_NN of_IN 331_CD operations_NNS over_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS was_VBD 4,604_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT two_CD Vaccinators_NNS was_VBD 2,146_CD and_CC 2,458_CD respectively_RB ,_, which_WDT gives_VBZ a_DT difference_NN of_IN 312_CD in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT ._.
Though_IN the_DT increase_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT labours_NN of_IN the_DT Mussulman_NNP Vaccinator_NNP ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB attribute_VB any_DT want_NN of_IN zeal_NN to_TO the_DT Hindoo_NNP lad_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO the_DT greater_JJR apathy_NN of_IN the_DT Hindoo_NNP community_NN ,_, particularly_RB of_IN the_DT Banian_JJ section_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, to_TO the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN the_DT protection_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT actual_JJ opposition_NN made_VBD to_TO vaccination_NN by_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT difficulty_NN the_DT Vacci-_JJ nators_NNS have_VBP to_TO contend_VB against_IN is_VBZ the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT parents_NNS frequently_RB conceal_VBP the_DT children_NNS after_IN being_VBG vaccinated_VBN ,_, and_CC will_MD not_RB allow_VB the_DT matured_JJ vesicles_NNS to_TO be_VB opened_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT propagation_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT belief_NN ,_, that_IN by_IN taking_VBG the_DT fresh_JJ lymph_NN from_IN the_DT child_NN 's_POS arm_NN ,_, the_DT successful_JJ result_NN is_VBZ impaired_VBN ._.
The_DT Vaccinators_NNP state_NN that_IN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP not_RB unwilling_JJ to_TO submit_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS for_IN protection_NN ,_, but_CC object_VBP to_TO the_DT lymph_NN of_IN one_CD child_NN being_VBG taken_VBN to_TO vaccinate_VB several_JJ ,_, whilst_JJ others_NNS are_VBP not_RB used_VBN at_IN all_DT ._.
In_IN respect_NN of_IN sex_NN ,_, 2,357_CD were_VBD males_NNS ,_, and_CC 2,247_CD females_NNS ,_, showing_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 122_CD cases_NNS in_IN males_NNS ,_, and_CC 209_CD in_IN females_NNS ,_, indicative_NN of_IN an_DT increasing_VBG regard_NN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN female_JJ offspring_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN a_DT considerable_JJ increase_NN in_IN this_DT respect_NN was_VBD also_RB recorded_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT age_NN the_DT excess_NN was_VBD 247_CD under_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, and_CC 84_CD above_IN one_CD year_NN ._.
In_IN caste_NN the_DT rise_NN was_VBD 128_CD in_IN Hindoos_NNP ,_, and_CC 221_CD in_IN Mussulmans_NNPS ;_: the_DT decrease_NN was_VBD 11_CD in_IN Christians_NNPS ,_, and_CC 7_CD in_IN Parsees_NNS ._.
In_IN result_NN 4,489_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, 78_CD failed_VBD ,_, and_CC 37_CD were_VBD doubtful_JJ ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN was_VBD 97.5_CD ,_, showing_VBG a_DT slight_JJ difference_NN from_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN has_VBZ been_VBN good_JJ and_CC active_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT resulting_VBG vesicles_NNS large_JJ ,_, well-formed_JJ ,_, and_CC distinctive_JJ ,_, leaving_VBG well_RB marked_VBN cicatrices_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT monsoon_NN the_DT vesicles_NNS did_VBD not_RB develope_VB so_RB well_RB ,_, were_VBD smaller_JJR ,_, and_CC the_DT lymph_NN not_RB so_RB clear_JJ ,_, but_CC no_DT deterioration_NN was_VBD reported_VBN ,_, and_CC supplies_NNS have_VBP regularly_RB been_VBN fur-_JJ 9_CD v_NN 66_CD nished_VBN to_TO cantonment_VB and_CC distant_JJ stations_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT heavy_JJ rains_NNS in_IN August_NNP last_JJ fever_NN prevailed_VBD to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN ,_, with_IN secondary_JJ chest_NN affections_NNS ,_, and_CC infantile_JJ diarrh67_NN will_MD be_VB alluded_VBN to_TO presently_RB ;_: of_IN these_DT cases_NNS 695_CD were_VBD among_IN children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, the_DT ages_NNS of_IN 101_CD being_VBG above_IN that_DT amount_NN ,_, a_DT greater_JJR number_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ class_NN being_VBG prison-_JJ ers_NNS who_WP were_VBD vaccinated_VBN on_IN admission_NN into_IN Jail_NNP ,_, as_IN a_DT precautionary_JJ measure_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP did_VBD not_RB present_JJ unequivocal_JJ signs_NNS of_IN having_VBG had_VBD small-pox_JJ ,_, or_CC of_IN having_VBG been_VBN vaccinated_VBN previously_RB ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO sex_NN ,_, 492_CD were_VBD males_NNS ,_, 304_CD females_NNS ._.
682_CD were_VBD Hindoos_NNP ,_, 67_CD Mussulmans_NNPS ,_, 2_CD Christians_NNPS ,_, and_CC 40_CD other_JJ castes_NNS ._.
No_DT Parsees_NNP were_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, but_CC there_EX are_VBP very_RB few_JJ in_IN Kaira_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP seldom_RB allow_VBP the_DT operation_NN to_TO be_VB performed_VBN ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT return_NN ,_, that_IN 84_CD have_VBP been_VBN unsuccessful_JJ ,_, and_CC 74_CD doubtful_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT unusually_RB large_JJ number_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT prisoners_NNS vaccinated_VBN were_VBD operated_VBN on_IN ,_, either_DT without_IN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS very_RB doubtful_JJ ,_, results_NNS ,_, as_IN might_MD have_VB been_VBN expected_VBN ._.
The_DT parents_NNS of_IN the_DT children_NNS operated_VBN on_IN are_VBP very_RB careless_JJ about_IN preserving_VBG the_DT vesicles_NNS intact_JJ until_IN mature_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB the_DT result_NN is_VBZ not_RB as_RB good_JJ as_IN it_PRP would_MD otherwise_RB be_VB ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP is_VBZ principally_RB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT town_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ ,_, a_DT scarcity_NN of_IN available_JJ subjects_NNS there_RB ,_, he_PRP vaccinates_VBZ in_IN the_DT surrounding_NN villages_NNS ;_: did_VBD he_PRP not_RB do_VB so_RB ,_, he_PRP would_MD lose_VB his_PRP$ lymph_NN sometimes_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN getting_VBG a_DT continu-_JJ ous_JJ succession_NN of_IN suitable_JJ subjects_NNS ._.
He_PRP also_RB vaccinates_VBZ ,_, when_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ an_DT opportunity_NN ,_, strangers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, who_WP come_VBP to_TO the_DT town_NN on_IN business_NN ,_, or_CC reside_VB here_RB tempo-_JJ rarily_RB ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ allowed_VBN a_DT Peon_NN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO assist_VB him_PRP in_IN the_DT search_NN for_IN and_CC collection_NN of_IN children_NNS requiring_VBG the_DT operation_NN ;_: the_DT same_JJ Peon_NNP now_RB always_RB accompany-_JJ ing_VBG him_PRP when_WRB at_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._.
The_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN and_CC vesicles_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN good_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Vaccinator_NNP has_VBZ performed_VBN his_PRP$ work_NN satisfactorily_RB and_CC diligently_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT failure_NN in_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO floods_NNS cutting_VBG him_PRP off_RP from_IN children_NNS whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, and_CC on_IN whom_WP he_PRP was_VBD dependent_JJ for_IN the_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT supply_NN ,_, and_CC considerable_JJ difficulty_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN get-_JJ ting_VBG a_DT fair_JJ supply_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO lymph_VB sent_NN in_IN tubes_NNS having_VBG failed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT diffi-_JJ culty_NN of_IN getting_VBG a_DT child_NN brought_VBN with_IN good_JJ lymph_NN from_IN the_DT district_NN Vaccinator_NNP at_IN that_DT season_NN ._.
These_DT difficulties_NNS were_VBD at_IN last_JJ overcome_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ now_RB a_DT full_JJ and_CC continuous_JJ supply_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT above_JJ causes_VBZ the_DT numbers_NNS vaccinated_VBD during_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP were_VBD 44_CD and_CC 17_CD respectively_RB ,_, a_DT diminution_NN which_WDT has_VBZ told_VBN in_IN the_DT annual_JJ return_NN ._.
Vaccination_NN inspections_NNS are_VBP held_VBN monthly_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN and_CC the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN generally_RB thereby_RB ascertained_VBN ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC neighbourhood_NN seem_VBP to_TO appreciate_VB and_CC understand_VB the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT operation_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT rule_NN do_VBP not_RB object_VB to_TO have_VB it_PRP performed_VBN on_IN themselves_PRP or_CC their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, though_IN they_PRP are_VBP exceedingly_RB slothful_JJ and_CC careless_JJ about_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC require_VB to_TO be_VB sought_VBN out_RP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
The_DT Parsees_NNP seem_VBP to_TO have_VB the_DT greatest_JJS objection_NN to_TO the_DT operation_NN ._.
The_DT beneficial_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT operation_NN are_VBP well_RB marked_VBN in_IN preventing_VBG epidemic_JJ attacks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN sporadic_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP of_IN constant_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, the_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT juvenile_JJ population_NN are_VBP protected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT seniors_NNS have_VBP been_VBN 68_CD protected_VBN by_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, it_PRP must_MD be_VB confessed_VBN ,_, at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN blindness_NN and_CC disfigurement_NN ;_: so_RB there_RB does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB much_JJ danger_NN of_IN a_DT serious_JJ epidemic_NN from_IN this_DT cause_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ ,_, inoculation_NN is_VBZ not_RB practised_VBN here_RB ;_: I_PRP never_RB heard_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN ,_, though_IN I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN frequent_JJ inquiries_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
The_DT population_NN among_IN whom_WP the_DT vaccination_NN work_NN was_VBD performed_VBN numbers_NNS from_IN 12,000_CD to_TO 13,000_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT little_JJ over_IN 2_CD Annas_NNS and_CC 7_CD Pies_NNS ;_: the_DT pay_NN drawn_VBN by_IN the_DT Vaccinator_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD Rupees_NNP 130_CD ._.

In_IN a_DT daily_JJ increasing_NN and_CC populous_JJ place_NN like_IN Kurrachee_NNP ,_, the_DT seaport_NN and_CC outlet_NN for_IN the_DT traffic_NN of_IN Sind_NNP and_CC the_DT Punjaub_NNP ,_, every_DT effort_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO render_VB the_DT protective_JJ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN more_RBR extended_JJ ,_, efficient_JJ ,_, and_CC complete_JJ ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO dispel_VB the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN some_DT ,_, and_CC to_TO overcome_VB the_DT apathy_NN and_CC indifference_NN of_IN others_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB put_VBN forth_RB ._.
Every_DT means_VBZ to_TO keep_VB the_DT subject_NN constantly_RB before_IN the_DT people_NNS should_MD be_VB resorted_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC no_DT opportunity_NN of_IN explaining_VBG and_CC impressing_VBG upon_IN their_PRP$ mind_NN the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN infantile_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB lost_VBN ._.

Since_IN using_VBG this_DT lymph_VBZ the_DT vesicles_NNS are_VBP found_VBN well_RB and_CC fully_RB developed_VBN ._.

In_IN Kotree_NNP town_NN there_EX were_VBD 508_CD cases_NNS vaccinated_VBD ,_, against_IN 420_CD in_IN 1867_CD ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT district_NN 642_CD ,_, against_IN 473_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP asked_VBN for_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN births_NNS that_WDT occur_VBP within_IN this_DT talooka_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB town_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ no_DT such_JJ return_NN is_VBZ made_VBN ;_: until_IN something_NN like_IN an_DT accurate_JJ registration_NN of_IN births_NNS is_VBZ kept_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO carry_VB on_IN vaccination_NN efficiently_RB ._.
The_DT Vaccinator_NNP ,_, Majlis_NNP Rai_NNP ,_, has_VBZ worked_VBN hard_RB and_CC zealously_RB ;_: he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN rewarded_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP by_IN an_DT increase_NN of_IN salary_JJ ._.
