GENERAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, 13th_CD August_NNP 1869_CD ._.
Letter_NN from_IN the_DT Inspector_NNP General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2280_CD ,_, dated_VBD 3rd_CD June_NNP 18692_CD 6_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO learn_VB that_DT so_RB much_JJ practical_JJ good_NN has_VBZ resulted_VBN from_IN the_DT registers_NNS that_WDT are_VBP now_RB kept_VBN in_IN each_DT village_NN ._.
They_PRP will_MD ,_, independently_RB of_IN their_PRP$ utility_NN for_IN statistical_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, afford_PDT an_DT effective_JJ check_NN on_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS ._.
Government_NNP desire_NN that_IN the_DT special_JJ attention_NN of_IN Collectors_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ Assistants_NNS be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT inspection_NN of_IN these_DT Registers_NNS ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Mamlutdars_NNP '_POS Carkoons_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ circles_NNS the_DT villages_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN ,_, to_TO pay_VB as_RB much_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT accurate_JJ preparation_NN of_IN these_DT and_CC other_JJ statistical_JJ documents_NNS ,_, as_IN to_TO that_DT of_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ revenue_NN accounts_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT zealous_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Munici-_NNP pal_NN Commissioners_NNPS in_IN the_DT Sattara_NNP Collectorate_NNP watch_VBD the_DT work_NN performed_VBN by_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ employ_NN ,_, proves_VBZ how_WRB much_JJ good_NN may_MD be_VB effected_VBN by_IN enlisting_VBG the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN supervision_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: They_PRP (_( the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioners_NNP )_) look_VBP after_IN the_DT Vaccinators_NNS '_POS returns_NNS so_RB minutely_RB ,_, that_IN they_PRP refuse_VBP not_RB unfrequently_RB to_TO pay_VB him_PRP ,_, till_NN they_PRP receive_VBP the_DT confirmation._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: No_DT stipendiary_JJ agency_NN that_WDT Government_NNP could_MD employ_VB would_MD probably_RB be_VB so_RB efficacious_JJ ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT time_NN has_VBZ now_RB arrived_VBN for_IN considering_VBG whether_IN the_DT strength_NN and_CC efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT success_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT happi-_NN ness_NN and_CC safety_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ mass_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN so_RB greatly_RB depend_VBP ,_, might_MD not_RB be_VB increased_VBN by_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN the_DT recently_RB established_VBN &_CC quot_NNP ;_: Local_NNP Funds_NNP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Committees_NNP through_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP administered_VBN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP is_VBZ requested_VBN to_TO place_VB himself_PRP in_IN communication_NN ,_, through_IN the_DT Revenue_NNP Commissioners_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT several_JJ Presidents_NNS of_IN Committees_NNP ,_, and_CC ascertain_VB how_WRB far_RB they_PRP are_VBP disposed_VBN to_TO contribute_VB towards_NNS this_DT work_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN Government_NNP the_DT rural_JJ Vaccinators_NNS should_MD chiefly_VB be_VB paid_VBN from_IN this_DT source_NN ._.
If_IN this_DT principle_NN were_VBD adopted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Vaccinators_NNS for_IN large_JJ towns_NNS paid_VBN for_IN by_IN Municipalities_NNP ,_, the_DT entire_JJ amount_NN of_IN the_DT imperial_JJ expenditure_NN might_MD be_VB devoted_VBN to_TO strengthening_VBG the_DT staff_NN of_IN Superintendents_NNS ._.
Every_DT District_NNP or_CC Collectorate_NNP might_MD have_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD Assistant_NNP Superintendent_NNP ._.
In_IN making_VBG this_DT suggestion_NN ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP wishes_VBZ it_PRP to_TO be_VB clearly_RB understood_JJ that_IN his_PRP$ object_NN is_VBZ solely_RB to_TO increase_VB the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT Department_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO relieve_VB the_DT Imperial_NNP Exchequer_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, just_RB ,_, after_IN the_DT people_NNS have_VBP responded_VBN to_TO the_DT calls_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN towards_NNS local_JJ taxation_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT State_NNP to_TO withdraw_VB the_DT aid_NN it_PRP had_VBD previously_RB given_VBN ._.
So_RB far_RB from_IN voluntary_JJ efforts_NNS on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS affording_VBG grounds_NNS for_IN the_DT diminution_NN of_IN State_NNP aid_NN ,_, they_PRP furnish_VBP the_DT strongest_JJS argument_NN for_IN increasing_VBG such_JJ aid_NN ._.
3_CD 9_CD ._.
The_DT suggestions_NNS for_IN having_VBG recourse_NN to_TO legislation_NN for_IN the_DT suppres-_JJ sion_NN of_IN Inoculation_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN making_VBG Vaccination_NNP compulsory_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Town_NNP and_CC Island_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN and_CC are_VBP engaging_VBG the_DT attention_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP has_VBZ much_RB pleasure_NN in_IN expressing_VBG his_PRP$ approval_NN of_IN the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP and_CC the_DT Officers_NNP under_IN him_PRP have_VBP conducted_VBN their_PRP$ several_JJ duties_NNS ._.
The_DT Department_NNP is_VBZ necessarily_RB dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT Officers_NNP employed_VBD in_IN the_DT general_JJ administration_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC Government_NNP have_VBP learnt_VBN with_IN satisfaction_NN the_DT marked_JJ assist-_JJ ance_NN rendered_VBN by_IN Colonel_NNP Schneider_NNP at_IN Sawunt_NNP Warree_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Dhunjeebhoy_NNP Cowasjee_NNP ,_, the_DT Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP of_IN Sattara_NNP ._.
The_DT recent_JJ death_NN of_IN Doctor_NNP Ffolliott_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD shown_VBN himself_PRP a_DT most_RBS zealous_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, is_VBZ to_TO be_VB greatly_RB lamented_VBN ._.
(_( Signed_VBN )_) F._NNP R._NNP S._NNP WYLLIE_NNP ,_, For_IN Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO Government_NNP ._.
